name: Ashton Plumbing, Heating & Air Conditioning
address: Ashton Plumbing, Heating & Air Conditioning, 4631 Shell Rd Unit 140, Richmond, BC V6X 3M4

detailed_reviews.review_text: We were very happy with Ashton when we had a new furnace, heat pump and demand water heater installed. Their entire team showed great attention to detail and high quality workmanship throughout the whole process. Any questions we had were promptly addressed. I highly recommend this company. Special thanks to Mo for the detailed assessment/estimate, and Shahed and Japn for the installation. Service:
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Andrea! Thank you for trusting us with your heat pump and tankless  water heater installation! Ill be sure to let the team know you left them a review, theyll be trilled to hear from you. Thank you again!

detailed_reviews.review_text: 5 stars. I d give 10 if I could for Jason C. If you re in Vancouver give Ashton a call and ask for Jason C. Jason s not only efficient but honest and reliable. My parents had a leaking sink and two bad toilets. He fixed all their issues and even replaced the two bathroom faucets that were noisy in under 2 hours. Everything works great now and the price was reasonable for the work he did. Couldn t recommend Ashton and Jason C. enough. Truly a great experience
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for your review, JX! Were so glad Jason was able to resolve your parents leaking sinks and toilets! Thank you for choosing Ashton!

detailed_reviews.review_text: We had an issue with draining and tried to clear it ourselves, which ended with a dislodged sink. We called Ashton after searching online and they connected us with Carlos within a day. Carlos was professional with his work, fixing our sink and doing a major flush with the kitchen pipes. He also provided useful information that helped us understand our plumbing more. Appreciate the knowledge and the assistance!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Ka! Thank you for leaving Carlos a review! Were glad he was able to help reseat your sink! Plumbing problems are never fun, but were here to make repairs and painless as possible. Thank you again for choosing Ashton! I will be sure to let Carlos know you left him a review. Thank you, Ka!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Update: Bejau and Connor came back the last couple of days to finish up the installation. Just like before they re an amazing team and extremely great at what they do. While there was a bit of miscommunication that led to a bit of delay on the installation (set-up logistics mishap from not seeing the layout of my condo prior to the install team coming in), overall experience on everything else was superb. The reps on the phone were very nice and helpful. The install team that showed up were very professional, nice, and worked very hard to problem-solve the logistics issue while ensuring all strata codes are followed and I was fully satisfied with their proposed solutions (trust me, you dont want to fall out of compliance from Strata rules). Would highly recommend their services to anyone.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Allan, thank you for your review; we really appreciate it. Ac installation for Strat can often be difficult, but our office and field team have the knowledge and know-how to do it! I will be sure to let everyone in the office and the team that worked on your installation know what a great job they did for you. From everyone here at Ashton, thank you again for choosing us for your heat pump installation.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Ashton Technician Shawn Taylor came to perform a diagnostic of my heat pump which wasnt running. He figured it was a faulty thermostat and quoted for the supply and install of a new one. Ashton pricing is definitely pricey, but Shawn was a true professional and is able to find fix my problem quickly. He explained everything he was doing and involved me in his findings. He took the time to diagnose the issue properly unlike other technicians Ive had before who diagnosed wrong. He kept the workplace tidy and clean. He also offered a service membership which I signed up for considering it gave a 15% service discount immediately. Shawn is the guy you want to call if you have hvac issues, 10/10 service and expertise.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Good morning Sunny, thank you for taking the time to leave us a review!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Mo, Brent, Karan and Dominic and everyone else at Ashton was awesome. I had an electrical panel, tankless hot water, and a HVAC to be done over 3 days which I thought was impossible but they got it done in 2 and cleaned my place as well. Would strongly recommend.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Tim! Thank you for your glowing review of our installation team! Were so glad you decided to trust Ashton with your HVAC project!

detailed_reviews.review_text: We had our split a/c installed by Karan and Dominic from Ashton. Both were very knowledgeable , did a very good job, and answered all our queries throughout the process and explained in a way we could easily understand. They were punctual and also finished the job earlier than promised & gave good advices on how to efficiently use the unit. Job well done and we are very happy with their service.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you, Ganesh! Its out goal to ensure all our clients fully understand their system and are 100% comfortable in the process! Thank you again for choosing Ashton for your heat pump installation. I will be sure to let Dominic and Karan see your review! Thank you!

detailed_reviews.review_text: 5/5 would recommend and use their services again. Johnny was very informative and did the job fast and efficiently. He evaluated the issue, went to get a new toilet and installed all in the same day.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: HI Tatyanna! Thank you for the kind words! Johnny was so happy to hear from you this morning! Were so glad he was able o install your new toilet =).

detailed_reviews.review_text: I called Ashton for a quote, they sent Mo who was very knowledgeable about air flow. He designed a system that should greatly improve the comfort of our house. Their quote was the highest, but I felt the improvements were worth the cost. On Monday, I had a team of 4 desend on my home to begin the installation.  I felt their work was top shelf, very efficient. The left the work area very clean.  Big shout out to Mo Meherzad, Comfort Advisor and Installers: Karan, Japn and Dominic.  Thanks for the great job.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Tim! Thank you for your review of our installation team! I will be sure to let Mo, Japn, Karan and Dominic what an amazing job the did on your heat pump ac installation! Please dont hesitate to reach out to us if you have any questions or concerns. Thank you again for choosing Ashton!

detailed_reviews.review_text: I had to turn to Ashton to fix a leak which another company was not able to repair.  The leak had sprung again within a week of their  - the other company s work. Ashton phone staff were very friendly and set up appointment quickly as the water was totally shut off due leak and task was assigned to Carlos. The leak was in awkward spot and Carlos had to come up with a creative way to get the job done. Carlos is a true professional I could easily see that this time the repair to the pipe was done correctly.  He also recommended to update poly b pipes and took the time to explain the reason for his suggestion, he encouraged me to do my own research so I could make an informed decision.   I felt at ease and Carlos was able to answer all my questions. All work has now been completed including replacement of pressure reducing valve and poly b pipes. Carlos has sound experience in his trade and truly cares about his customers.  Thank you Ashton and Carlos, I know I can count on you. :) Bobbie Dhaliwal
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you, Bobbie! Ill be sure to let Carlos know what a great job he did for you!

detailed_reviews.review_text: I called 6 different plumbers and no one was available for almost a month since my issue wasnt an emergency. Ashton was able to send a tech out the next day. Brent arrived right on time to the minute. He was very professional and knowledgeable. He worked with the company for me to be able to use my warranty without me having to lift a finger. And best of all, there was no $200 charge for walking through my door like other companies charge. I will definitely be using Ashton from now on!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Stef, thank you for leaving a review for Brent!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Bejan and Amir have been a great team and doing excellent job installing heat pump at my place. I have been advised at every step of the job, and Bejan was very personable and great in explaining the technical side of things to me and provided his expertise.  I actually met him when he was working on my neighbour s unit. Bejan was the reason I went with Ashton!  Both are always on time, and very tidy. They deserve 5 stars from me!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Carmen! Bejan and Amir were both trilled to hear from you this morning! Thank you so much for choosing Ashton for your Heat Pump Ac installation!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Sean P came for a furnace inspection. Super friendly and easy to talk to. He s thorough with his inspection, and most importantly, answered all my questions in ways that s easy to understand. He also took time to understand my needs/usage prior to making his recommendation on a new furnace based on the various models. Ashton would be my go to for all future plumbing/heating needs!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Good morning, Sophia! Thank you for the kind words and thank you again for choosing Ashton!. Please do not hesitate to reach out to us if you have any questions about your home.

detailed_reviews.review_text: I had an issue with water draining very slowly in my kitchen sink. I didnt have any luck resolving it myself so I called a few places, Ashton being of one them to get an idea how soon I could have a technician take a look but also how they quote.  Every company quotes differently meaning some based on the job and then hourly or every half hour plus a call out fee, etc.  If theyre trying to resolve an issue without actually being on site thats where it could impact you financially when you get the invoice and they dont disclose what charges you may expect upfront.  Originally a tech was scheduled for later in the afternoon next day.  I received a call quite early this morning informing me they had a cancellation and a tech could be at my place in half an hour. Johnny B arrived within 30 minutes of that phone call and the service provided was definitely appreciated.  He took a look then informed me what he recommended should be done and gave me an approximate cost before proceeding.  He was upfront about the fact that it may take longer due to the fact that the pipes were clogged and depending on how far down the line the clog was it may take time to completely resolve the issue.  Again transparent and upfront with the potential for extra charges.  Once the clog was removed he tested a few times to ensure water was draining as it should.  Site was cleaned as if nothing ever happened.  As for the most important part the invoice - that was as quoted so no surprises.  This is the second time Ive used Ashton for plumbing services and both experiences for me were great.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much, Mani! Were so glad you were able to take advantage of our transparent pricing; no hidden costs! Johnny was trilled to hear from you this morning and wanted to say Thank you!.

detailed_reviews.review_text: My mother-in-law recently had the pleasure of working with Johnny from Ashton Plumbing, Heating & Air Conditioning, and she cannot recommend his services enough. Johnny didnt just meet her expectations; he exceeded them in every way. She was first impressed by Johnny s punctuality. He arrived right on time, something that s unfortunately not common these days. He was immediately ready to assess the situation with her sink and furnace. After listening to her concerns, Johnny quickly diagnosed the issues. Her sink faucet was broken and her furnace was overdue for servicing. With expertise and skill that can only come from experience, Johnny walked her through his planned steps to resolve the issues, ensuring that she understood what needed to be done and why. Johnny wasted no time getting to work. He efficiently replaced the faucet, ensuring that the pipes were clear of any obstruction. Then he moved onto the furnace. she was genuinely impressed by how thorough he was in servicing it, even identifying a minor issue that could have turned into a major problem down the road. He fixed it right away, saving my mother-in-law future headaches and potential costs. After completing the job, Johnny made sure the work areas were cleaner than when he arrived. There were no traces of debris or any mess, which she greatly appreciated. Throughout the process, Johnny was communicative and friendly. He answered all her questions and even gave her useful tips on maintaining her plumbing and heating systems, which was invaluable advice that she plans to follow. Johnny s expertise, professionalism, and exceptional customer service make him a standout technician. She wholeheartedly recommends him and Ashton Plumbing, Heating & Air Conditioning for any household repair and maintenance tasks. Its service providers like Johnny who turn a potentially stressful situation into a seamless and even enjoyable experience. If youre in need of plumbing, heating, or air conditioning services, do yourself a favor and ask for Johnny. You wont be disappointed! Frazer Roland on behalf of Christa Thews
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: WOW! From everyone here at Ashton, we want to say thank you for leaving Johnny a review! Ive shared your kind words with the entire company and everyone here is so happy to hear Johnny exceeded your expectations and more! Thank you again for choosing Ashton and Johnny!

detailed_reviews.review_text: I was recommended Ashton Plumbing after several other plumbers were unable to assist in an extensive shower repair that needed to be done. Carlos was able to find a solution and did a great job repairing our shower. He was knowledgable and pleasant to deal with throughout the entire process. I would highly recommend Ashton Plumbing to anyone I know.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Matt! Were so glad Carlos was able to solve your extensive shower issues! Ill be sure to let Carlos know you left him a review. Thank you again for trusting Ashton!

detailed_reviews.review_text: I had an issue with a leaking pipe in my ceiling late Friday night.  I called Ashton and a plumber was onsite very quickly to help deal with the situation.  Jerry was amazing.  He was professional, knowledgeable and was quick to find the issue and help resolve it.  I highly recommend Ashton.  I had installed a heatpump through Ashton this year and cant say enough good things about this company.  And if you require any plumbing, I hope they send Jerry, you wont be disappointed.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you, Nicholas! Jerry was so happy to hear from you this morning and wanted to say Thanks!. Thank you again for choosing Ashton!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Very good work, on time and job done with quality earlier than expected. This is the second job with Ashton within my family.  Thanks to Bejan, Amir and Vinnie. They delievered amazing professional work. Bejan is exceptionally attentive. Really appreciate you guys!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the review and photo of the team, Armado! Were so glad the team was able to get your new heat pump installed before the weekend! Thank you again for choosing Ashton!

detailed_reviews.review_text: The time was right to finally replace my old furnace & hot water tank. From start to finish (& it was 2 very long days due to our very long garage & strata requirements) Mo, Abhi, Dominic and Vinnie all played a role in making the whole process very smooth. The workmanship is excellent & their communication   - Noodles the cat followed them around trying to help, which any cat owner will tell you is a true test of character. Thanks again. Janet, Rex & Noodles Dec. 2020 Big thank you to Mo and everyone at Ashton for helping me keep the heat on. As you know, trust is more important than ever. & I would gladly hire them for work in my home. One more thing, as a single woman home owner you feel more vulnerable to being overcharged or being sold something you don t need. This is not the case with Mo. He helps you make the best decision for you. Thanks again, Janet
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Janet, were so glad Mo was able to resolve your heating issues. We pride ourselves in transparent service and were so glad you felt the same way. Thank you again for choosing Ashton!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Carlos helped me with my service request and he literally was in and out in about 20 mins and the job was well done and clean. He started by explaining the issue and provided the solution and a quote while considering the budget that I hoped for. Would definitely look at having Carlos and Ashton Plumbing for future services!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Keith! Carlos just wanted to say Thank you!. He read your review this morning and was so happy to hear from you again. Thank you again for choosing Ashton!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Had the annual plumbing inspection as part of our No Problems Plan package. Great experience: - booking the appointment was easy, the call center staff are very friendly and responsive - got a call the morning of the service noting the tech was 40 minutes out and he showed up within the announced time - our tech, Johnny, was very thorough and professional. He answered all of our questions and gave us some good tips on maintenance. The written report provided is very comprehensive and is a good reference. - he explained the suggestions for any repair/preventative maintenance (which was also delivered by email so we could review and consider).
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Stewart! Thank you for taking the time to leave Johnny a review! Were so glad you took advantage of the free NPP annual inspections!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Excellent service by Johnny Bingham. Very friendly & efficient service. Had old leaky garburator removed & very nice re-plumbing job done.  Thank you!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Good morning, Denise! Thank you so much for taking the time to leave Johnny a review and thank you again for choosing Ashton for your plumbing needs!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Johnny is just so detail oriented in taking care of my home.  He is 6 out of 5 stars.  I will definitely refer him to my family and friends.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you, Ed! 6/5 is what we love to hear! I will be sure to let Johnny know you left him a review!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Brent was fantastic!!  Talented and knowledgeable :)  We had a plugged kitchen sink on the garburator side, he taught my husband a trick of the trade in case it happens again.  Thank you so much for sending him, he s a great asset to your team & a pleasure to deal with.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you, Caryn! Brent was trilled to hear from you this morning! Thank yo again for choosing Ashton!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Carlos and Vinnie were both extra ordinarily competent, hard working professional and super nice to deal with. I was especially pleased with their neatness. They used their little vacuum to clean as they went.  They did a great job of cleaning everything up afterwards. They even cleaned the walls!!!!!  They also took time to explain to me how everything worked once the installation was complete,
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Shirley!  We love hearing from our clients and were so glad Vincent and Carlos were able to resolve your issues and do a little tidying up for you! Thank you again for choosing Ashton!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Johnny Bingham has repaired our sink and the service was awesome!  Explained everything clearly and solved our sink problem. Highly recommend Ashton services for everything!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Gjaymie! Thank you so much for the kind words! I will be sure to let Johnny know you left him a review =)

detailed_reviews.review_text: We have had a long and satisfying relationship with Ashton, not only for annual service to our furnace and hot water heater but also quick responses when needed for emergency situations.  Arranging an appointment for the annual service has always been easy and compliant with our own schedule. For this years pre-Fall service of our furnace, aged 13, George and Sean arrived on time, and started promptly.  Try as they both might from every angle over hours that extended beyond the usual time for such a service, they could not get the furnace to fire up; only the fan was working.  So, with great regret on their part, they spoke about and explained in detail various replacement options.  Ultimately, we arranged for the purchase and delivery of a new furnace.   Despite the severely bad news, we enjoyed having George and Sean in our home, and very much appreciated their hard work, professionalism, friendly interaction with us, and expertise. Service: Heating system maintenance
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Good morning Lynne, were so glad George and Sean were able to make the best out of an unfortunate situation with your furnace. Thank you for trusting Ashton with your home for so many years. Please do not hesitate to reach out to us if you have any questions. I will be sure to let George and Sean know what a great job they did for you!

detailed_reviews.review_text: I recently had my AC and furnace serviced by Shawn at Ashton s Plumbing and Heating. I was very impressed with both Shawn and the office staff. I spoke to both Brandon and Lindsay and they were very friendly and helpful. For each appointment they updated me on the Shawn s arrival time so that I was able to stay at work until Shawn was about 30 minutes away. Shawn did a thorough inspection of my AC and furnace and went over the results in detail. He also gave me information on your Maintenance Program which I signed up for. It s evident that Ashton s makes great customer service a priority! Thank you  I m very happy to have a company that I can rely on for future services.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Alison, I showed the office and Shawn your review, and they all want to say Thank you!. We appreciate you taking the time to leave us a review; it means a lot to us to hear from our customers. Were so glad Shawn was able to give your AC and furnace a tune-up to ensure working order. Thank you again for choosing Ashton!

detailed_reviews.review_text: I requested a service call for a low pressure water issue with our kitchen faucet. The plumber who came to our home was Johnny. He was prompt, courteous, very knowledgeable  and  professional. He even did an overall inspection of all of our faucets and prepared an invoice with three options so we could choose the service that best suited us. I appreciated the no- pressure and the peace of mind knowing I would not be billed until I gave the go ahead.  Ashton Plumbing has gained my full trust and I ll definitely be hiring them for  plumbing repairs or renos done in the future. Highly recommended!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Raj Lally, thank you for taking the time to leave Johnny a review! He was trilled to hear from you this morning. Were so happy he was able to provide you with a few options for your repair! Thank you again for choosing Ashton!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Outstanding! Arde our technician sales made an impression bye listening and educating us on our needs. He was previously an installer before moving into sales which made us more comfortable knowing he knew the technical side of it. Vinny, Connor and Eifion came to install our unit. Did a fantastic job with clean and precise workmanship. Shows they take pride in their craft. We would highly recommend Ashton and this team to anyone. The office staff was as equal. Overall cost, workmanship are exceptional!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Hiroko! We hope youre enjoying your new AC!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Called Ashton and set up an appointment to have someone come out to fix my kitchen faucet.  Got a call from the technician who had carefully reviewed my written concern about the low pressure for the cold water.  By asking quite specific questions, Carlos M was able to diagnose what needed to be done (new faucet) and rather than charging me to come out for an unproductive service call, he made suggestions about the best ways and brands to replace the faucet.  He also knew which faucet companies had the best warranties etc. It is reassuring as a homeowner to work with a company that has people who are both professional and honest.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Naomi, thank you so much for the glowing review for Carlos. He was beyond trilled to hear from you this morning and wanted to say Thank you!. Helping home owners during stressful times is out number one priority here at Ashton. Were so glad we could be of service!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Lindsay was excellent  for scheduling the service and after service follow up. Great customer service! I would return to this company thanks to her. Danny, technician was super excellent. Experienced and tried fix extra stuff for us. Super efficient with long time experience. He did the job in such a short amount of time. I would recommend this company. Thanks Lindsay and Danny!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Christine! Thank you very much for leaving some kind words for Danny and Lindsay! Were so proud of our office team and technicians! Thank you again for choosing Ashton!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Ashton installed a Mitsubishi heat pump and four units in our townhome. Mo Meherzad sold us the units and he was a delight to work with; he was very friendly and straight forward. He checked in on us throughout the installation and even afterwards, to make sure we were satisfied. Qasim Sarwar was our lead installer and he was great. He was a delight to have in our home each day: very friendly and hard working. Its a big job to install a heat pump in a townhome, because of all the shared walls and strata rules, but Ashton problem solved and made it work so we were happy with how it looked. Their customer service was top notch and everyone we dealt with was great. On top of that, the air pump works great so were happy customers!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Kerri! Thank you for the amazing review! Mo and the installation team were trilled to hear from you this morning, and were all so glad youre enjoying your brand new heat pump!

detailed_reviews.review_text: We had an urgent situation and our issue was diagnosed very quickly by Danny, who told us specifically what parts were required. Jerry then stepped in the very next day and did a speedy fix of our wall-hanging toilet. In the office, Carlos and Lindsay were helping to coordinate the whole thing. The team was able to understand the urgency of our matter and ensure that the job was completed on time and effectively. Thanks to everyone!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Good morning Demitri! Thank you for the review for Danny and Jerry!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Ashton has made me overcome my nervousness about plumbers.   Jason C has done excellent work here before, and today he and Johny Bingham handled some very old plumbing and got it all fixed up.  I appreciate their patience with an older home, their giving me the option of a higher quality product in fixtures and that they always cover their shoes in the house.  They are also patient in explaining things to this old lady.  Thank you Ashton.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much, Virginia! Were so glad Jason was able to put your nervousness at ease!

detailed_reviews.review_text: We hired Ashton to install a new furnace and AC system in our home last week.  After the initial phone call, they sent a sales associate (comfort advisor) to our home to look at and advise what would best suit our situation.  Our advisor Arde was very patient in explaining and addressing our needs and concerns, which was the main reason we decided to go with Ashton. At our install, the lead technician Bejan was very professional and did a top-notch job.  He and his team were able to troubleshoot challenges that came up and explained things to us every time we had a question or concern.  Throughout the entire project, Bejan was very detail-oriented and did the job the right way.  Everything was done to code (or better), no cutting corners. Overall, the service was excellent from start to finish.  Its only been a few days, but the system is working perfectly, as a brand new system should.  I also liked the fact that they give you the price upfront, with no hidden costs.  What I paid at the end was exactly what was quoted at the beginning.  I 100% recommend Ashton and would use them again in the future. Services: Heating system installation , Install thermostat
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, C Wu! On behalf of Ashton, I would like to express our sincere gratitude to you for purchasing a new air conditioning system from our company. Your trust in us is truly appreciated, and we are thrilled to have you as a valued customer. At Ashton, we take immense pride in delivering top-notch products and services to our clients, and your decision to choose us for your air conditioning needs reaffirms our commitment to excellence. We understand the importance of a well-functioning and efficient cooling system, especially during the warmer months, and we are dedicated to ensuring your complete satisfaction. Our team of experienced professionals is known for their expertise in providing high-quality installations. They strive to go above and beyond to ensure that your new air conditioning system is installed with precision, efficiency, and meticulous attention to detail. We believe that a properly installed system is essential for optimal performance and longevity, and we are committed to delivering the best possible results. If you have any questions or require any assistance regarding your new air conditioning system, please do not hesitate to reach out to our customer support team. We are here to provide you with continued support and address any concerns you may have.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Awesome team   from Mo, their Sales rep, Admin folks and Installers/Technicians! They are all very professional and they know their stuff really well. Thank you Ashton team for the excellent service!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Jen! We would like to express our sincere gratitude for taking the time to leave a review of your recent furnace and hot water heater installation. It was a pleasure serving you and we are thrilled to hear that you were satisfied with our services. At Ashton, we strive to deliver the highest level of service and quality workmanship to our customers. We are grateful for your trust in our team and we hope to continue to exceed your expectations in the future. If you have any further questions or concerns, please dont hesitate to reach out to us. We appreciate your business and your feedback.

detailed_reviews.review_text: I had Mo visit today to check on a broken fan belt in our furnace, and he was able to point out several problems with several different appliances that need to be addressed.  Mo was courteous, professional, and kindly explained in laymans terms what the situation is with our various issues.  Thank you, Mo, for being so kind, knowledgeable, and understanding!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Jenn! I was speaking to Mo this morning and he was so happy to see your review! Thank you so much for taking the time to give us some feedback!

detailed_reviews.review_text: We are in the process of getting a heat pump installed with Ashton. Mo, our advisor and point of contact has been fantastic and we are very impressed so far with the customer service. Mo initially gave us a quote for 2 systems, including $15,000 of rebates and coordinating the additional quotes for the electric panel upgrade to 200amp (which maybe required depending on the property) and drywall repair. We planned to chose the cheaper system but by the time we received the additional quotes and agreed to proceed the cheaper heat pump was on back order and one of the rebates was full subscribed. Ashton kindly agreed to supply the higher priced unit for no extra charge with an additional discount due to the unexpected sudden loss of the rebate. Mo was always contactable and answered all our questions. Ashton and Mo have given us exceptional service. We are currently having the heat pump installed and so we plan to write another review once complete. Update: 3 months after initial installation (July 2023) of the heat pump. Our electric upgrade has now completed. It took about 3 months due to technical reasons from BC hydro. Most of the delays were waiting for inspectors to review the electric upgrades during the process and BC being available within their 3 month predicted completion date. Over all we were very happy with both the electric up grade and heat pump. Ashton returned to our property to complete a final inspection of all the work done. We are now only waiting for the city to provide permits for all the work which we have been told can take several months. The quality of the workmanship has been excellent and on the whole Ashton remained quick to reply to questions/emails throughout. I would recommend using their services and will continue to use them in the future. Service: Heating system installation
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you, William! Were so glad Mo was able to get you the maximum rebates possible for your heat pump installation! Your comfort and enjoyment if your new AC is our number one priority for us; were trilled we were able to upgrade your system with no extra costs! Thank you again for choosing Ashton for your heat pump installation!

detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Tom, thank you for leaving Johnny a review! Thank you again for choosing Ashton, I will be sure to let Johnny know what a great job he did for you!

detailed_reviews.review_text: I used Ashton s recently for a follow up inspection after some recommendations for work we needed in our apartment. Dan came over, was super polite and open about everything that needed doing and our options. It was easy to trust his judgement and the quote came through 30 mins after he d left. Thanks!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you, Daniel! Were so glad Dan was able to assist you with your plumbing issues! Thank you again for choosing Ashton!

name: Yaletown Brewing Company
description: Bustling hangout offering house-brewed beers & a weekly small-batch tasting plus unique pub grub.
address: Yaletown Brewing Company, 1111 Mainland St, Vancouver, BC V6B 2T9

detailed_reviews.review_text: Travelling solo and they happily accommodated me in the pub area. I could have chosen the restaurant area as well if I wanted. They have an extensive beer menu (as you would expect). The food menu is also extensive with fairly typical food options for this type of establishment (burgers, wings, pizza, etc.). I had the 1/2 ribs and they were phenomenonal. The meat was super tender and just fell off the bone. What made the accompanying fries so good was a tomato/garlic dipping sauce, which was sublime. They should bottle and sell that stuff! Im not sure what the rest of the menu was like, but for the ribs alone its worth trying! The service as slick and professional. I could easily have stayed for a couple more beers if I wasnt fighting jetlag.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Adrian! Were very glad to see you enjoyed your stay with us, we agree the ribs are definitely worth stopping in for. We hope to see you next time youre in town!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Went there for the happy hour. Decent quality and our waiter was very friendly also beef brisket sandwiches was juicy and delicious.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Were glad to see you enjoyed your time, we cant we to see you again!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Best Eggs Benne ever! With the mouthwatering and melt on your mouth Brisket, ever.  Great service. The house beers are fantastic for someone looking for a light and refreshing thirst quencher. Try the Roundhouse wheat and the 604 Lager.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Great Photos! Glad to hear you enjoyed your morning with us, we hope to see you again soon!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Enjoyed a leisurely lunch with an amazing server who made the experience over the top. The server s name is Paul and what an outstanding individual! I have dietary concerns and Paul was able to answer my questions to ensure an enjoyable meal. I had the nachos and fried cauliflower with the YBC Sangria (read I had 3!). The food was delicious with generous portions. Thank you Paul for your hospitality, anyone in the area make sure to stop by and if you re lucky you will meet Paul!!!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: We are so happy you had a great experience.  Paul is truly a gem!  Hope to see you again soon.

detailed_reviews.review_text: If you go, I dont know if youre going to love it. What I can tell you is that when I went it was perfection. Yes, perfection. Ill tell you why. It was a chill weekend lunch and we stopped by for just a burger, lager and a small appetizer. Our server (Sally) was absolutely lovely. She waited on us hand and foot and did it with a smile the entire time, and she had other tables and watching her conduct herself with such quality consistency was refreshing. So, thats for the service. Now the food. The YBC Cheeseburger was everything I look for in a cheeseburger. Juicy, well-seasoned, smart ingredient proportionality and it was actually hot when it arrived, which very rarely happens with burger dishes. Burgers arriving at the table hot is like a Unicorn....no, Ive never seen a Unicorn, but you know what I mean.... The fries...well..the fries were everything a fry should be. It was crispy on the outside, cooked with quality oil and steaming hot and flakey on the inside while you bit in and seasoned just right. Technically it was a perfect serving of fries and it tasted absolutely amazing. Honestly, I was almost going to order a second serving of just fries, but you know.....calories and all that... The Fish tacos for once were cooked the way they are supposed to be cooked if youre not trying to rip your guests off. Perfect ratio of batter and fish, which means you tasted the beautiful juicy cod as the primary source of flavour while the batter complimented and served as a finish to its protein counterpart. Oh!....and it was so very fresh! The lager was yummy, they make their own stuff and I had a second one. I think youll have a great experience. Id be surprised if you dont. They cant be this good and be inconsistent.
Beer, chowder, poutine, and salmon burger. Absolutely fabulous! Good service and great location/atmosphere.  Would gladly go again.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Great photos Janice! We hope to see you again.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Large drink and food menus. We tried the fried pickles, seafood salad and pad Thai, everything was really tasty! Our server was really attentive and very personable. The prices are a little high but I think that s becoming normal. There is plenty of seating both inside and out and the patio looks out on Mainland Street in Yaletown which has lots of activity and is really beautiful. We went for dinner at 7 PM and at about 8 PM the music got pretty loud but it did add to the ambiance. I noticed that they also had a kids menu too! Which is actually pretty rare for this area.

We were happy to be able to sit outside and enjoy the weather and there was no wait. Loved my flight of beer and the pretzel appetizer. My son ordered the mac and cheese and it was very cheesy. the burger was well done as per BC rules and the pulled pork sandwich was moist and flavorful. Our server was very friendly and our meals were brought out promptly.

Great little place for a Saturday night beer and dinner. Welcoming atmosphere and decent service. They re part of dine out VANCOUVER but wasn t feeling the menus. The boneless dry ribs were awesome, and my main was the Tokyo with steak instead of salmon. Really tasty. Had the muffin dessert which was rich but flavourful. Will be visiting again.

Our favourite beer and burgers place in Vancouver. Especially when we can sit on the patio. The staff is friendly, the beer really good and there is a wide variety of food options. try the nachos! Usually we could get a seat within just a few minutes of wait, even during rush hour!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Andre! We appreciate your kind words and Were glad to hear you enjoyed your time with us. We cant wait to serve you next time!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Visited during the happy hour and tried raspberry wheat ale which was amazing. Service was amazing and cost was reasonable.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Glad you stopped by and enjoyed a fresh beer!  Hope to see you again soon.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Nice environment and tasty foods with polite staffs.   Special thanks to  Justine  and  Danilo
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the shout out!  Justine and Danilo are fantastic!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Amazing experience and great, polite and attentive service. Everything was just perfect, we tried all the beers, all were $7.25. There is a great variety for everybody. We had cheeseburger, Mac n cheese and 4 cheese pizza, all great. Mac n cheese could be a bit improved. Happy hours are every day from 2PM to 5PM and all beers are for $5 during this time.

My favourite bar in Yaletown by the Roundhouse. Excellent home crafted beers such as the Roundhouse Wheat. Great food too. Amazing Salmon Chowder soup! The Singapore noodle bowl is very good. The Halibut burger is good. The pretzel is great with homemade white beer cheese. Their pizzas are amazing. Sunday night is $10 pizzas and $5 beers.

Great place to spend an evening with friends: excellent service, very friendly staff, tasty drinks and pizza for a reasonable price. We played pool, had fun and at the end of the evening I got a pleasant surprise - my ginger ale was on the house!

We are brewery people and love to try new places being from Minneapolis we are spoiled. I was impressed with the atmosphere at This brewery with a good selection of food and beers, it was worth the stop. It s a must stop for craft brewery folks like us.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks so much for checking us out!  Hope to see you again.

detailed_reviews.review_text: I am on my honeymoon in Vancouver. Justine our server was so happy and cheerful. She made us feel at home.  She introduced herself and made our experience so delightful. The food ?!  Oh my goodness.  Let s just say, I couldn t move because I ate the appy s so fast. It was that delicious. My newly wed wife and I had the nachos.   and the fish   tacos  . So Nicely done. We had these appy s from other places.  This place however, in my opinion was thee best. Guy the manager very kind. I requested something and he happily helped out and made my newly wed wife and my experience here a great one. Thank you so much we will come Back again. Until next time vancouver.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Michael thank you so much for the review.  We completely agree that Justine is a great server, Gui is a fantastic manager and we think our food is pretty delicious too.  Looking forward to seeing both of you again.   Congratulations on the nuptials!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Popped in for a few bevvies- hit the 8:30 pm happy hour  yay! The pub side is really hip and bumping but there isn t table service. Being the diva that I am went to the restaurant side and really lucked out with my server Lauren. Absolute sweetheart. Great vibe and teamwork, you can see the staff really enjoy each other and their jobs!!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Celisha, it was an absolute pleasure to serve you. We will pass along your kind message to Lauren and our team. Please visit us again soon!

detailed_reviews.review_text: From the decoration to the service everything is impeccable. If you go there (you really should), try their seasonal beers, theres at least one great surprise. I had the It was all about the dream I think, and it is and ale made of mango, passion fruit and coconut and it was delightful. I also had the poutine withe smoked chicken and this blew my mind: Ive never tasted a smoked chicken this rich and juicy before, a must. The place is so beautiful and well taken care it feels like home. Do not miss it!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Were very glad to see you enjoyed your time. We agree the smoked chicken is one of our favorites, and stay tuned we have plenty more seasonal beers on the way!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great Beers, nice atmosphere and great location. Food is pretty good too. Reasonable Happy hour pricing.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for joining us!

detailed_reviews.review_text: One of the all time favorite in Yaletown. Always reliable service and quality of food. Great happy hours menu. Lots patio seating to enjoy Vancouvers summer.

Very nice place, super spacious, with a large outdoor heated patio, super friendly quick service, great food. Open till about 1 am, last call at 10 pm. Pretty much always have seating available, just a normal regular bar that has enough room for big groups.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Iya, cant wait to have you back for another safe and fun visit! Cheers.

detailed_reviews.review_text: The seats were uncomfortable, but the staff was so friendly. And I love this restaurants pizza!! I recommend you to come at happy hours.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank On Ki! Were glad to see you enjoyed your pizza, we cant wait to see you next time for Happy Hour.

detailed_reviews.review_text: The food and the service were great. The waitress was so nice. The bowls  sizes were super generous so we ended up having only one appetizer for the table.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for stopping by Mina! Were so glad to hear that you enjoyed your experience. The 5 stars are much appreciated. Hope to see you again soon.

detailed_reviews.review_text: It has both a Restaurant and Pub side so has a little something for everyone. I had the loading Bay IPA and Beer pretzels which were both tasty.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for joining us Braden.  We agree, the Beer Pretzel and Loading Bay IPA are a perfect pairing.  Hope to see you again!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Loved happy hour prices, the server we had was absolutely delightful, and the food was awesome, and the beet was delicious!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Were very happy to see you enjoyed your time with us, cant wait to see you again for another Happy Hour!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Nice thin crust pizza, with fresh toppings and amazing flavours.  Fresh beer on tap goes nicely with their pizzas.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5 stars Kevin, we miss you. Hope to see you again soon!

detailed_reviews.review_text: This is such a great spot to grab a beer and some delicious food. This brewpub has it all, from a fantastic selection of beers brewed in-house to a menu with delicious options. But what really sets Yaletown Brewing Co. apart is the incredible service provided by their staff. When we were planning a large group gathering, we reached out to the restaurant for help with reservations. Anushree and Natasha went above and beyond to ensure that our experience was smooth and stress-free. They were friendly, responsive, and accommodating, and we couldnt have been happier with their service. When we arrived, we were greeted warmly and shown to our tables promptly. The atmosphere was lively and inviting, and the menu offered something for everyone. We sampled a few of the brews on tap, and they were all so good. Overall, we had a wonderful experience at Yaletown Brewing Co., and were grateful to Anushree and Natasha for making it all possible. We highly recommend this establishment to anyone looking for a great meal and a great time in Vancouver!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank You very much Lisa, were very glad to hear everything went smooth, stress-free and everyone had fun. As always its a lovely pleasure to have you and your group join us. We agree the food, beer and staff here are all amazing. We look very forward to your next visit with us!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Amazing accommodating service when less busy. Grabbed food after a rainy Sun Run and they had blankets, dry complimentary t-shirts, and orange slices ready for us at our table! Very flexible with our changing numbers as people arrived. Lovely team service and felt very taken care of!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Were very glad to hear your group enjoyed your time with us post-sun run. Our service team looks forward to seeing you again, perhaps next marathon.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great downtown location.  Surprised that they had paella expecting just bar food fare.  Not a lot of beer on tap selection but what they had was great.  Good place to start your pub crawl as they re all lined up next to each other in Yaletown.
Its an absolute star and one of the best in Vancouver. We tried garlic fries, it was so tasty. They have a beautiful environment and very friendly staff. I cant wait to go there again.
Excellent service, and top notch food. Good size portion! Everyone was really friendly, and the kitchen staff were on point! Highly recommend!

detailed_reviews.reviewer_name: Parkview Dental Vancouver and Implant Center
detailed_reviews.review_text: Pizzas are great, beers are awesome and great service always
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Those are some great photos! Were glad to see you enjoyed your time with us, and we cant wait to serve you again!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Amazing service. Try 604 Lager, you wont be disappointed. And definitely try parmesian garlic fries with it.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for coming by!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Came in tonight for some drinks with friends and I received the BEST service I have ever had from Broghan and Jamie. Jamie made us the most delicious drinks we have ever had (his green tea shots are SUPERIOR)! Broghan had the best attitude and gave us such amazing and genuine service. Best place to come- if you re not here, it s your loss!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Sara! Hope you visit us again!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Love the IPA s at this place. I have been here before and the food is very good. It has a neat vibe especially on a sunny afternoon. Service was excellent and follow up was nice, timely but not overbearing.
Yealtown Brewing is good spot to hang out with friends. The beer is good. The food was good. The waitresses are nice and friendly. Toilet is clean. A good experience.

** UPDATE ** After a speedy response from management we were promptly invited back and overall had an amazing experience with great food, drinks, and above and beyond service! Aisha and Tristen were professional and accommodating, and we couldn t be happier with the overall experience. Updated our rating accordingly. ** We ate at this establishment last night and will not be returning. If I could give zero stars I would. TL;DR: Extremely poor management, unclear billing, and poor treatment of staff! Ill start this off by saying our server was extremely sweet and none of this review is to reflect her in anyway. I called roughly an hour before to try and book a reservation, but was told they do not do same day reservations, but they accept walk ins. Ok no problem. So I asked if it was currently busy and if there would be a long wait to which I was told, I dont know, I cant tell you. Followed by the hostess hanging up on me. Fast forward an hour and there was less than 7 tables occupied in the entire restaurant when we arrived. We were seated outside next to one of their growler displays and while we were waiting for our food I noticed a live mouse running inside the glass display. Not the prettiest sight to see before eating your meal, however, the waitress moved us tables without any hesitation. Secondly, my girlfriend wished to substitute chicken instead of steak in her dish, which was confirmed as not a problem by the kitchen for a small upcharge. Little did we know that small upcharge was $9.44 for 4 THIN STRIPS of a chicken breast on top of the $24 original bowl price. See attached photo and try and find the entire chicken breast. Lastly, after our bill had come to $150, the manager had brought out our to go food order, and we asked a question regarding the cost for chicken, to which she rudely replied we do not do substitutions so we have to upcharge to make it work. Is chicken not cheaper than steak? If anything this establishment just saved money by giving chicken instead of steak as the protein in this meal. Furthermore, we ordered two orders of their honey siracha wings,  one came to $17.85 and the other $15.27, why you might ask? No one knows. Seeing that my girlfriend was rightfully annoyed by this, the manager said she would be right back. A few moments later our waitress came back to us with $10 cash and apologized for her mistake. What mistake you might ask? Your guess is as good as mine, but if you ask management it was probably the servers mistake not telling us there would be a $10 upcharge on the meal. To which my girlfriend asked her did they make you give us this money out of your own pocket? and the waitresses response was less than lack luster. Well... yes but it was my fault. We insisted that she keep the $10 because thats absurdly ridiculous of management to make the waitress pay out of her own pocket for that. If the billing and rude manager wasnt reason enough for us not to return, the way management treated our waitress and forced her to pay out of her own pocket was the deciding factor. We will not be returning.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for taking our call to talk through your experience Brandon. Were delighted that youll be making a reservation with us soon. We truly appreciate guest feedback and an opportunity to improve: looking forward to earning 5 stars next time! Cheers! UPDATE: Hi Brandon, Thanks for the updated review. We appreciate you coming back in and giving us the opportunity to give you the proper 5 star experience. It was great to put a face to a name. Hope to see you again next time youre in town!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Cant wait to visit again. Sadly not catching Happy hours but still worth going. Totally worth it!

Great place for beers and good food, casual restaurant atmosphere. Make sure you go to the pub side if you want to enjoy happy hour though as its not available in the restaurant side. The appetizers change often and they are certainly worth it. Highly recommend this place, its never disappointed us in the dozen or so times we have been.
Great place to grab beer. Smooth lager, get their flight to try various beers. Raspberry wheat ale was quite good.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for stopping by!  The Raspberry Wheat Ale is one of our favourites.  Glad you enjoyed it.  Hope to see you again soon.

detailed_reviews.review_text: If I were to open a brewpub I would copy this one. Comfortable wood-and-leather atmosphere, a pool table, and big enough but not too big. The bar side is especially cozy and inviting (but see below). Consistently great service and eight tasty home brews. One complaint: all the tables on the bar side are high-chair style. Uncomfortable for most people and impossible for wheelchairs.

Excellent quality of pizza.  halft beer selection rotate oftens, but therell probably be at least one you like. The pizza and beer deal on Sundays is worth making a trip for. Saturday nights for Canucks games are fun too.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Jas, Thanks for the great review, we truly appreciate it! All the best, Shane Dembiske General Manager Yaletown Brewing Co.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Good beer, great food! The soft pretzel was amazing, I tried at least 3 or 4 on vacation and this was by far the best one. I got one of the happy hour pizzas and it was absolutely massive for around $16. Will definitely be back when I m in town!
Awesome pub!  Came for happy hour pizza and beer. Both were excellent! Friendly staff and clean facilities.
Hands down, the best wings I have ever had. Tons of brews on tap, and huge spacious interior with all the tvs to watch your sport on. Go for the wings, stay for the beer.

Very convenient spot close to the middle of Yaletown, with outdoor seating and a huge indoor space (top and bottom levels). Anyway, the brewery is pretty cool, the beer selection enormous and the staff gorgeous. I had my first lunch here after restaurants are opened again for dine in. Normally I m not really into pub food but honestly I haven t have anything as good as the food here for awhile. Wait time was short, excellent food too. Plus the atmosphere is very cozy

Great food, lively atmosphere and delicious beers.... what more could you ask?? Oh yeah, waitstaff that know the menu and treat you like youre part of the family...gotta love it!  Highly recommend the Mumbai wings and the potato skins. Mac and cheese: delish!
The STEAK SALAD (I order it WITHOUT the BBQ sauce) is BY FAR the best salad I have ever eaten. Extremely fresh with the perfect mix of ingredients and the perfect dressing. I am addicted!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks so much for the kind review Trina! Cheers, Shane Dembiske General Manager Yaletown Brewing Co.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Attentive staff, generous portions, good beer (almost as good as Australian beer), and lovely food. Highly recommended.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Peter! Were very happy to see you enjoyed your time with us, and yes Australian Beer holds a little place in our hearts too.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Excellent selection of Brew. Must have the Tempura Asparagus Apps. Over the top tender. GreAt vibe and if the weather is nice sit outside.
Had a beer and poutine at Happy Hour. Good snack to split, if your looking to stop in for a quick brew.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Matthew! Glad to hear you enjoyed your time with us, we cant wait to serve you again.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Had a nice  dinner at the pub. Ordered Butter chicken and garlic fries which were simply amazing! Anny was super friendly and helpful. Had a really good time. Will definitely visit again when i am back in Vancouver.
Friendly staff! Speed of service was good, I liked the beer options.

Great service and food is always really good! Usually we pick patio but when colder then prefer the leather seating :) It does takes awhile for food to arrive, but it s totally worth it. On the downside, we used to see the magician a while back and he d keep us and kids entertained while waiting for food, but we haven t seen him lately
Had a couple seasonal beers at the pub side and they were really good. The service was good as well. Would come back.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: We are so glad you enjoyed our service! We look forward to serving you again.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Came here today with my boyfriend for supper and the food was delicious! I had the YBC Cheeseburger and he doesn t remember the exact name of his but said it was something like BBQ brisket sandwich. Anyway, both were delicious and the food also came out extremely quickly! We had a great experience!! We were also surprised that they were able to fit us in on such short notice (we were walkins) but they sat us right on the patio and we got immediate service. Amazing job!!
Great place,great atmosphere,good food. Thanks to our waitress Kayla, we got the best,friendliest, professional service. Made our experience so great. Looking forward to her smiling face again.
Exemplary service+++. The food choices were extensive for my taste and I was pleased to be able to have a half flight tasting.
Delicious food and good service! Lots outdoor seating.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for coming down to enjoy the food and the sunshine with us Tiffany! Have a great day!

detailed_reviews.review_text: The food was delicious, I had the meatloaf and the kids loved the mac and cheese. Tasty beers as well. Noisy inside, but great on the patio.
I come here quite often to have a drink with some friends. I love their reisling and recently tried their ceaser! The ceaser was exactly how I like it! I was so impressed :)
Good spot for drinks, live DJ on Fridays. We sat on the patio with our party for drinks, it was warm with their patio heaters, good vibes!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Were very happy to hear you enjoyed your night with us. Well see you next time for more good vibes!

detailed_reviews.review_text: I came here on a reservation with a group of friends on a friday night. The server was fantastic and would come to our table s regularly. The food and drinks came out fantastic!

Hubby and I came by here.. We had excellent beers and the service was very good. Our gal had the coolest green / blue hair, and was honestly run off her feet with the whitecaps game , but she never missed a beat and kept smiling and being polite. Definitely will come back
Great food, great service! Love their smoked brisket sandwich!!!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your patronage, Elisabeth. Cheers,

detailed_reviews.review_text: Surprising smooth local rye from Yaletown brewing. Cool stuff, wish they would ship to Toronto!
Friendly staff, good food and drinks. Nice interior.
It was a beautiful day on their patio.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: We agree! Beautiful weather is finally here which means well see you on the next sunny day.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Best fried pickles I have had in my entire life and a delicious pitcher of beer.
Great beers, service and food.

Vaccine checked at the door. My wife and I sat on the patio. My wife had fish tacos and I had the cheeseburger. Great tasting meals. Very good service. Servers were all friendly and talkative.we would recommend this restaurant.  We will return ourselves.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your attention to detail John, we appreciate your 5 stars!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great tasting beers and food was good too
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for coming by and visiting us!  Hope to see you again soon.

detailed_reviews.review_text: We sat on the pub side and must say the service and the food was amazing, my wife and i had the wings and must say they are amazing. The beer is also good i had the ipa and my wife the lager.
Great Lamb burger and the fresh brewed beer was good.
Amazing service and nice atmosphere.  Great brews. I hear the food is pretty good but I did not taste it.

Vanessa was an amazing hostess, she accommodated us with such ease on a busy night. We came in last minute and did everything she could to help us get a table. So glad to come in on a night when she was working because she made the night so much better!! Daniel was also a great server and so professional and nice! Overall the night was made so much better from both of them! Can t wait to come back and see them both again. Thanks for making our night!!
Perfect for them vegan tasty Its fun to sit down and eat there Great music In short she strongly recommends
Food was excellent, service was very quick. Nice atmosphere.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Were glad to hear you enjoyed yourself! We cant wait to see you soon!

detailed_reviews.review_text: I feel like home, its a perfect place to go alone or with friends. I love my Porter beer, was delicious.

We came in for drinks after work one day.  The beer was great - easy drinkers.   We had to get a bigger table because more people were joining us, and the staff was very accommodating - they didn t even care that we  were holding empty seats for a while.   I found it bizarre that happy hour specials only applied to the pub side and not the restaurant.  I would definitely come back as it s a good place to go with a crowd.

Really enjoyed my experience at Yaletown Brewing! We got a nice spot on the patio. Service was prompt and our server was so delightful. (He apologized about it being slow but we did not find it slow!) I had the spritz beer cocktail which was a refreshing change. Ordered some sliders, pickles, and a pretzel to share. All were very delicious. My friend said that they were some of the best deep fried pickles shes ever had.
Very welcoming staff, nice atmosphere,  good food
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Andre! We hope to see you again soon.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great time here. Friendly service even though the restaurant was packed on a Saturday night. Came late for drinks and snacks, good selection of both. The wings were so good!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the amazing feedback Iris! We take a lot of pride in our  24 hour Southern buttermilk marinated, fresh cooked wings - so glad you enjoyed them! Cheers.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Very good food and service. Tasty brews.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the awesome review Miguel, we really appreciate it! Cheers, Shane Dembiske General Manager Yaletown Brewing Co.

detailed_reviews.review_text: 4 of us came for dinner on September 13, and 2 of our 4 entrees werent fully cooked (the rice was hard and stale). We told our server and within seconds the Manager that night, Eric, came and apologized and offered to make us new dishes right away. We put in new orders and had them served to us super quick. Eric and our server apologized again and made sure our meals were what we wanted. Cheers to the team for excellent customer service! Oh and the food was really good too!

UPDATE (5 stars): Well that was totally unexpected. I was given an email to make a claim, and I was promised I would get refunded in the coming days after I contacted them. I decided to change my review to 5 stars because there was nothing wrong with the beers and more importantly, not many restaurant do a follow up with their clients to make amend. It felt good to know someone somewhere is listening. ORIGINAL (1 Star): We had beer only and realized after I got home I was charged a Moscow Mule by server with initial B. Make sure you check your bill before you leave the restaurant. Lesson learned.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Kel, were sorry to hear about this mistake. Please contact tristen.gosselin@mjg.ca at your convenience so that we can make it right! Cheers.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Ive got a few food allergies and going out to eat can be such a chore sometimes! The staff here were so attentive to my dietary needs, and the food was delicious. Great service all around, thank you!

Its funny, I only gave this place 3 stars because it was last year after covid and their happy hour wasnt tops. Much better now!! Service was awesome, few more specials, and the happy hour fish tacos are drool- worthy. Well done!!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Rob, thank you for your review. We will definitely review our specials/happy hour program and I appreciate any and all feedback. Thank you, Shane Dembiske General Manager Yaletown Brewing Co.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Service was a little slow to start, but was made up for and all was very good.
THE BRUNCH WAS SO AMAZING, I NEVER HAD THESE EXPERIENCE BEFORE, THE KITCHEN STAFF ITS AMAZING

We went here for my friends birthday and had a great time.  The servers were helpful with suggestions for drinks and even brought out a little cake with a candle.  We were outside on the patio which was heated - the heaters were making weird noises which sounded kind of scary, maybe look into those.  Overall would recommend it, fun environment, laid back and good food as well

Visually appealing restaurant & bar with excellently diverse appetizers and drinks. Went here before a hockey game wearing the opponents sweater and it was a fantastic time. Highly recommend if you are in the area looking for a nice drink or good pub food.

We came in for a 25th birthday dinner. Nathan, our sever was beyond amazing. Drinks were flowing, food was perfectly on time AND delicious. Whole night was was wonderfully set up, and extremely accommodating. Thank you for making our experience top notch Nathan. Would recommend to anyone who enjoys great food, and excellent service.
Great food and service. Thank you Cody, great experience!!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Benedicto! Cheers.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Came here before the Foo Fighters show for dinner and drinks and some pool. Great service, friendly staff and good food. Had the Backyard Burger, it was super tasty especially with the bacon and cheddar - definitely recommend.
The food is really good, it s definitely worth the price.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Joachim! We hope to serve you again soon.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great beer, good service, reasonable prices. Didnt try the food because of previous reviews.
Great food, great service!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for taking the time to provide us with your feedback Sheyma: YOU are great too! :)

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great food and staff with exceptional music! DJ Peppermint spins on Saturdays, and you cant get my girlfriends and I off the dance floor!!! Its our favourite spot in Yaletown. Check it out!

name: Parallel 49 Brewing Company
description: Brewery with a low-key tasting room offering its craft beer on tap, plus bar bites & growler fills.
address: Parallel 49 Brewing Company, 1950 Triumph St, Vancouver, BC V5L 1K5

detailed_reviews.review_text: East Vancouver brewery. Came here for a work function to sample their beers. The location is off the beaten path. Great selections of beers. Spacious bar with seating inside and outside. Open and bright. Staff is very friendly, great place to hang out and sample different types of beers.

Been drinking there beer for while and just discovered the actual brewery today. It s quite a cool setup . Huge indoor outdoor patio beer hall setup. Indoor food truck if you get hungry. Quite a good food selection as well! I would highly recommend this one to add to you easy van brewery tour!
The beer and the food was great. I tried lager and veterinarian burger with fries which both were awesome. The atmosphere is good especially outside!

Trash Panda (TP) is without a doubt my favorite beer. So, whenever I am in Vancouver, I visit Parallel 49 for a flight or two and a pint of the TP. (I even embroidered a shirt with the TP logo). Aside from anywhere up to 36 different beers on tap (as far as I counted), they have a food truck INSIDE the taproom for a quick snack, and their patio is dog friendly. A note though that the neighborhood is questionable so go with a group.

Honestly, Im surprised by the ratings. The last time I visited Vancouver, I skipped this brewery as others were rated higher.  This brewery should be rated higher,  in my opinion.  We had two flights after trying to pick from the 40 beers (all but cider brewed by them). The flights were great. The spot had plenty of seating and some skinny chicken wings, but dont let that discourage you. The sweet and spicy rub were bomb. Ended up, walking away with a mix pack and the yummy torque IPA. A new must try for our Vancouver trips

Although parallel 49th isnt in the most glamorous location for food, the place itself is pretty wonderful if you need a place for a large group and good beer. You should know that you must first order your food and drink before sitting down. Food is best ordered to share, even though the portion sizes arent the biggest, they arent the smallest either, nor are they the best presented dishes. For a brewery, this place has a decent kitchen, mostly fried offerings.  Where they really excel, is the choice and quality of beer! They definitely have something for every beer lover in terms of flavors. I typically like to sit on their outdoor patio, but the inside of the building is also a great spot to hang out. Overall, if you have a large group of people and want to catch up, this place will seat you almost immediately and will feed everyone, within a reasonable budget.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Pat! We are glad to hear the positive feedback.

detailed_reviews.review_text: One of the original (and still great) independent craft breweries in Vancouver. Fantastic selection of beer, plus some non-beer adult beverage and non-alcoholic options.  Full food menu also. And a great patio / beer garden space (perfect for a few sunny afternoon/evening pints!).
What a great afternoon/evening there. The beers were great, so many different varieties and great food to soak it all up.

Very good memories, the beautiful girl told me that this small tray tasting combination is called FLIGHT, and recommend deep fried chicken wings, simple seasoning with salt and black pepper, but very delicious. The price is also very friendly.

This place is awesome! Were sitting at a table where the rolling garage style doors go up and connect to the patio. The atmosphere is minimal but comfortable. The street kitchen tap menu is pretty cool looking. It reminds me of the signs when youre at the airport and looking at all of the flight info. The washrooms have cool bright graffiti painted on the walls. Theyre baby friendly and have high chairs that are tall like a high chair for a bar. The drinks are great and the food was just as good. Definitely recommend and will come back!

The spicy chicken burger is insanely drooooolllllll I am obsessed!!!! I also love that IPA it has a snake on it it s like  cobra  something(I always tell my husband I want the snake bite lol but I think it s called cobra something(it is 8% and he thinks it isn t tasty but one gets you tipsy and I love it!!)

Showed up here at the suggestion of a friend, and it did not disappoint. Getting there through the hell that is East Hastings was well worth it. Nice outdoor patio, and they had an octoberfest patio going too. Inside, at least 20 taps, ranging from cocktails and seltzers, and a slew of different beers. Clearly something for everyone. Nice choice of food too, made to order in a food truck tucked inside. We really liked it here.

Ive been here a few times now, and some things have been true every time: the staff is super-friendly. The service is fantastic. The food is amazing. If you like beer, this is one of the places to be. And the kicker: they allow dogs, at least on the patio. Highly recommended.

The vibe inside was great- good music and fun atmosphere with the food truck inside. It felt very safe as there are plexiglass dividers between each table. The beer flight was great and the root beer had a really unique flavour. For food, we ordered the turkey poutine, which was absolutely delicious, and the tater tots, which were perfectly crisped.

Started out our walking brewery tour here since it was one of the only places in the area with food too. I m so happy we did because it was delicious. We had the fried chicken sandwich and Impossible burger. Great ambiance with heaters on the patio. And of course tasty beers with a HUGE selection.

A not so well-kept secret among craft beer drinkers. Tucked away deep in the old industrial area, Parallel 49 is an oasis with a spacious beer garden that might even make a German miss home a little less. Trust that you will find an innovative beer menu in addition to the common staples that arguably are starting to show their age. Despite its name, the Filthy dirty is a well-balanced North West style IPA that is a solid choice for hop heads. However, should the seasonal Cobra Clutch still be on tap, why would you order anything else? It is a masterpiece and on its own merits the trek. Oh, and the food is pretty decent, too.

07/2021 Update - Came here again for beers and wings on the patio. Love their wings! I had the salt and pepper flavor but tried the Montreal Steak seasoning too. Both were really yummy! Beer selection was good but the root beer was so delicious!! We stopped here at the beginning of a brewery tour. We also had lunch to start our day. Great beers! Huge selection and so many great options. My fave was the Scot....caramel flavours and very smooth. For lunch we tried the wings and tacos. Everything was outstanding. Loved the salt and vinegar wings. They were so different and yummy. The poutine was also delicious. Great fries. Lots of seating. Open and comfortable area to enjoy drinks. Very nice staff.

Delicious beer and food, not too sure what people mean by overpriced? $20 for a burger and fries is pretty standard. It s $15 at McDonalds down the street. Service was great, it s very self serving though. Grab your own beer, get your own water etc. I prefer that.

Vibes were so on point here. Yay: - I liked the amount of seating, as well as stools that are not too high for kids or shorties like me & had back rests (it s the little things). - Loved the splashes of colour! - Food truck kitchen was so awesome & exciting for my kids. - The food was delicious! We loved the herby, garlicky pretzel, poutine, and tater tots. Was nice to see kid-friendly options. - So many options of drinks! - Lots of free street parking - Cider enthusiast option: Blueberry Jelly Monster was the closest thing. Yum! Boo: - Zero cider options!!! BAH - Muddlers: served in a mason jar with ice!!! Ahhhh. I can t drink it fast enough for the drink not to get all watered down. You gotta chug it so it doesn t get gross. I couldn t even finish it. Blagh. Tip: Maybe frost the glass instead, lose the ice. Maybe add a lemon slice or something? - Servers weren t so friendly  or are they not allowed to speak to patrons/have friendly conversation?? If so, disregard this last comment! >_< All-in-all, I would maybe go back if they had even one yummy cider option. The food is definitely yummy.
