Nice selection of food, great quality. The staff were very friendly and helpful. We took the kids and they loved the food too. Well be back next time were in the area.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the great review James! Wed be happy to host you and your family anytime :)

detailed_reviews.review_text: This place is a gem. Great service, great food (the garlic fries and the BLT are amazing) and the beer is super delicious. Great patio. Parking lot is a bit tight, great bicycle parking.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the in-depth review Drew! Glad you enjoyed yourself, hope to see you back again soon!

detailed_reviews.review_text: A great place to have a beer and some pub food. The live band was really good too! Shout out to the bathrooms that look like fuel pumps. Lots of seating and tasty beer here.
Never even realized that I liked beer until a came here. The bartender J.R. (I think?) let me sample a few of his favourite beers and I loved them all. Food is good too. Definitely coming back.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for stopping by to test drive our beers, Logan. We really appreciate the 5 star review. We look forward to impressing you again. Cheers!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Their traditional beers are very good and the new flavors that they released for the summer are good too.  I recommend this place to enjoy the beers and the food.  excellent atmosphere and good service.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for stopping by and sharing your wonderful feedback.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Recently purchased the Red Trucker variety pack and was really pleased with this purchase. Some of the finest beers I have tasted over the years. Will definitely be a repeat customer....cheers
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Cheers for the awesome review and we are glad you enjoyed our delicious beers.

detailed_reviews.review_text: The beer and food is excellent. We will be going back
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Sheila!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Good beer. Great patio. Food is just ok. But they have a happy hour on growler fills from 4-6 everyday...$2 off
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Jarrod, glad you enjoyed your beer. Which was your favourite?!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Love this place! The foods great and the beers are wonderful. The Baja beer is definitely worth a try.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for your comments and for being a fan! We appreciate you taking the time to post your review! Cheers.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Amazing food and fantastic beer! The atmosphere is very inviting, open and bright. Thank you!
Terrific microbrew - great selection of beers and good food. Really nice employees!
I went here for an event and this place is great. The staff have us a tour of the brewery as well as its story and it was quite interesting. Beer was also really tasty
this place is great. the staff are great. the food is great. the beer is great. they also follow COVID protocol to a T and you feel safe there.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Joel.  It has been a priority for us to ensure all guests and customers are kept safe during this time, but can still enjoy a great atmosphere and experience.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Beer 4.5/5, Food 5/5, Atmosphere 4/5. A bit overdone in the Truck theme, but lots of seating and one of the best burger and beer combos in the city.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: We love our trucks! Thanks for the review Tim, hope to see you again soon.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great beer, great food. Lots of limited special edition beers on tap. Great people working there too, its fun.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Nathan! Love the feedback!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Excellent Beer and the food is great.
Best place for a flight of beer and food!

name: Strathcona Beer Company
description: Ultra-modern, industrial setting for pairing house-brewed craft beers with pizza.
address: Strathcona Beer Company, 895 E Hastings St, Vancouver, BC V6A 1R8

detailed_reviews.review_text: Awesome microbrewery with a great vibe to it. Beers were delicious with a good mix of your classics (Lager, Pilsner IPA etc) and some more experimental flavours too. I had the Mac n cheese which was delicious. Staff were fantastic good knowledge and happy to give tasters to help you decide which beer to have. 10/10 would recommend :)

Dog-friendly patio with delicious beer and pizza. We started with an order of poutine that was loaded with delicious gravy and perfectly cheesy curds. The beet salad was so fresh and light on a warm day and the margarita pizza was lovely. The crust had a wonderful flavor and was cooked to perfection. All of the beers we had were light but very flavorful. Would definitely visit here again.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you kindly!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Get the flight! Good place to hang out and try out all the beer. The pizza was very good also.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Don!!!

detailed_reviews.review_text: We tried to have lunch here, but on a Monday they were out of meatballs and salads and the poutine was sadly wayyyy too healthy (thus way too un-poutine). Other than that there were many beers, they are open early, beer tasted super fresh, they have craft sodas available and the seats are comfortable.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Haha. Healthy Poutine. It exists!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great atmosphere and amazing pizza. Definitely will be back for more!! Thank you Food : 5/5
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you!!!

detailed_reviews.review_text: This place rocks. Long tables that are good for larger groups, great mainstay beers with a few experimental ones. Good pizza and dinner choices with a couple legit salad options. Staff are fantastic and social. Can get busy fast. Vegetarian options: The salads are the bomb Kid-friendliness: Well behaved kids are welcome.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Cheers Mike!

detailed_reviews.review_text: My husband and I hosted an event at Strathcona the day before our wedding last month, and it could not have gone more wonderfully. From communication to planning to timing, the owners, management and staff at Strathcona were phenomenal to work with in putting on this event. The food and beer were incredible and the service was amazing. Strathcona was responsive and flexible, and really made us feel like they were excited for us to host the event there. Were very appreciative to have been able to work with Strathcona, and cannot recommend them enough!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Honestly the best pizza in Vancouver. I know it s a brewery, but honestly the BEST pizza in Vancouver. Pair it with the kale salad. You will be happy.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you!!!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great spot. Beer & pizzas are both fantastic. The interior is beautiful. That said.. the washrooms are in need of some attention due to the hand driers and disgusting, cheap, little door locks. I mean look at these locks.. no one wants to touch that. I d highly recommend getting a paper towel dispenser and some proper washroom grade door handles that show occupancy and unlock when you press the handle down to open the door.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the feedback!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Really good pizza and beer here. The chilly oil is awesome to put on your pizza. They offer high alcohol beers but also easy to drink ones. Really cool place.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Peter!

detailed_reviews.review_text: The staff was so thoughtful and custom created a delicious poutine + beef dish for me because I wanted a gluten free meal with meat. My friends enjoyed the pizzas too. Great service and great food!!
We had the pleasure of hosting our Dads 90th Birthday celebration here. Food was excellent, atmoshere-terrific and staff was a pleasure. Looking forward to celebrating Dads 91st here as well!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you! Such a great time!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Came here after a heavy night. Our server, Jake, was so friendly, welcoming, and just plain fun to talk to. Another staff member noticed our table was wobbly and fixed it sooner than later. All in all really enjoyed the service and experience. #transwomanreviews
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Tyra. Respect.

detailed_reviews.review_text: What an amazing brewery, the beers, the food, the vibe. It s a must see when in the Yeast Van area. My wife doesn t like beer and this is the first brewery she found 2 on tap she loved! We ll be back for sure on our next road trip to Van. 10/10

In the hallowed halls of Strathcona Beer Company, my senses were treated to an extraordinary symphony of flavors and libations, befitting a connoisseurs discerning palate. Amidst this intoxicating tapestry of sensations, my sojourn took an enchanting turn, as I had the pleasure of encountering an exquisite soul gracing the establishment - none other than the esteemed server, Grace. Her service was a graceful dance of refined expertise, a virtuoso performance akin to an orchestral maestro directing a timeless opus. Every gesture bespoke a mastery of the art of hospitality, as she effortlessly navigated the culinary landscape, guiding us through an exquisite culinary expedition with an artful flair, befitting a muse of gastronomic delights. Yet, it was not solely her consummate professionalism that bestowed upon this evening an ineffable allure. Grace, in her authentic and unassuming manner, cast a magnetic aura that transcended the realm of mere service. Like a luminary lighting up the dimmest corners of the heart, her presence was transformative, imparting upon life an aura of enchantment, where every moment was tinged with the hues of amity and warmth. As we delved into conversation, a revelation unfolded - beneath her eminence as a server lies a woman of genuine substance. Crocheting tales of her passion for the craft, she wove a rich tapestry of creativity and artistry that evoked admiration and inspired wonder. A symbiosis of sophistication and down-to-earth charm, she shattered the veneer of formality, fostering an environment where the soul could unabashedly unfurl its wings. In the sanctum of Strathcona Beer Company, Grace breathed life into the moments we shared, making them transcendental in their significance. Her essence was a talisman against the banality of existence, infusing life with new vigor and rendering it a joyful celebration of the human experience. With each stitch she wove into her craft, she mirrored the intricate fabric of her character, where grace, warmth, and authenticity intertwined to create an enigmatic whole. Grace, the embodiment of an alchemist, who turned ordinary moments into golden memories, leaving an indelible mark upon the canvas of my consciousness. In conclusion, to encounter Grace was not merely to savor her exceptional service but to be touched by the profound sense of fulfillment and enchantment she imparts upon all who cross her path. She is a luminary amid the mundane, casting an ethereal glow upon the human experience and making life seem not only more enjoyable but a magical journey worthy of marvel and exultation. Such a union of culinary expertise and genuine humanity elevates the realm of hospitality to an Ivy League of its own, an extraordinary synthesis that makes a visit to Strathcona Beer Company a testament to lifes remarkable beauty.

I love coming here with big groups of friends as its easy to find a seat. Its nice that there is always new beer to try and amazing food. The salads and pizza are equally as good as the beer. They also have wine and cider for the non-beer drinkers in the group and are kid friendly. Would totally recommend.
Amazing and friendliest service from Evelyn! The pizzas are to die for, beer is funky in  a good way, and the ambiance rocks overall.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Cheers! Thank you!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Delicious beers on tap, especially if you like sours. Crispy winter radler and the love buzz blood orange sour were a few of our favorites. Cool vibe, neat merch and unreal food. If you re stopping in for a flight you must order the garlic bites with the garlic dip. 10/10!
Fantastic pizza restaurant that also sells beer! Jokes aside their beer and food menu is spot on. This well loved Strathcona establishment has fantastic rotating seasonal beers and beers to go.
Great atmosphere.  Pizzas are really good, and the tunes were amazing.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Cheers Ryan. Thanks for the comments!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Was passing by so decided to stop in to try some beers. Wasnt really expecting too much but I actually really liked their space and also enjoyed the beers I tried. We got a flight of 4 for $7sth. Id definitely come back again
Fun, easy atmosphere and delicious pizza. Great last minute lunch. Super nice service.
Cool place, great vibes, plenty of space inside and out. Their sours are tasty (but beware, some are strong!). Awesome merch area, the sweaters are super soft.

Fantastic pizza. We also had kale salad and that was excellent, too.  They have 4 beer right now but you can only have 12 oz total for tasting or while eating in seated area. Oh yes, they have such nice seating area like a real restaurant. 5 star all the way around.
Good pizza, beer and atmosphere, not too big so it doesn t feel crowded inside. Very clean too

Honestly super impressed! The place has such a cool vibe.. the food is unreal! Very flavorful. The manager is great.. he knows his stuff as well as very personable. We will definitely be back! Thank you for the great experience !
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for visiting our tasting room. Cheers!

detailed_reviews.review_text: This place is one of my favourite places to come by with friends for a beer or two. They have lots of variety and guest taps and offer sleeves, pints, flights, and even pitchers! Aside from their beers, their pizza is absolutely amazing! Their staff and service are amazing so make sure to come by!
Amazing atmosphere, good beer selection, fun little golf chipping game and friendly staff. Didn t order food while there, but the pizza looked awesome!

Possibly the overall nicest brewery Ive ever been to. Everything is perfectly put together. Flights are gorgeous, cups have a fantastic gold rim and logo, tables have proper footrests, staff was friendly, decor is fantastic, and most importantly, the beers were delicious.
Great local beer at a fair price with delicious pizza and appies. Hung out here twice this week while visiting Van, will definitely come back!

Totally worth the trip! They make some great beer and have a very good menu  . Whats more the design is the venue is truest stunning. The best is their trey for flights, each Microbrew now designs their own trey to carry the 4 oz cups for tastings called flights, and this place has the coolest feature - see in pic. Its magnetized!!!

It is by far the best bar I have been in Vancouver so far. The place has a well thought interior design, great beer selection, the staff is not on your back every five seconds, the food is delicious and most important of all, music is played at a normal volume (which seems to be a big problem with all Vancouver bar and restaurants, where you have literally shout for hours to communicate). I sincerely recommend this place. I enjoyed it and really wish it stays this way.

Amazing drinks! $10 cider that tastes like juice and a vegan pizza that is the BEST I ve ever had. That s a tough thing to beat with all the vegan joints in Vancouver but this is the best pizza I ve ever had in the last 10 years.
Fantastic beer and overall vibe. Do not miss!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you!!!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Delicious beer and snacks, I recommend the garlic butter and Parmesan popcorn! Lots of seating and a good vibe. Come check it out!
Lovely interior design, great beer, pizza with a thin crust. Friendly staff. Nica ambiance and good music. This place is alright I guess...
Great beer. Great pizza. What more could you ask for?
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Cheers!

detailed_reviews.review_text: The Hawaiian pizza is so good it hurts. I mean actually physically I am in pain because I came here to eat the Hawaiian pizza and it only comes in one size and I couldnt stop eating it so now Im sitting here, with a full pizza in my belly, writing this review because Im afraid to stand up, because I could not stop eating the delicious Hawaiian pizza they are here. Yes. No regrets.

Held a group gathering of 15 people at the pub. Amazing experience, drinks and customer service. Special shout-out to Conor, the manager for taking care of us really well. Highly recommend for big parties!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for choosing us!

detailed_reviews.review_text: The service was friendly and personal. All the beers I tried were great. I especially loved the Belgian Blanche. The pizza is perfect, the Hawaiian is a must try!!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Treat yourself to the Hawaiian Pizza - delicious thin crust pizza that stays crisp.  Imperial Love Buzz sour is one of the best! Great service also.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you! Glad you enjoyed it!

detailed_reviews.review_text: I know my pizza, and I know what you are thinking... Wait what? I thought this was a beer place!? ... Well it is however their pizza is the best in town.  Some other locations compare close to the pizza but then you add the cornucopia of beers on tap.... And you experience a delightful time.  P.S. get the Diavola pizza.  Spicy!

Server on Jan. 31 in the morning was amazing.  Even though she was the only server and the place was packed she stayed cheerful and upbeat the whole time.  I had the imperial love buzz which was soooo good!  I was sad that it sold out so fast that I couldnt get cans to take home but I guess that is what happens when something is that good.  Cant wait to go back to try the fresh made pizza.

Come here all the time and always love the beer and food, but the staff are especially great. Tonight the staff went out of their way to ensure that someone who came in feeling unsafe got home okay   it was an extremely aware and benevolent effort, and I very much see this place as an important community fixture.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Less. Appreciate the kind words.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Have to update my review due to COVID. I have been continuously impressed by the staff (and beer) here during the pandemic. Always friendly and helpful, theyve been serving delicious take away beer and pizza during lockdown. Now the tasting room is open and the safety precautions in place so we can all come in to enjoy! Theres now a sweet patio outside to enjoy the summer weather too! Come here for amazing pizza & tasty beer - they are all phenomenal. Highly recommended for all your beer and pizza needs!
Craft beer, Pizza & Hip Hop!!! Special night with a DJ Legend! Awesome place!!

Onto the food! @strathconabeer is probably my favorite brewery in Strathcona and yes, there s a lot of great places to choose from but dog friendly patio, delicious pizza and radlers is definitely an award winning combo. Tell me a place that has all 3, I ll be waiting oh and free parking nearby. . . The Hawaiian pizza is my go to here - chunks of pineapple and drizzled with jalapeno cream. It is beyond heavenly   we tried the meat pizza for the first time during our pizza and lemme tell you - IT IS loaded with meat. They definitely didn t skimp out on the topping. . . As for their drinks, the pink lemonade is my go to, I ve also tried their other lemon mandarin racket before but found it abit to sour for my liking. Go and soak up some  before we get our 9 months of rain again . . Shout out to the staff for being so accommodating with the dogs! Their bowls were constantly refilled with water
Excelente!!! our server Nick was Outstanding!!! We were unsure what to order he provided his suggestions for the Time ma Poke and Wow!! We will definitely be back thanks nick!!! Enjoy Oaxaca!

Arguably the best beer in Vancouver, and the city is full of amazing breweries! I would note that Im partial to sours, and I look forward to all their Love Buzz/Imperial Love Buzz series beers. However, I would be remiss to not mention their pizza. How good is pizza made at a brewery, you may ask? Id say in contention with Via Tevere for best pizza in town. The pizza+beer combo is heavenly - you gotta experience it for yourself.
Staff were so kind and helpful, very lovely menu that is vegan friendly. We would have been there 4 nights in a row if we didnt get COVID on our first day in Vancouver.

This is a little gem. Great service, lovely owners that have a great passion for what they do. The meat pizza was to die for. Thin crust Italian style heaven. Old world style with a new world twist. The beer, oh the beer is spectacularly crafted. Take a tour and listen to Fez and his passion in this wonderful establishment that smells incredible. A must visit for anyone. There is wine, soda and kombucha as well, for those wanting to enjoy the delicious cuisine but prefer something other than beer. Product purchase is also available. I will be returning with friends, often.

We had a great time at Strathcona Beer Company! My first time here and Mitch was absolutely delightful, provided knowledgable, prompt, and warm service. The creamsicle beer was delicious and so was the summer veg speciality pizza!! Will come again!!

Best brewery atmosphere for a cozy gathering! So much visual stimulation - ugh, I m obsessed! We live next door and its our go-to spot. As a craft beer lover, Im always satisfied with the selection and theres frequently something new to try. And dont even get me started on the pizza - gotta try the funghi with the herb oil! Great beer, great pizza and great atmosphere. Not many breweries hit all 3 - theyre the real deal.
Best brewery in Vancouver. Pizza is among the best in the city

3 beers so far that I really enjoy.  The meat pizza is the best in Vancouver. The staff are all very friendly and helpful. Since we work within walking distance we have been coming in at least once a week and we havent been disappointed yet.
Ty was amazing as a server and bartender! It was my birthday today and he brought tasters to my table and we loved him! 10/10 service
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Glad you had a real nice time! I will let Ty know!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Garlic bites tossed in garlic oil salt and padano cheese   at Strathcona Brewery just delicious

Omg The most delicious pizza I ve had in Vancouver hands-down beats anywhere!! I love pizza from the states and I ve had a hard time finding anything in Vancouver that compares to the pizza I ve had in New York and places like that but this place is by far the best pizza to come close to American pizza. Nice thin crust amazing flavours stringy hot cheese just insanely good I was blown away!! Not to mention the homemade dips they make in house! You have to try their homemade ranch it s amazing !! Highly recommend this place!
Great pizza, great beer.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Valerie!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Un real. From beer to food, this place will literally blow your mind. Ive never felt so obliged to make a review, but this left me with no choice. Every bite/sip took me to another planet. 1,000,000/10. If there is just one suggestion I can make, is GET THE STUFFED DATES! Literally the best thing I have ever tasted in my entire life. I went to jupider. Had to order another round of the stuffed dates they were just THAT GOOD. Please... I beg the chef to never remove these from the menu... They are THAT good! Thank you for the epic taste bud experience, Strathcona!
They serve tasty beer and a DAMN GOOD PIZZA in a really cool environment.

Great place for small or big groups. Good choices of beer, and although I didn t order food, it looked and smelled really yummy. Went on Saturday around 10pm and it wasn t busy. Good crowd, vibe, and music. Would come back again!

Went for a friends birthday and aside from the great food and amazing beer the atmosphere and music choice alone is more than enough for a 5 star review. Good vibes and amazing beer. Love all the neon signs.

I really love Strathcona Beer Co, aside from excellent and interesting beers, they have solid food and, in my opinion, the best aesthetic of any micro brew in Vancouver. I think theyve done a fantastic job of capturing the ethos of their neighborhood and east van in general. From the lighting inside, to the design of the cans, to the logo, to the branding outside- they really are excellent. Definitely a favorite place of mine.

Ignoring some of the not so good reviews here we went to celebrate my wifes promotion to a new job, needless to say we were not disappointed, first time there and quickly we learned how the place works, even though it was busy we got our food very quick. The flight of beer  and the pizza were amazing, ask for the snack size pizza, you save 5 bucks and the pizza is slightly smaller than their menu pizza.
My favorite brewery on the bc ale trail. Great decor, menu, and beers. Found the first beer I ve truly loved here. Also loved the garlic knot bites and the lights on the walls. A+
Insanely good beer and awesome service and decor. Very highly recommended. You HAVE to get the Imperial Love Buzz, itll blow your mind. And the pizzas, so good.

This is the best brewery in town! Always a treat to be here. Love the setting - big open windows to let the summer breeze in - and the staff, and of course, the BEER! they make the best sour beers here. And the Headbanger IPA!?! Check this place out.
Delicious pizzas and meatballs, salads too. And of course tasty brews in a warm, cozy room.
Great beer, great vibes, and super friendly service! Oh and also, some of the best pizza Ive had in the city! (Particularly the Diavola pizza) Oh, how I love coming here again and again!
This is our favorite brewery to take visitors from out of town.  Great beers, great seating area, and great pizzas!  The love buzz grapefruit sour is my wifes favorite beer in the city :)

Strathcona Brewing Company has quickly become one of my favourite breweries in town. Their series of Love Buzz sours are outstanding, and their seasonal varieties are consistently creative and delicious. I always found something I love whenever I visit. As a bonus, they are host to Superflux, who frequently come out with some of the best hazy IPAs in the city. Their tasting room is very open and inviting, and they make a killer pizza too. If youre doing a brew-tour of the area, or if youre just looking for a bite and a break, they are a must visit.
Had an awesome time here. Only came for drinks but they were delicious. Awesome selection of beers and I loved the low key vibe of this spot as well. Will return!

Excellent thin  based pizzas apparently cooked in a wood - fired oven. Several varieties. I had the meat pizza which was really spicy. My wife had the mushroom served with rocket (rigula). Both grand. Several varieties of beer to taste.

Mushroom Alfredo pizza is out of this world! The space is large and bright and has a relaxed atmosphere. They also have 3 pitchers of cucumber, lemon and plain water so you can stay hydrated all summer!

Always enjoyed myself. Friendly staff, clean establishment with a nice environment. My experience is that the beer on tap are good choices, (personal favorite is the Wakey-Wakey Stout.) Potential criticism is that they have a limited selection.
The beer is excellent, with a great variety to choose from.  Their pizzas are equally good.  Nice atmosphere as well.  One of my favorited breweries in Vancouver.
Outstanding beer, great pizzas. Nice spot!
Had a funghi pizza and beer - winter radler and fresh hop sour. We loved all of it. The oils for the pizza are a nice touch. Without it the dough is a bit dry (normal I think, for the style).
Tasty pizza and some pretty good brews. We really enjoyed the oatmeal cookie stout and the love buzz imperial peach cobbler sour.
Great place! Super clean and open space. Always coming up with new beers and pizzas. Love that about them. 100% recommend.
I enjoyed the speciality brewed espresso coffee/chocolate beer. Ya gotta put that in your bucket list. Staff were fun and the pizzas looked good!

Strathcona BC is a solid stop for any craft brew enthusiast. They offer about 10 brews on tap at a time in addition to other bottles, wine, and kombucha. The owners and staff do it for the love of beer AND good food. This brewery actually has a really nice and fresh menu. If you dont order food, youll likely ogle any that comes out nearby. The brewery has a nice layout with a good flow, communal tables, and a huge art display. It may get loud depending on whats on the TV.
Attentive service, good beer and pizza!

Damn good beer in a bit of an interesting area. Always appreciated how its never packed to the brim when coming here like most other breweries. Usually have 5-6 beer options, most of which are actually quite good. Something for everyone. Even has cider, full food menu.
Really good beers and the pizza is amazing!!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Chris!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Wonderful space for our team event! Food was delicious and plentiful; the beer choices were abundant and the staff were delightful. Would absolutely recommend!

Absolutely love this beer company for the passion and creativity they put into every flavor selection they produce and the alcohol content levels they can achieve without ruining the flavor of the beer truly amazing
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Less!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Best vegan pizza Ive ever had, and their beer is exceptional
Fantastic Pizza, beer and environment!
Wow!!! This is the place to be. State of the art brewery with that funky neighborhood feel we all enjoy. Drop in for a pint and an amazing pizza. Youll be glad you did.
Great food, incredibly tasty beer, great staff and ownership. Highly recommend this place to everyone.
On of my favourite breweries in Greater Vancouver and definitely the one with the best decor and style. It is a great place for a birthday party, a work team dinner or a date night.
Amazing drinks, amazing service, chill and fun atmosphere!  Always a great time!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Hawaiian pizza rocked my little world. The salads are great too.
Good beer. Great service. Pizza was a little small for two, but the salad rounded it out.
Chic casual place to relax and grab a beer. Some food options. Has sour beers on tab. Chill atmosphere. Happy hour Mon-Thurs 3-6pm.
Excellent service, great beers on tap, sweet movie playing.
The blackberry sour was amazing and the nitro stout was delish. Try the superflux offering as well. Two brews in one stop if your keeping score.
I loved the vibe and the fact they have so many good beers and sour beers on tap. Pizza was pretty good too.

name: Bridge Brewing Company
address: Bridge Brewing Company, 1448 Charlotte Rd, North Vancouver, BC V7J 1H2

detailed_reviews.review_text: Fun spot! Quality beer. Tons of different rotating and main stay beer available. With discounted mix and match in bottles/ cans. They know how to make beer here! Amazing tacos (chicken, pork, veggie) and chips and salsa to go with the delicious flight of beer and fresh corn tacos.  Locally sourced meat from two rivers, just down the street. Chips for salsa from Coquitlam! And Salsa from Jumpin  Johnneys on the North Shore. The tacos are good. The service and friendliness from the staff here is superb, with great knowledge in beer. Patio out front, with easy parking. Just drive down Mountain Highway, with this convenient location. Three different pepperoni sticks available. Impressive package, top notch everything.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Sarah, thank you for your kind words! Cheers!

detailed_reviews.review_text: A nice tiny place who bring you back in the time of the old cantinas with country music and nice beer, they have a huge selection for any taste and the awesome thing is that you can refill your growler for a few bucks, if you are close from the bridge brewery take your time for visit this small but friendly place and ask for the awards beers that they have
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the great review! Cheers Leigh

detailed_reviews.review_text: Beer and food was amazing here! Been to many breweries around BC and this place has a great combination of beer and food! Highly recommend visiting here and grabbing a drink!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Eric, Thank you for the 5-star review! We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your time at the brewery! We loved all the photos you shared online! We hope to see you again soon! Cheers, Katrina

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great beer, Harry was an amazing host alwho knew everything about the beers and was also a great conversationalist. The blood orange is incredible.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5 star review Kevin.  I ll let Harry know how much you enjoyed his service. Cheers Leigh

detailed_reviews.review_text: I LOVE this brewery. The staff is welcoming and very helpful, the beer is AMAZING, and the atmosphere is chill and upbeat. Have to stop here if you appreciate beer when visiting Vancouver.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the great 5 Star review Ben. cheers Leigh

detailed_reviews.review_text: Next stop on the Craft Brewery tour.....in Vancouver for the next 6 months so why not enjoy the local brews. Great little place to socialize. Tacos are great and the Blood Orange Lager is great
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the great review Alberta.  What brings you to Vancouver for 6 months?  Thanks for the visit.  Cheers, Leigh.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Got a flight of beers, the waiter was super helpful and accommodating in selecting them - it was great! Really cool place. Totally recommend after a day of skiing or hiking!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for your 5 Star review Lennart.  Cheers Leigh

detailed_reviews.review_text: I went there on a Sunday evening. The dude working was really new. If he didnt know something, he got an answer for me. The service was friendly and efficient across the board. Beers are excellent, I especially enjoyed the farmhouse ale. Tap room is small, but thats what I like. They have a small patio with flower boxes that have variety of hops they use growing out of them. You can pick and smell them. The people that patronize the place seem to be regulars and are really friendly.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Joe!  Thanks for your review.  Im glad to hear they sought out the answers for you.  Looking forward to seeing you again in the tasting room. Cheers, Leigh.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Small place with nice beer - I personally only tried low carb but hubby liked many others. Tacos very tasty. Service fast. Space to have a dog which can see u from outside. Highly recommend.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for your 5 Star Review Alexandra, glad you liked the PrimeTime. Cheers, Leigh

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great beer, great food, great service.  If youre in the area definitely go give them a try
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Paul! Thank you for the 5-star review! We are pleased to hear you had a great time at the tasting room! We look forward to seeing you again soon! Cheers, Katrina

detailed_reviews.review_text: Wow. Had Primetine tropical. AMAZING!  Husband had BRIDGE IPA. INCREDIBLE.  How have we never stopped in here? Didnt try food, but as it passed looked real tasty. We will be back!!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: HI France! Thank you for the 5-star review!! We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed our new PrimeTime tropical! We look forward to having you back again for some tacos and more beers! Cheers, Katrina

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great beer and great people with great company. Come by for a flight, or a pint. They have 10 beers on tap in which they rotate every few weeks! Its a cozy space with patio seating as well. Their tacos which are 3 for $12 or 1 for $5 are absolutely amazing. Definitely stop by if you are in the area, or in fact, just come by in general. Their beers and food are bomb!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for your review Food Adventures, glad you like the beer and tacos! Cheers, Leigh.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Very cool atmosphere, nice patio and excellent beer - didn t try any of the food this time but it looks good. Prices are fantastic - you gotta stop in here.
Excellent store we went there last week was good and beer fantastic!! We will go again soon!!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi there! Thank you for the 5-star review! We would love to hear more about your amazing experience at the brewery! Cheers, Katrina

detailed_reviews.review_text: Love the beer + tacos + space. Also went to two trivia nights, they were well organized and very fun. Please bring back more!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for your 5 Star review Alessia.  Cheers, Leigh.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Best beer in town and a nice place to chill out.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5 star review Mary. Cheers Leigh

detailed_reviews.review_text: One if the best brewery in BC. Always been a fan, but its been nice to start working close by to be able to go at the brewery. Small local place vibe, friendly staff. The new double IPA currently is awesome. Good tacos for a small snack.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5 star review Christophe. Cheers Leigh

detailed_reviews.review_text: I was pleasantly surprised to find they had food here. Its not super convenient to walk to but they have 5 or so parking spots. Ive had their beer tons around the city. It was nice to check out their home base. Cons: Definitely haunted.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Josh! Thank you for the 5-star review. We hope that now your know where to find us we will be seeing you again soon for a visit. And haunted..? We would love to hear about this next time! Cheers, Katrina

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great beers, great vibes! Delicious veggie tacos. You can buy quality apparel and beers to go too. Nice patio in the summer that is dog friendly which is perfect post hike or bike.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Charles, Thank you for the 5-star review! We hope to see you again soon for another great experience! Cheers, Katrina

detailed_reviews.review_text: Tasty grog and grub!  Great local spot that gets it right with a simple, good-quality food menu and a broad list of in-house brewed beers.  Perfect stop after a N.Shore ride.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Jeffery! Thank you for the 5-star review! We are thrilled to hear you enjoyed your visit at the brewery. We look forward to seeing you again for more post-ride beers! Cheers, Katrina

detailed_reviews.review_text: Friendly service. Looked like a nice variety of food and beer at reasonable prices. I tasted a few beers and they were all good. I had a beer battered bacon pastry that was really good too.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5 star review Robert.  The bacon beer stick is so good, its one of my fav! Cheers, Leigh

detailed_reviews.review_text: I really like the beer here and come multiple times per week. I wish that they would bring back the veggie tacos though! The food used to be amazing and now it is subpar and i dont order it anymore. I am offended that the veggie dog has a surcharge when i can buy the same thing at Safeway for $2!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5 star review.  We are looking at our veggie options, hopefully the taco will return soon! Cheers, Leigh

detailed_reviews.review_text: Always love exploring great locations with my official beer expert, My son. He truly knows dads choices. My selection is on the right...
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5 star review Malcolm and glad to hear you and your son had a great time! Always a good choice when it comes to the delicious beer that our brewers are creating! - Phil

detailed_reviews.review_text: I am going to some brewings around Vancouver tasting and getting to know a little bit more about the beer culture around here. And Bridge got my heart with the Bourbon and the service. Great people and great beer
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Marcelo! Thank you for the 5-star review! We would love to hear more about your 5-star experience and we are looking forward to seeing again soon! Cheers, Katrina

detailed_reviews.review_text: Best craft beer on the shore, amazing beer and they always have great food to match
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Chris! Cheers, Leigh

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great place for hanging out and drinking cold beer. 13+ taps and beers to go!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for your 5 Star Review Ben!  Cheers, Leigh

detailed_reviews.review_text: I expected a larger tasting room here as I see their beer everywhere. That said, the bartender was very friendly, and the beer was delicious. Small menu of pepperoni sticks and hot dogs with various toppings if youre looking for a snack. Well be back!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for your great review Ariele!  Glad you enjoyed your time with us. Cheers Leigh

detailed_reviews.review_text: Excellent beer, excellent staff, great little patio for a sunny afternoon beer. Winning all around.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for your 5 Star review. Cheers Leigh

detailed_reviews.review_text: Friendly, great selection of on tap cold beers and food munching options (tacos!), what else could you ask for? Nice place to relax with some outdoors seating,or to fill up for the weekend from their wide offering of tall cans. But most importantly, the beers taste great!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Talid, Thank you for the amazing review! We are thrilled to hear you had an excellent time at Bridge Brewing! We are looking forward to seeing you again soon! Be sure to check out our new location, the Lonsdale BridgeDeck! Cheers, Katrina

detailed_reviews.review_text: Love the fact that there are new beers every time we go, great that stout back came back for a while and now waiting for the return of 5 oclock somewhere. Their latest 3 goal lead and Shell be right help with the wait. Pulled pork tacos were great this weekend
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: HI Derek!  Thanks for the 5 star review.  You never know when some of your favourites will return.  Cheers, Leigh Thank you for the 5-star review! We would love to hear more about your experience. Did you get a chance to try some of our seasonal beers? Cheers, Katrina

detailed_reviews.review_text: By far, our favourite brewery on the North Shore (and there are quite a few here now). Been coming here for 5 years and the beer and atmosphere have only gotten better over that time. Food is also solid (tacos are v good) and the vibe is fantastic.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Spencer! Thanks for the awesome review! Its fantastic to hear from returning customers, like yourself! We hope to see you again soon! Cheers, Katrina

detailed_reviews.review_text: Very cozy north shore brewery. Always have a great choice of beer, not to mention they have food as well. Would fully recommend any of their staple beers, and prime time beer choices. tasting room staff is super friendly and helpful.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the fantastic review Shayan and your recommendations! We look forward to seeing you again soon. - Phil

detailed_reviews.review_text: Delicious pork tacos and lots of great beers to try! Highly recommend. Great local gem
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5 star review Sacha. Glad you enjoyed the tacos.  Cheers Leigh

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great place to unwind in North Van.  Convenient location. Friendly staff and great brews!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5 star review Jon! Hope to see you again soon. Cheers - Phil

detailed_reviews.review_text: Super chill, super good beer, always a great variety; those who like to stick to the classics can, and those who like to venture further afield will find some thing to pique their interest. Some tasty snacks as well, and dog friendly to boot. What more could you ask for?
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Melanie! Thank you for the amazing review! We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your time at the Brewery! We look forward to seeing you again soon! Cheers, Katrina

detailed_reviews.review_text: My favourite brewery on the north shore.  Awesome IPA s. Nice sunny south facing patio.  Excellent friendly staff.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5 star review David. Cheers, Leigh

detailed_reviews.review_text: We came in after work, having never been here before, looking to try some new beers.  Ive had the Bourbon Blood Orange before, its nice.  This is one of the few places where Ive had a flight, and enjoyed almost all of them.  I highly recommend Bridge brewing, whether your a light beer person, to ales or IPA.  Two flights, 8 beers, all tasty.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5 Star review Ren.  Glad you enjoy all our beers, look forward to seeing you back soon. Cheers, Leigh.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Love visiting this local craft brewery! Good selection, small homey feel, and food! Their breads are super tasty and the tacos aren t bad either. You really can t go wrong by going there, consistent service and quality! Unfortunately dogs aren t allowed in anymore though.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Dana, thanks so much for the review and glad you enjoyed your visit! Yes, unfortunately in order to serve our delicious food we are not able to allow dogs in. We do however have leash ties just outside the patio and a turf area for them to chill in while you enjoy your beer! Cheers, Madelaine

detailed_reviews.review_text: This  hole in the wall is magical to me. You are lucky to find a seat AND when you so it is a real joy to sit in here and just be in this place as you drink your beer. My favourite part is that they sell TINY portions on tap should you be 52  and 110 lbs and desire to drink a proportional amount of beer. hahahah. The beers are often funky and flavourful. I have found the people to always be a breath of fresh air to interact with. Thank you BBC.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Christina! Thank you for the awesome 5-star review! Very surprising how often the little tasting glasses are ordered over the regular sizes! We hope to see you again soon! Cheers, Katrina

detailed_reviews.review_text: Yuuuuuup! Best brewery on the North shore by a mile. Beer is always fresh with some solid staples on the menu. Also love the intimate tasting room with low ceiling and family style tables. We go at least twice a week for a couple of pints and love it every single time. Decent food options for sharing too. And I saved the best for last, all beers are $5! Exactly the way it should be! So many breweries especially on the n shore are charging waaaay too much. Bridge Brewing 10/10!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Jonathan! Thanks for the awesome review! We re glad to hear you are enjoying all aspects of the tasting room experience and of course our beers!Cheers, Katrina

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great service and boss beers. Thanks to Cali, our server, our birthday group was totally taken care of yesterday. Come to Lonsdale Bridgedeck for chill atmosphere, great beer selection and friendly service. So happy this place is in our neighbourhood.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5 Star Review Jen.  I ll let Kali know you enjoyed the birthday. Cheers Leigh

detailed_reviews.review_text: I come here all the time after mountain biking and love it! The tacos are some of the best in town. 3 for $12 and the pork ones are yumyumyum. The beer is delish and a great spot
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: HI Madeleine, Thank for the amazing review! We are so glad to hear you enjoyed our tacos and beers! We look forward to seeing you again! Cheers, Katrina

detailed_reviews.review_text: Amazing! My favourite local brewery. Prime Time is the best low cal/carb beer on the BC market. Lots of fun taps to try. The brewery has a great vibe and makes all feel welcome. Cool merch as well!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Mike, Thank you for the amazing review! We are thrilled to hear you are enjoying Primetime! We look forward to seeing you again soon for more PrimeTimes! Cheers, Katrina

detailed_reviews.review_text: The best micro brew in North Van. They were the first to make a light beer taste good (prime time) and even though everyone else is doing now their is still the tastiest. Great tacos too!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Grant!  Have you tried the PrimeTime IPA? Cheers, Leigh

detailed_reviews.review_text: We stop by every so often and just tried the Double or Nothin - it was probably the best beer we ve had there!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5 Star review! Glad you loved the beer. Cheers, Leigh

detailed_reviews.review_text: Side Cut is the most incredible beer I ve had in Vancouver (or maybe anywhere). Had to check out the brewery after having one at a restaurant and I m glad I did. Small place, great variety of beer, bread twisted with bacon and cheese. What s not to love? Wonderful place. If I were a local, this would be my brewery.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Jennifer! Cheers, Madelaine

detailed_reviews.review_text: Love living 200m from here! My wallet doesnt, but my stomach does <3 Best local beer spot I have ever lived by. Look forward to many more pints to come! Very dog friendly. :)
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Christine! Cheers, Madelaine

detailed_reviews.review_text: Had some tacos and the cheese and bacon bread, both were great! Awesome happy hour special starting at 6pm ($4 beers, or 3 tacos and a beer for $12)! Definitely worth checking out :)
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the great review Alison. Cheers, Leigh.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Small place but 7 of us went and were very comfortable around one of the larger tables.. Beer is excellent, all of us enjoyed the beer and snacks and food is very good.  Great atmosphere and definitely worth a visit. Go you will enjoy the beer and food.  We will be going back.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Happy to hear you enjoyed our tasting room, Peter! Thanks so much for coming in, and for leaving us such a lovely review:) Cheers, Madelaine

detailed_reviews.review_text: I have been enjoying Bridge beers on a weekly basis for a couple of years. Recently I was at the brewery and a person ahead of me in line commented that for beer, you can t beat Bridge. I wholeheartedly agreed with him. The All Out Stout is a phenomenal beer, I m glad it is back. The NSP and Bourbon Blood Orange are exceptional. It s worth going back regularly to taste new creations and rediscover old favourites...I ve discovered so many different kinds of beers like Gose and Saison (looking forward to the return of lemon gin). The specialty beers around Christmas are so good, too- I look forward to the Grinch and Santa s Sac. The people are super friendly and always greet you with a smile. Thanks for the sips- keep it up!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for your awesome comments and 5 stars! Our brewing team is always striving to bring you new beers while keeping the classics amazing. Cheers Leigh

detailed_reviews.review_text: I was a longtime craft beer drinker until I changed my diet two years ago (no processed sugars and extremely low carb). I went without beer for a long while until I found Bridge Primetime and now Bridge IPA. These low carb beers are now my husbands go to as well. Walking into the brewery and having my first draft poured beer in two years was amazing! Thank you for creating alternatives for all beer lovers!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Jacky! Thank you for the great review! We would love to hear more about your 5-star experience and are looking forward to seeing you again soon! Cheers, Katrina

detailed_reviews.review_text: Brewers of excellent beer, the Bourbon Blood Orange is a must-try for lovers of wheat ales. The food is also great; the tacos are delicious and complement the selection of  beer perfectly.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Kevin, Thank you for the 5-star review! We are thrilled to hear you enjoyed our Bourbon Blood Orange Wheat Ale (BBO)! Our tacos are prepared by our chefs at the Lonsdale BridgeDeck! We look forward to seeing you again soon! Cheers, Katrina

detailed_reviews.review_text: Our favourite local brewery by far! The cozy little room brings about a super local vibe which attracts the right kind of crowd- oh wait- I should mention the beer first because that is by far the best thing about this place! Every brew tastes well made, unique, and powerfully delicious!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: What a lovely review, thank you so much Haylee! We aim for cozy:) Cheers! Madelaine

detailed_reviews.review_text: This place is popular for a reason. They were one of the first breweries on the North Shore and their success really showed when they had to move to a bigger premises to expand their operations. Youll find 6-10 different beers available for growler fills, and perhaps some special batches in glasses. Its a nice place to go, friendly staff and plenty of products available for everyone. A perfect stop on your way home.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the great review Henry, always a pleasure to see you here!

detailed_reviews.review_text: This place is such a hidden gem. Great food and great drinks.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: thank for the review. cheers, Leigh

detailed_reviews.review_text: The beer is delicious!! The Bourbon Blood Orange is a standout and one of my favs.  If youre heading to the brewery - try the tacos so tasty and worth the trip.
Frikin awesome! Love this place. If it had more food options, i would be there every day.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Cheers Keith!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Just had a dozen Kolsch delivered to my home.  Fast service and a totally excellent beer!!!  I spent two weeks in Germany in April 2019 and your Kolsch matches or beats any of the beers I had there. Great job Bridge!!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Scott! Thank you for the awesome review! We are thrilled to hear you are enjoying our Wunderbar Kolsch! Cheers,

detailed_reviews.review_text: Although the tasting room is a little small and cramped, their beers are really good. The staples are all well rounded and flavorful and they frequently put out interesting and tasty beers.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Derek.  We wish our tasting room was larger too! Cheers Leigh

detailed_reviews.review_text: Wonderful staff, and well crafted beer attract wonderful people who enjoy drinking a cold one. Always a lovely experience and you really cant go wrong.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Mandy, Thanks so much for the review! What is your favourite brew? Cheers, Maria

detailed_reviews.review_text: Favorite place for stopping by after a hike in the North Shore. Also my favorite IPA around the Lower Mainland. And the vibe is great.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5 star review

detailed_reviews.review_text: Nice brewery on a quiet street.  Did a small beer flight,  all of which were great.  The head brewer walked my group and I through the tasting.  He was both knowledgeable and friendly.  There is also a small cafe where you can drink a pint or get a small snack.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Cheers Justin!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Best brewery on the North Shore hands down and its not even a close race.  The limited edition Bootable Offense IPA was to die for! - bought a stash which is starting to run out now.  Can you guys source some more Aussie hops? Keep up the great work!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Andrew! Glad to hear that you enjoyed our Bootable Offense! Maybe we will see it return to our set of limited release beers! Thanks for the support and the great review. We hope to see you at the brewery soon. Cheers, Katrina

detailed_reviews.review_text: such a fun place and the beer is awesome. Tuesday Trivia night was so much fun (props to the staff for making it so entertaining!), but I was so bummed to hear that it doesnt run through the summer :(... isnt the summer the best time for trivia?? long days, hot weather, extra space on the patio?! pls bring it back!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for your 5 Star review Olivia!  We wish we could run Trivia all summer too, however the tasting room is simply too busy on Tuesday nights in the summer. Cheers, Leigh.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Quaint little hole in the wall serving up awesome in house brews. If you show up on a sunny Saturday don t expect to walk in without a wait, but it is worth it. Incredible staff, even better beer and a fun atmosphere.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the great comments! Cheers Leigh

detailed_reviews.review_text: Love the beer here, and tacos are also delicious. Staffs are friendly, and I love the little patio area to chill. Just make sure you park at the right parking spot without getting fined.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the great review Kelly! I ll let the staff and chef know how much you enjoy your visits.  Yes, the district will ticket you if you park in the middle of the road   Cheer Leigh

detailed_reviews.review_text: The kindest and most amazing staff out of all breweries I ve visited in Vancouver! And of course really delicious beer and tacos as well! A brewery other breweries should look up to! Well done!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Malgorzata, Thank you for this amazing review! We are thrilled to hear that your experience with the Bridge Brewing Team has been a memorable one. We hope to see you again very soon for more tacos, beers and good times! Cheers,

detailed_reviews.review_text: One of my regular places for growler fills.. Great range of beers to suite any taste..my favorites include blood orange wheat ale and side cut IPA..they have a very limited menu but tacos were surprisingly good.. Lots of opportunity for growth beyond beer..
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Thomas! Cheers!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Best brewery on the North Shore in my opinion. Great selection on tap that rotated regularly, friendly staff, and an awesome atmosphere. Do yourself a favour and stop by for a beer or five when you re in the area.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Jason, Thank you for the 5-star Review! What was your favourite beer that you enjoyed? We hope to see you again soon! Cheers, Katrina

detailed_reviews.review_text: Went there on a quiet Monday noontime. Service was excellent, beer was better yet and excellent soft shell tacos.  Im surmising that on busy nights theres gonna be lineups and parking issues so check this place out at off peak hours.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Cheers, thanks for the review! We really appreciate it.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Tried a flight in their tasting room. They have a nice selection of beers here. The north shore IPA is a favourite of mine, as is the all-out stout. Worth a visit if youre in the area.

I happened to get a bottle of bridge brewing s golden strong ale (Santa sac) as gift. Turned out to be the best golden ale I ve even had: even it s 10% acohol it s still very smooth with citrus favor. Can wait to visit the actual tasting room!
Bridge brewing is a North Shore classic. Casual & comfortable tasting room, come for the great beer, stay for the tacos and awesome people. The squash sour we tried today was 10/10.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the awesome review Ben! Glad you enjoyed the new brew! Cheers, Madelaine

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great beer! Love the blood orange and the lemon gin saison! Awesome spot and great helpful staff ....just what we need here in North in! If you havent checked it out yet get down there!

Nice brewery with a small tasting room and smaller patio. A larger than normal selection of beers on tap. The selection is a little heavy toward IPAs; Although the hopilano is a unique high hop flavour with low bitterness. Would like to see a dark/brown lager
Best North Shore brewery! Constantly releasing new beers, fair prices and also good tacos. Serve beers in flights, sleeves and pints. Growlers to take home. Cheers
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for your 5 Star review Marin! Cheers, Leigh

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great atmosphere in a small tasting room, delicious food (GET THE TACOS!) and the beers are great. Try the Hakuna Horchata blonde ale while its still here - SO GOOD.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Margarita, thanks for the 5 star review!  Glad you loved the tacos. Cheers, Leigh

detailed_reviews.review_text: Easy growler fills. Great beer, I recommend the Bourbon Blood Orange Wheat Ale. Cant wait to try others
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Chris, Thanks so much for the 5 star review! Cheers, Maria

detailed_reviews.review_text: This is the first place I went to when I first moved to BC, absolutely love it. Great beer, Great staff and Great food. Thanks for all memories!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Mon! Thank you for the 5-star review! We are honored to be the first stop when you came to BC. We look forward to having you stop by again! Cheers, Katrina

detailed_reviews.review_text: On the smaller side - but luckily we went on a rainy Sunday that wasnt super busy. The beers were great and the merchandise I found to be super decently priced. Will definitely be back!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks so much for stopping by and for the lovely review Melissa! Glad you enjoyed and hope to see you again! Cheers, Madelaine

detailed_reviews.review_text: Super chill place. I would recommend you try the bacon or asparagus cheese bread! Great beer too! Definitely will be back!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5 Star review.  Glad you like the beer sticks! Cheers, Leigh.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Prime time - no compromises, is my favourite brew and much appreciate the refund deposits on the beer toppers! It really does pay to drink ;)
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Riley! Were so glad you enjoy PrimeTime! Have you had the change to try the IPA or Tropical? Here at Bridge we are all about sustainability and try our best to recycle what we can, so having this incentive to bring back our toppers is definitely a win-win for both of us! Cheers, Maria

detailed_reviews.review_text: Possibly the best beer in Vancouver. We loved going here but sadly it is only take out now. Hoping to return to their patios when the lockdowns are over!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Ayesha, thanks for the 5 Star Review! I m not sure what you are referring to  only take out  we have plenty of socially distanced tables and our patio is open Year round. Cheers, Leigh

detailed_reviews.review_text: Best damn brewery on the North Shore!
The best brewery in the city. Amazing quality of beer, amazing selection and the staff are super friendly and fun. Always a hopping place with a great atmosphere.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Mike! Always glad to see you at the brewery enjoying your Wunderbar Kilsch and Bourbon Blood Orange. Cheers

detailed_reviews.review_text: This place is tucked away in North Van, but do what google suggests and follow google here.  Great food.  Awesome beer.  Best place for an apres-ride snack.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the rating, Ken! Cheers, Madelaine

detailed_reviews.review_text: you cannot go wrong with the bridge. yummy beer and food. great patio and atmosphere
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for your great review Oscar.  Cheers, Leigh

detailed_reviews.review_text: Excellent place, great beers and food options are good. Bridge Deck has really good burgers.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5 star review! What is your favourite Bridge brew? -Maria

detailed_reviews.review_text: Love this North Van staple with their regular and rotating selection!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for your 5 star review Erin. Cheers Leigh

detailed_reviews.review_text: Best beer on the North Shore! Love their selections, and if you eat in, the tacos are excellent
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Amelia! Thanks for the review! Glad you enjoyed our tacos, we sure do! Cheers, Katrina

detailed_reviews.review_text: This place knocked it out of the park! Visiting from Ottawa and trying to get to as many of the Vancouver breweries as we can, this one is the best that we have been to both food and beer!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the amazing review Bradley and glad to hear you had a great time! Hope to see you again on your next visit. Cheers - Phil

detailed_reviews.review_text: The Best brewery around. The most consistent beers, and even the flavours I wouldnt normally go for taste good to me. And the tacos.... The. Tacos.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the great review Rob.  Glad you love the tacos too!  Cheers, Leigh

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great beer, great tacos, awesome prices all wrapped up in a chill out of the way atmosphere!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5 star review Koops!  Glad you like the beer and tacos. Cheers, Leigh

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great beer and food. Get the local street corn dog and the bourbon blood orange
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Glad you like the hot dog. cheers, Leigh

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great beer, great atmosphere. Samir is the best! Definitely recommend this brewery.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Samir is the best! Thanks for the 5 star review, Alexa :) -Maria

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great beer selection, nice bustling atmosphere, decent tacos and friendly staff. Thoroughly recommend
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for your great review Mark! What was your favourite beer? Cheers Leigh

detailed_reviews.review_text: I was a bit disappointed that I couldn t fill a growler to go but  Tall Handsome Blue Hoody  was a great host,DJ,bartender,chef,etc.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Stephen, sorry to hear you couldnt get a growler fill, not sure what happened there? If you would like to send me an email Id love to coordinate getting you that growler fill. phil@bridgebrewing.com. Glad to hear the staff member made sure you had a great time otherwise. - Phil

detailed_reviews.review_text: Beer is GREAT, especially if you like a citra finish. Beauty pale ale, kolsch is friends favorite. Maybe an occasional visit by a food truck?
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5 Star review Steve.  Glad you like the Pale Ale.  Thanks for the suggestion of the Food Truck. Cheers, Leigh.

detailed_reviews.review_text: The beer is pretty good, the food is pretty great, but the service is an absolute 10/10.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Ryan! Thank you for the 5-star review! Wed love to hear more about your experience! did you have a chance to try some of our seasonals? Cheers! Katrina

detailed_reviews.review_text: Very good beer and tacos.   My favorite is the blood orange beer.   I usually go to this place after biking mt Fromme.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Adam!

name: East Van Brewing Company
address: East Van Brewing Company, 1675 Venables St, Vancouver, BC V5L 2H1

detailed_reviews.review_text: First time Customer alert Came in for a girls night. Happy Hour ~ I had the mac and cheese that was amazing. -Perfect balance between rich cheese flavors and a satisfyingly gooey texture.   Pairing this delightful dish with a flight of craft beers is a match made in heaven. -The server knew we had a long day and just wanted to talk, so they made sure we had our space to talk without interrupting. The inside was a lot bigger than I thought and had an outside patio as well. -Would come back and recommend though I do wish their happy hour served more options or a bit of later happy hour window.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: HI Julian, thanks for all the STARZ and kind words.  we do hope to see you again soon!  cheers until the next time!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great place yo have beers in East Van. Life hack: They dont serve food so they let you bring your Down Low Chicken meal to eat here and will even offer you a discount on your first tap beer. Amazing. Good service, environment and quality.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Roberto, thanks for all the STARZ!!  One note though, we do serve our own food and we also have Saltys Lobster Shack that operates right out of our brewery.  DL is always welcome too!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great beer! Fantastic quick service, and the best lobster man n cheese I have ever had! I will definitely return!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Brandon, thanks for the STARZ and kind words. Everyone here thanks you for the review and we cant wait to see you again!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great little brewpub just off The Drive. Really enjoyed the Jasmine Rice Lager.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Steve, thanks for all STARZ...super happy you enjoyed the beer.  Hope to see you again soon.   Cheers!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Cute little brewery and brewpub in a nice neighbourhood, service was prompt and good, had a good view of their brewing tanks right next room. Beer was ok, nothing spectacular, but main point was to cool down a bit during a hot day so it served it purpose well.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Jussi, thanks so much for the great review and all the STARZ!!  Hope to see you again soon.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Outstanding service!! All of the staff were super friendly. I was here with some friends and dont really drink much beer, the boys behind the bar were more than helpful helping me choose one! I ended up having the Blackberry sour and it was delicious! I must say, the music selection was excellent, you could tell whoever was in charge of the music could really read the room.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey there Zaya, appreciate all the STARZ and so happy to hear you enjoyed the sour...come back soon for the barrel aged cherry which should be ready soon!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Sat down Friday night at east van brewing with a group of five friends, we were very nicely welcomed by our tables waiter in a timely fashion. Our waiters name was Drake he was really happy and positive bringing great Friday vibes along with fast and attentive service. drinks were good and cold! food was good and hot! all around awesome experience. Would come back for the good Time vibes from the waiter! Thanks Drake!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey kellan, thanks so much for the STARZ and kind words.  Well pass along a praise and give Drake a high five!  Look forward to your next check visit.

detailed_reviews.review_text: I had my first dinner here after restaurants are opened again for dine in. Normally I m not really into pub food but honestly I haven t have anything as good as the food here for awhile. Wait time was short, excellent food, plus they use natural wheat straws which won t turn mushy like the paper ones. Definitely go back to try more lobster dishes
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Emma, thanks so much for the kind words, support and all the STARZ!!  hope to see you again soon!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Very convenient spot close to the start of Commercial, with outdoor seating and a huge indoor space (top and bottom levels). There s cool art hanging around for sale and amazing (rock) music. Saltys the lobster shack is the restaurant portion of this brewery and the lobster rolls are AMAZING. We ordered a grilled cheese, a Maine (cold) lobster roll full order and a half order lobster roll with bisque that came with a huge chunk of lobster! Everything was delicious albeit a tad salty but thats okay, I just drank more beer ;) Beers here were pretty good! I tried the jasmine rice beer (same one sold at the Lunch Lady, a highly recommended Vietnamese restaurant on Commercial) which was very light, and also the Hef. Would try their pale ale next time when we re back! Saltys had last call just before 8pm on Sunday but the brewery still serves snacks (like sausages) afterwards so just a heads up! Will definitely come back!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Bee Dub, thanks so much for all the STARZ and support.  We will pass along your ringing endorsement to Saltys as well and we most certainly hope to see you again soon!!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Loved this spot! Atmosphere abs decor was super cool and the staff there was very friendly. We ordered the flight of beer to try out different options and we were not disappointed. Our table also ordered the flight of pickle, while I m not a pickle fan, I thought that was a great idea! We also ordered lobster rolls from the Salty s food truck that s inside this brewery. That was quite enjoyable as well! We had a great time with our friends there. Would recommend uk anyone looking for a chill place with good food and beer!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Bonnie, thanks for stopping by and the amazing review.  we appreciate the support and all the STARZ!!  hope to see you again soon.

detailed_reviews.review_text: As others mentioned, the atmosphere at the East Van Brewing Company in Vancouver is fantastic. I m more of a drinker of spirits but I ended up enjoying the community lager (if I m not mistaken, they called it that). Not a bad spot to watch the Vancouver sunset too. Great music too. East Van Brewing Company is a great spot for drinks and we d definitely visit them again!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Jordan, thanks for all the kind words and STARZ!!!  We appreciate you and the support, hope to see you again soon for more Community Lager!

detailed_reviews.review_text: They have a variety of fresh brews and also serve food. I tried an eclectic flight and the featured lobster sandwich roll. In all it was a primo date night. They also have some cool merch and beers (cans or growlers) to go.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Jessica, thanks so much for all the STARZ and kind words.  We appreciate the support and hope to see you again soon!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Came for Saltys lobster combo. Was delicious and made my day. Had a jasmine rice lager which went down very smoothly and had nice hints. Outside seating was plentiful.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Nicholas, Thanks so much for the kind words and all the STARZ, very much appreciated!  See you again soon.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Love this place, Great beer! Great staff! Always accommodating definitely check it out if you haven t been!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Brydon, thanks the STARZ and kind words.  Appreciate it and hope to see you again sooner than later!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Food was delicious. Service was fantastic. I actually highly recommend the pickle flight for those who love pickles. It was something fun and different. I really dig your guys vibe. It was great.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Lauren, thanks so much for all the STARZ and super kind words!!  See you again soon!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great space with a crowd or alone. Unholy Nitro Stout is the closest stout to a proper Guinness anywhere. Worth a visit!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Christina, you are the best!  Thanks for all the STARZ!!  Look forward to a stout with you soon!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great selection of beers and a very chill atmosphere. Awesome  food by Saltys Lovster shack. Love their Jasmine rice lager!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Vancity Cook, thats so much for the kind words and STARZ.  We appreciate the support and hope you come back soon!!

detailed_reviews.review_text: I had a flights, all tasted VERY good. Really good.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Marc, thanks so much for all the STARZ!  Super happy you enjoyed our beers.  Cheers!!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Came around 3pm on a weekday.  Enough free parking around and so close to Commercial Drive.  Lots of outdoor space.  Our server was quick with requests and was courteous.  I had the Maine Lobster Roll with some ketchup chips.  I was expecting some fries but the roll was very good. The IPA beer was the best out of my 4 flight.  Not a fan of the honey brown ale.  Support our local breweries!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the support, kind words and all the STARZ...much appreciated.  We would like to think that we have a style of beer for everyone!

detailed_reviews.review_text: The Lobster Combo is amazing!!! super tasty soup and the roll. I can eat more! Definetely will come back and eat it again!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Tycho, well pass the message along to the Saltys Lobster Shack team!

detailed_reviews.review_text: I ve been coming to this brewery for a couple months now and I must say it s one of my favourites. From the quality beer to the friendly staff, I definitely recommend this brewery to anyone.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Zach, thanks so much for all the STARZ and support. Hope to see you again soon, Cheers!!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Nice place Cozy atmosphere Tasty beer
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Arash, thanks for all the STARZ!   We appreciate you business and support!

detailed_reviews.review_text: First things first, the brewery is not salty lobster and salty lobster is not the brewery. Anyway, the brewery is pretty cool, the beer selection enormous and the staff gorgeous.
