detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Veloboy, we would like to give you a 5 star review for understanding the concept and relationship we have with Saltys!  We also want to thank you for all STARZ and support.  We also think our staff is gorgeous and are happy you enjoyed our beer!  See you again soon!

detailed_reviews.review_text: A great new addition to the area. Good choice of beers on tap and hard booze for people who dont like beer. Lots of seating available as well.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi James, apologies for the crazy slow reply...thanks for the support and love!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Good vibes, plenty of space in and out. Their current sour beer is refreshing and a wonderful summer drink. So happy Saltys posted up in East Van brewing. I tried the Maine lobster roll for the first time and its incredible. Theres an option for half the roll + lobster bisque but Im tiny and wolfed it down. Soo good.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Meesh, thank you for the kind words, support and all the STARZ...see you again soon!!

detailed_reviews.review_text: At the root of every successful business there is a passionate and dedicated owner with a vision to offer a quality product and services to their community and City. Andy has clearly demonstrated his commitment to be just that person. We love your passion and magnetic personality. How can anyone resist your amazing brew made with love and natural ingredients. Keep up the great work ....Youre a rising star. See you soon.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the amazing review and all the STARZ...you guys rock! hope to see you at the brewery for a few pints soon!!

detailed_reviews.review_text: What an awesome Brewery! So many great things to say about this one. A big shout out to them letting us bring our Download Chicken to eat with our drinks. This is a special partnership they have with each other. So, happy we were able to do this! They have a great range of beers...of course! And the best non-alcoholic drinks too. Love the vibe and the artwork in there right now.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey there, thanks so much for all the STARZ and super kind words.  Come back anytime!!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Brilliant bar, food and drink was amazing, staff were super pleasant too, will be returning again
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Paul, we think youre brilliant too!  Thanks for the STARZ and see again soon!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Excellent experience, some great beers to try with their 4 beer flight or 6 beer cross, we also had a sleeve of a porter with coffee notes. Their renowned IPA (not sure of name) was good, considering I dont personally like IPAs
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the STARS Tyler!  sorry we missed this but we do appreciate, hope to see you after this craziness...cheers!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Love it!!! I was able to order a flight of beer and had takeout from Downlow Chicken to eat inside East Van couldnt have a better collab! #OnGoogleMaps @googlemaps #LetsGuide @googlelocalguides #604 #VanCity #Food On Insta: @gestler.mendoza
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Awesome Gestler!  Thanks for the STARZ!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Yo it s a chill vibe there, the beers are different flavours. We were a pretty big group, moving around and probably being kinda confusing but they helped us out, much appreciated. Shout out to the girl with blonde hair and glasses!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Alec, appreciate all the STARS and kind words.  Glad you had a good time and hope to see you all again soon! Thanks for stopping by

detailed_reviews.review_text: Went here last weekend on a brewery tour. You definitely need to try the pickle flight, jalapeno is the best! They also have crib boards which is a fun idea. Will definitely be back.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the review and the start Brittni!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Support Local!!! We re back for more delicious lobsters       Thank you!!!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Eddie for the kind words and support, we appreciate the opportunity to serve you and thanks for the STARZ!!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Amazing restaurant brewing love the flight and staff especially Beck was awesom rave reviews and positivity in this place, good foo
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the stars Nadim

detailed_reviews.review_text: Ive been to a lot of breweries and this is one you want to visit. Great variety, funky space, and friendly staff. Come while its still relatively unknown to the general public!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the stars Jay!

detailed_reviews.review_text: I love how they have a flight of 6 beers and that the flight is shaped like a cross. A really nice touch, and nice to have a couple extra beers in your flight rather than the standard 4. We also got the pickle flight which was a lot of fun to try. It was very good along with the grilled cheese. Service was good and the staff were all very kind and seemed to really care about giving good service. The ambiance inside was also very nice. Cant wait to visit again sometime!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Erin, thanks for the STARZ, kind words and support...very much appreciated!!  come back anytime!

detailed_reviews.review_text: We went here since it was one of the few breweries open until 11. The jasmine rice lager was sooo delicious. I didn t particularly like the others I tried. Service was good. I felt that the round tables are way too big and it s hard to talk in a group.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Hana, thanks a bunch for all the STARZ!!  We appreciate it and would love to see you again soon...cheers!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great selection of beer combined with a cool space . Fun new lace to hangout .
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: appreciate the love Paul, glad you are enjoying it!

detailed_reviews.review_text: One of our stops on a brewery crawl with family from California.  Was recommended by a good friend and exceeded my expectations.  Excellent food..the Gouda bombs were delicious Loved the pickle flight!  Great choices of beer.  Im not a beer drinker but had a cider and enjoyed it.  Not too sweet and dry.  Also had the lobster grilled cheese and lobster bites from the Lobster Shack.  Will definitely go back!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Irene, we are so thrilled that you and your family and our neighbors to the south enjoyed everything.  Thanks for the STARZ and support, we appreciate it very much!! Please be sure and thank your friend for recommending us too. We hope to see you again soon!  Cheers

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great beer, and the staff are nice too!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Mike, thanks for all the STARZ and kind words!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Awesome space. Have to do the East Van cross flight if youre there for the first time. Lovely service. Will def be back.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Ben, so sorry for the super slow reply.  We appreciate the love and support!

detailed_reviews.review_text: They have a great selection of in house beers, my favourite is the Jasmine Rice Lager
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Will, thanks so much for all the STARZ!!  Hope to see you again soon.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great find, right off The Drive. Good atmosphere,vintage look,  really good beers on tap. To go as well, and Salty Lobster is a great addition. Plus they have a great snack style menu. The staff is very friendly, attentive and enjoy looking after the guests. And the owner, Andy,  has years of experience in the hospitality and food industry. Really knows what he is doing and what will work. Especially during these challenging times we are in. We live in White Rock, but it is well worth the drive. It is our Go To place when we are in Vancouver.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Rick for the support and kind words as well as all the STARZ!!!  very much appreciated, come back and see us again soon.

detailed_reviews.review_text: The staff here are so incredibly nice and welcoming! Come for the beers (they re amazing) but stay for the vibes!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey H H, thanks for the STARZ and kind words.  Well pass it along to the staff and hand out some high fives!!  See you again soon.

detailed_reviews.review_text: My partner and I have been coming to East Van Brewing Company since they opened and we have never been disappointed. The food and beer is great, and the staff are lovely too. Plus the atmosphere is very cozy. I recommend ordering the porter and the lobster grilled cheese!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Karilee, thanks for the support and all the STARZ...youre amazing and we appreciate you!!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great selection of beers and a fantastic atmosphere... whats not to like??  Make it a must stop on your next craft beer crawl!!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for all the STARZ Glenn!!  We appreciate the kind words and support, see you again soon.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great beer and food. The patio is amazing! The lobster roll is packed and full of flavour.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Dion, thanks for all the STARS and kind words.  Hope to see you again soon!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Love to enjoy a flight of beers here. Good selection. Staff is friendly and knowledgeable. Cool space with lots of room. Courtesy plugs for electronics makes EVB a perfect place to refuel and recharge if you re near The Drive.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey John, thank you for the support and kind words plus all the STARZ...much appreciated!!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Best stout in the city and its not even close
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Drake, we think so too!  Thanks for the STARZ and herea to a few stouts in the bear future!!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Despite living in the area, it took me a few years to get to this place. And now, I feel like I had been missing out. Every beer I tasted was good. The venue is large and spacious. I love the industrial look of this place, wood beams, polished concrete, exposed cinder blocks and conduit lights on the wall. This place also serves food which is a huge bonus.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the stars Zhi!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Visited in mid afternoon Saturday, tables were starting to fill up but we got one easily. They check vaccine cards and ID which is always good to see. I got the new hazy IPA that the server advised was their first day serving it - was amazing, highly rated and would get it again. My partner got the nitro stout and loved it! Many know about the shortage of Guinness coming into Vancouver atm and he was delighted to find somewhere that served something almost as good as Guinness and can be bought in cans, well be returning to stock up for Xmas time. Would definitely return.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey B C, so glad to hear you enjoyed it all.  Thank you so much for all the STARZ and awesome review, we appreciate it very much!!  you are welcome back anytime.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Really enjoyed my time at East Van Brewing, diferent types of beer, and nice atmosphere to meet some friends.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: apologies for the slow response, we appreciate the feedback and hope you come back to say hi again!

detailed_reviews.review_text: I went to try out Salty Lobster Shack here for the first time mid week. The food was delicious, service was excellent and went the extra mile with an issue that happened after I had left the premises. I was presented the incorrect bill unbeknownst to me, most likely due to a staff shift change. Which I absent mindedly paid without verifying since it was an E-bill via a tablet. I did reflect on it later after seeing the bank confirmation sms, but didnt bring it up with East Van. They actually had noticed it later also and had already issued a refund which I got on Friday. I never brought it to their attention, they went ahead and did the right thing. Thats honest, top tier service right there! The gesture was very much appreciated!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Godfrey, we very much appreciate the kind words and all the STARZ!  its nice to get recognition and nice to hear that our staff are going above and beyond!  see you again soon.

detailed_reviews.review_text: What a great place to spend a Thursday evening! The food (we had Mediterranean and Cuban paninis) was delicious, the service was all smiles and friendly, the craft beer on tap was excellent, the non-alcohol ginger-beer was especially yummy. And the live music was excellent, entertaining but not drowning out the conversation around the table. Would def recommend this place. Just off The Drive in Vancouver.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the great review Marilyn!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great selection of beers and a nice patio. Perfect for a cold beer on a hot day.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the support and for the STARZ!!  come back soon!

detailed_reviews.review_text: I was there yesterday and really enjoyed my beers after work but more interestingly a shadow passed behind me in the washroom blocking out the light briefly. I don t believe in ghosts but it did add to the interest of the place. Zero explanation to how that happened but I ll be returning  for the pilsners more often now that I m curious.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Quinn, we are happy to hear you enjoyed the beer.  thanks for the support and the STARZ, very much appreciated!!  as for the shadow, we dont know what to make of that but Happy Halloween!!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great beers to start their new brewery! 7 selections and they have flights of 4 and 6. Small food program sourced from a selection of local providers. Really nice room, bright and airy. Cool branding as well.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Devin, not sure how we missed you but apologies in the crazy slow reply.  Thanks for the support and love...much appreciated, hope to see you again1

detailed_reviews.review_text: Awesome tasting variety of beers! The place is spacious and looks really cool. Great for group events or a casual pint or 2 at the bar. Love the beer to go, the have very reasonable prices. EVB one of the best breweries in Vancouver and a must visit for any brewery tour.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for this great review!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great beer. Chill vibes. Awesome hang out spot and staff. Always reccomend a visit when in the area.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great location, awesome operators and really good beers. Servers come to your table and they have bee hives on their roof and use it for their beer. How cool and tasty is that ?! Highly recommended if youre in the area or not! Worth the trip!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks so much for the support and feedback, we think the bee hives are super cool!!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Very balanced beer choices,  great food. Excellent service.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Miguel....Thanks for the support, kind words and for the STARZ!!  very much appreciated.  see you again soon!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Awesome place for a beer or to grab and go. They have something for every beer drinker, and a range of new styles or twists to keep things interesting. Great place to walk from the Drive or pull over when driving through east Vancouver (lots of free parking nearby).
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Spencer, thanks for the STARZ, kind words and the support...its very much appreciated, see you again soon!!

detailed_reviews.review_text: A great spot, good selection of beers and the lobster shack food is tops! Give it a go, the space is nice and large, everyone that works there (that I have met) are very nice.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Noah, thanks very much for the kind words and all the STARZ!!  we appreciate you and your support, hope to see you again soon!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Came in on Sat night for the first time. Very cool place and great beer.. especially enjoyed the lager. my server (robin) was very knowledgable & friendly. I am new to the city and she gave me great info on the vancouver craft beer scene
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for stopping by Maggie, we appreciate the kind words and the STARZ!!  we will pass along your praise to Robyn as well!

detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Jean Francois thanks for the stars!  Murphy will be happy to see you the next time you come by!

detailed_reviews.review_text: The picnic benches outside were perfect.  Spread out nicely and the Southern sun kept us warm. Andy, one of the owners is super hospitable and we will definitely be back.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Janice, we do really appreciate the support and the kind words...and the STARZ!!  cheers!

detailed_reviews.review_text: I organized a beer tasting party where we went to 6 breweries. This one was by far our favorite. They reserved tables for us and were able to accommodate our rowdy group. The beers were incredible and the staff were so nice to us.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Cheylene!  We are happy that it all worked out.  As we dont take formal reservations we do our best to try and accommodate groups when they can give us notice.  Thanks again for coming in!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Craft beer and Main Lobster Roll - you cant really beat this combo in Vancouver. The service is spot on and even though the beer selection is small it never disappointed. Especially the partnership with Saltys has boosted this place recently.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Pascal, thank you so much for the kind words and all the STARZ!!  we appreciate you and the support, come back anytime!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Very nice place, good atmosphere. Plenty of homemade   and good food.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Avner, thanks for stopping by and giving us all those STARS, see you again soon!!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Please go. Beers were ok, I mean not the best, but really ok. The barmaid was the best I ve ever had. She was so fun, we were doing the east van brewery tour, she made our night. Would recommend 100%.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the stars Patrick!

detailed_reviews.review_text: I love this beer personally, and sent my clients East Van Brew s for Christmas. Best gifts ever. Great beer, good people. Buy local. Support small business.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Chris, really appreciate the STARZ and support!!

detailed_reviews.review_text: The most exciting menu, and one the best vibes in East Van. The foodtruck looks amazing in the middle and foods are tasty. Parking is fairly easy to find in the neighborhood
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Hasan for the kind words and support, we are very happy to hear that you enjoyed it!!

detailed_reviews.review_text: I came in here with some friends on Saturday night. The place has a really good vibe and great beer. Highly recommend the scotch, which is apparently one of their top selling beers. Will defiantly go back.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: M Bhatti, apologies for the slow reply.  not sure how we missed you but we appreciate the love and support.  we have a new batch of beers since we opened and hope that you come down and give them a try...cheers!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Very nice selection or beer and a much bigger space than a lot of breweries in Vancouver which I like. Service here is super attentive and friendly, i will definitely be comingback.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Travis for the kind words and support.  We appreciate it very much! Hope to see you again soon!

detailed_reviews.review_text: I really like this place: the beers are great, the vibe is good and the snacks delicious. The beers here seem not those fruity flavoured brews or ultra hoppy IPAs...plenty of places already serve that demand well. Here, what they have are excellent (what I would term) traditional ales...not as hoppy, darker brews. And theyre really, really good: the kind of flavours youre likely to taste in the UK (though obviously served at North American temperatures....sigh). Though I live in Port Moody, walking distance from brewers row EVB is my go to place to fill the growlers. The vibe here is great: down a few steps (theres a handy elevator for those less mobile) and with a few mates it definitely reminded me of some bars in London....sink a few pints*, grab a snack and sit down for a few hours of banter. My only issue are the pints (hence the *). I really hope that EVB move to using proper pint glasses instead of what I think are more like sleeves. Every time I grab a beer Im thinking I REALLY wish youd serve me a proper pint and not this short measure #nomoreshortpints Otherwise, well worth a visit. Take your empty growlers and fill up too.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the review Brian!  And for the stars!   Give our GM a shout info@eastvanbrewing.com regarding the glass sizes.  The glasses we have are 16oz which is a US pint but shed be happy to chat with you!  Hope to see you back at EVBC soon.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Amazing service from this place, and delicious beers! We went with a bunch of annoying kids and they didn t even flinch. Highly recommended.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Matt, you are welcome to come back anytime.  We appreciate your support and the STARZ!!!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Saltys lobster roll was perfect!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Loring, well pass that along to the Saltys crew...by the way, how was the beer??

detailed_reviews.review_text: I have been here two times, once in the evening and once in the afternoon and I really enjoyed the outside setting and inside and the servers are always really sweet and helpful. Will definitely return!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for all the STARZ and kind words, very much appreciate the support!  See you again soon!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Really enjoy this place. Great beer and nice ciders too, good atmosphere. Staff were friendly and helpful. My boyfriend and I will be back again.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Heather for the great review, support and all the STARS, hope to see you again soon!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great beer, below average meat board, warm pretzels  . They have an amazing community initiative where you can buy a beer for someone in advance and leave on the board for them to claim later.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the stars Ada, and the feedback on the meat board, we will work to try and improve it!  Come back soon!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Drake was cool. Made us feel welcome and took great care of us. Great vibes and great beers.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Kerry, thanks for all the STARZ and kind words.  Well give Drake a double high five for being awesome.  See you again soon!!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great vibe, good selection of beers. Tonnes of street parking. Lots of Patio space and the Lobster Shack serving up goodness!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Derek, thanks for all the STARZ...very much appreciated!!  hope to see you again soon!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Awesome brewery, a decent selection of beers. Really nicely laid out bar area. Does serve a small selection of food. They do growler and carry out selections at a good price as well.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Daniel for the review and the STARS, much appreciated!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Best craft beer in Vancouver ;)
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the STARZ Adam!!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Ann-Elise (if that s how to spell it) was an unreal server. Also, we ve been to a lot of bars. We were given the best beers of mankind (2 each).
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Malcom, thanks for all the STARZ and support... Very much appreciated!!  We will pass along a bunch of high fives to Annalise for being her usual amazing self!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great spot, excellent beer, very cool staff, dont forget to get your credit card back though...Im retarded.  On the plus side I have a good reason to go back and fill my growler.  - Fraser
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks!

detailed_reviews.review_text: I really like this place. Vibe is super chill, its kinda like hanging out in a friends basement   hazy pale ale is top tier!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Bailey, thanks so much for stopping by and super nice of you to give us all the STARZ.  We appreciate you and your support, come by again soon!!

detailed_reviews.review_text: fun place to try new beers and their selections are huge! Recommend getting their flights so you can try different flavours :)
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Michelle for the review and STARZ, we appreciate your support.  Come back soon!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Love. they even give you $1 off your first beer when you eat Downlow chicken takeout there! The beers are superb on their own and also with the DL fried chicken
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the stars Vanessa!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Love the vibe here and all the art work. Wonderful customer service and beers.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Jacob, thanks for all the STARZ, kind words and support.   We hope to see you again soon!!

detailed_reviews.review_text: The place has great drinks, a nice aesthetic, an AC DC pinball, some live music, and lovely staff. Ill definitely be back again!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Willem for the review and the STARS, very much appreciated!

detailed_reviews.review_text: My favorite place to buy beer in Vancouver lots of selection all brewed right there great food tables socially spaced outside so people can sit and enjoy a beer and some food in a great neighborhood Sunny patio
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Cindy, thanks so much for the STARZ and the support as well as the kind words...we very much appreciate it!!  see you again soon.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great space for having a a few beers. Lots of selection with a number of award winng must try beers.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the STARZ Chris, very much appreciated.  Hope to see you again soon!!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Very tasty lobster food
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for stopping by Ken, we will pass along your kind words to the Saltys team.  Cheers!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Amazing beer and pickles!!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the review Stephen, see you again soon!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Definitely one of the better ones in the neighbourhood. Quite enjoyed the selections. Great patio and great service. Will be coming for sure!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the review and the STARZ, see you again soon....CHEERS!!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Andy and his team produce great local brews with a uniquely Canadian humbleness ... do not overlook this brewery as they have certainly tapped into some hearts.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for the STARS and review, very much appreciated!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great little brewery. Big fan of their Wheelbite IPA. Seating indoors is a bit awkward but their outdoor patio more than makes up for it.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Ash for the support and the STARZ!!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great service, great beer, great music, awesome ambiance  A Vancouver must! Cheers
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Justine, thanks so much for all the STARZ and kind words.  We appreciate you and the support you gave us today.  Hope to see you again soon!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great selection, fast service , and the space is super large and accommodating. Also, the 6 samples flights are just perfect!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Amine, sorry for the slow response and thanks for the love and support!  See you again for another flight or 2.

name: Black Kettle Brewing Company
address: Black Kettle Brewing Company, 720 Copping St, North Vancouver, BC V7M 3N2

detailed_reviews.review_text: This place was an amazing find. They have possibly one the best burgers in north van and in Vancouver. Great atmosphere and great patio. Staff are nice and helpful and beer menu is absolutely top notch. Definitely recommend checking it out
This place is a gem. Torri was our waitress and she was absolutely amazing and super nice. Beer and Billy burger was also top notch. Definitely will be back.
Great beer and burger deal. I enjoyed both. Friendly attentive waitress, great atmosphere!

A cherished place! A real gem! This place is a weekly gathering place for my family and friends. The environment has a great homey feel. The food is well done ( with a great flare, and drink are excellent is extremely well prepared. My family and I usually travel from Vancouver to North Vancouver to visit this place and will continue to go weekly
Wicked tasty truck food, great place and a chilled vibe! We will continue to return to the Black Kettle.

I love their beers and their food is awesome. Disclaimer: it is pub food, not fancy, but pairs perfectly with beer. I hate going to a brewery and there s no or only sparse snacks available. Dog and kid-friendly too.

Dog friendly patio, delicious burgers & beers, and a Mezcal Mule ON TAP?!?! Ok. Sold. Count me in. Was having a bummer of a day because I got a flat tire on the way to the beach, but thankfully Black Kettle is located super close to the dealers so I turned my frown upside down. Get here before 5:00 because this place gets packed with the after-work crowd. Great hole in the wall, will definitely be back.

Black Kettle is one of our favourite spots on the North Shore. Its a little out of the way but worth the trip. The staff are all very friendly, the service is good and most of all, the selection of beer is great. As good as rhe beers are, the burgers are even better. Do yourself a favour and go check this place out

Hello everyone is my second time in this brewery and I will keep coming to visit, I don t know where to start. Everyone is very friendly, even the dogs. Yes you read it, is a pet friendly brewery extra points for that, the perfect brewery for have a nice date, party with friends or just come alone to watch a sports game. The variety of beer is nice and interesting I haven t try all but for sure I will  one day. Support local come and try don t believe me at all but is awesome good. Last but not least the food perfect
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much Saul!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Best damn burger I have ever had.... Also the beer is fantastic. This place is worth altering your plans for.   The ooot and abooot burger is a thing of beauty.  Better than 5 guys hands down.   Amazing food.

Food is AWESOME, beer is GREAT, and they are SUPER pet friendly. Nice staff. As long as your dog is well behaved and not barking/disturbing others, they are welcome here. Vancouver needs more places like this! We always come back here and it s a fantastic walk to or from the Shipyards. Highly recommend if you re looking for a casual beer and a bite. Fries are so so good!!

Very interesting place! The atmosphere feels more like a pub. The food is great! Deep fried food is always delicious    There are few interesting beer that I enjoyed. I recommend trying the Blackberry Porter. Cheers
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Eric for dropping in ! We are glad you liked the beer and the food ! See you again soon

detailed_reviews.review_text: Large space with lots of seating and tables, spread out very well! Amazing beer!!! Grab a flight or a snack from the food menu, sit and sip on delicious beer, while the food truck out front delivers the food. Easy parking in front, convenient location! Home brews on tap, growler fills available. The design on the growlers and merchandise is fantastic! Dragons, unicorns etc it s fab! The staff and owners are an absolute delight.
Great little brewery. I enjoyed both the slides of beer and the generous portions of food. Easy to park in their location. Very enjoyable evening.

Great little brewery with 8 different beers on tap.  The staff was super friendly and the atmosphere was fun and inviting.  They have a food truck onsite serving a mix of burgers and snacks. Their hazy ipa has some nice fruity flavors and goes down easily.  Their normal ipa is a little darker with a nice malty flavor.  I would have liked a little hoppier profile but overall it is a solid contender. The chicken sandwich (burger) is great although everyone on my group was not a fan of the fries.  They were pretty greasy and had an odd spice on them but other than that the food was pretty solid pub style grub. We stayed for a few hours and there was a consistent flow of people coming in.  It never really got too busy and the lineup for beer was always short and moved quickly.  There were lots of locals coming in for growler fills and grabbing some cans to go as well as popping in for one or two quick drinks. This is also a nice family friendly place and their were quite a few people with their kids throughout the day.  Along with kid friendly, they are pet friendly and there were a few different pooches laying under the tables. The outdoor seating area was spread out nicely and had enough room to not feel cramped whilst ill having a close friendly feel.  The patio has an east exposure so make sure to get there early if you want to catch some rays on the deck.

Came by the North shore in July and this place was bumpin on a Thursday night! Just off the spirit trail; it has Great music, drinks and tasty fast food. Staff were friendly and spent time to talk when they had time. Highly recommend this place. Hidden gem! Also lots of local pets. Kinda like a pet meet up haha.

Ive stopped by when in town, about 4 or 5 times in as many years. Every time, I like it more.  Beers are always evolving and improving. Food is also excellent, far better than most craft breweries that have a truck or two. Ill be back.

Awesome burgers....the Billy burger is my fav...and great selection of food and beer!  And doggos welcome!  Fresh bowl of water for our GSD and she relaxed in the shade and had as good a visit as we did!  Thank you!

Fresh beer and happy people make for an amazing local beer oases just across the tracks form North Shore Rescues equipment cache. Classic burger that is probably the best deal around.  A great beer selection (no cider yet. I blame BCs licensing weirdness) with not too many hoppy beers. Great host with a great sense of humor. We had a fun time soaking up the sun and enjoying the occasional train. A must to check out if youre in the North Shore hood.

Black Kettle: A Dog-Friendly Haven for Burger & Beer Lovers Black Kettle is a cozy brewery/burger joint that boasts an inviting atmosphere and dog-friendly environment. The Tuesday deals are a standout feature, offering mouthwatering burgers and craft beers at wallet-friendly prices. The American cheeseburger with bacon is a must-try, with juicy beef, melted cheese, and crispy bacon on a soft bun. Pair it with a refreshing in-house brew for a truly memorable experience. In summary, Black Kettle is an unmissable spot for burger enthusiasts and pet owners, offering exceptional food, great deals, and a welcoming atmosphere.
Amazing burgers, amazing beer, super dog friendly!  My favorite brewery to take my buddy
This is very informal and happy ambiance, it is in the neighborhood that work and when I saw this place it make me happy. The beer and food is excellent.
This place has been turned around, used to be understaffed and had mediocre food and beer. Much much better now and very decent prices imo. Keep it up!
Great beer, food truck eats are great as well. Covid policies in place as well, lots of space between tables, partitions, hand sanitizer, masks in use, one way markers.
Best burger & beer in town. I just tried their P&J burger and it was amazing.  Thank you for the friendly service and yummy food.

This place is a hidden gem.  The staff are amazing, the beer is tasty and the food is great.  Prices are really good.  Cant say enough good things about this place.  Its a must see for your north van brewery tour.   Make sure you try the black ipa and the Kentucky beer with the fish and chips!
Burger is one of the most juicy ones I have ever had. Beer is very easy to drink too. The place is very dog friendly.
I m sooo glad to find this dog friendly restaurant in North Shore. Friendly staff, good food and to top that, my dog can join me while I m having my meal. Thank you for best service
Amazing beers, food and great staff
Amazing burgers and fries, great vibe on their Tuesday evening promos and pet friendly which is awesome
Great beer, lots of dogs and one of the best burgers Ive had anywhere ever!
Best beer, awesome food and friendly service. Dog friendly.  Loud train, but it adds to the experience.
Nice little spot and patio! Good beers and good food and I met like 6 dogs so cant complain at all! Still a great spot for a drink!

Its an out of the way place with really good beer. Their porter is very good and so is their session ale. They have a good truck outside that serves poutine, fries, cheese burgers, and very good sprouts.
I liked Billy burger. Perfect. Not salty which is good. Petes creek lager was good.
American Burger! Simple, delicious and satisfying! ..and this place is dog friendly
what a fantastic place to stop after work & grab some AMAZING ONION RINGS & a super cold beer - their food truck continues to produce the best onion rings & their burgers are amazing
Amazing place to have a beer and burger.  Kitchen is awesome. Staff amazing. Too bad I can t give them more stars!
It s amazing burger and beers!!! Very cozy place and staff also very nice

We love going to this brewery, it is super pet friendly.  We often meet up with our friends and our pups can have date night, while we have some absolutely delicious food and some of the best beer around.  I highly recommend checking this place out - there is also a dog park quite close so check it out
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much Shelly! See you, and your pups soon!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great place to chill in the summer. Great outdoor patio space. Fast and friendly service. Live music. Delicious food and good beer.
Awesome place for a beer! Note that the current Food menu is not vegan/vegetarian friendly other than french fries and deep fried pickles.

Best burger we ve had so far since moving to Vancouver, and really solid onion rings and seasoned fries. As others have said, they are super dog friendly and all of the staff were really friendly. Can t wait to come back here.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much Christopher! Make sure you check in with our October Burger Fest so many mouth watering special burgers on the menu!

detailed_reviews.review_text: During a 6 month stay in Vancouver, I took it upon myself to visit as many breweries as possible. Tough task, but when in Rome... Black Kettle is without doubt my very-best-favourite - flipping fantastic beers, the best-looking growlers in town and excellent staff. Brewga (their yoga class in partnership with the Yoga Root) was the highlight of my week, although the following morning was usually one to forget after over-sampling the beers afterwards.... Love this place, best place to hang out in Vancouver. No, BC. No, Canada.... Just go. Please go. Its glorious.

Everything about this place is amazing. Best onion rings Ive had in a LONG time. Food was superb, great selection of drinks and to top it off - dog friendly inside and out. Will be coming back again and again.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Adam, see you soon!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Okay, its rare to get me to 5 stars, but they sqeezed it out of me! Attentive friendly service, welcoming at entry, an $11.50 cheese burger that was fabulous! No chincy patty,  fresh made and big!  No holding back on adding tomato, pickle and lettuce either! My fries were handmade and great!  The tap was cold as many craftees serve cool  beer but cold is what we want! PLUS, Full Pouring, not the low pour/bighead nonsense  that permeates so many establishments in Vancouver!  Take your money and taste buds to Black Kettle, they appreciate  you worked hard to earn it.  Go there first! (oh yeah,  they accept cash still!!!)
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Awesome! Thank you and hope to see you again!

detailed_reviews.review_text: First time visitor. Had an excellent lunch and flight of their beers there today with my son. Good service. Tasty beers. Food cooked perfectly. We will be back.

Getting too big to be North Vancouvers little secret, this quality brewery makes exciting beer. Perfect middle ground if you want to hit the Hearthstone - Black Kettle - Green Leaf Western North Van brew tour.
Great beer, great food, chill vibes.
Very relaxed and enjoyable atmosphere great beer and food. Feels like a real neighborhood pub. Dog friendly too
Great place - and dog friendly!!
Beer is very good!  Poeple that run the brewery are very friendly.. They love dogs as well.... Will be going back next time try the food and of course the beer!
Delicious beer, friendly staff and you can get some reasonably delicious food served to your table. Definitely a must try hidden gem!
Great spot was recommended to me The burger is awesome so is the beer and the service Highly recommend
Great atmosphere, great staff, great beer, and best of all dog friendly! I still can not believe Murphy was allowed in. Best experience in a brewery ever.
The best wings we have ever had. Great beer. The hamburgers were delicious and they have lettuce for a bun substitute. The best thing was being able to bring our pup! We will be going back.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Zona ! We are over the moon that you liked our food and beers ! Like you , we love our pups too ! See you again soon

detailed_reviews.reviewer_name: Josh Kepkay   Vancouver Real Estate Today
detailed_reviews.review_text: Awesome brewery featuring creative and tasty craft beer in a very cool little pocket of North Vancouver. Came in on a Thursday after work and found the one and only Kyprios DJing. Highly recommend! Ask Paul for beer recommendations! That guy has forgotten more about beer than most will ever know in a lifetime.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Josh! That $20 is in the mail! lol

detailed_reviews.review_text: Excellent vibe, great food, and dog friendly! Hidden gem in north van 5stars!!! Try the oot and aboot burger, tasty tasty tasty!

This place is a total hidden treasure of North Van. Their beer is fantastic, they have an option to order food via their food truck outside which is very well priced and good quality. The atmosphere is very relaxed and the other customers usually spark up conversation so its a fun place to be. North Van has some amazing micro breweries but this place has blown me away. Highly recommend you check it out!

Very pleasant experience. Great variety of custom beers and various food choices. Prices are just fine. If you have a dog this is the place to go. Dogs are very welcome. All COVID protocols are in place and diligently observed.
This place is awesome! Delicious beers, incredible burgers, and fun ambiance. You re in for a good time if you come to this place!
Everytime I order food from here.... it is OUTSTANDING! Drunken Kettle Smash is a mouth watering burger. Keeps me coming back for more over and over again.
Great vibe Friendly staff Good food & drinks Clean And the best part is that you can bring well behaved dogs! Win win!
Service is amazing and so dog friendly! Best summer spot

Food and fresh beer are very good. The guy making the food is real nice. Only issue is the woman (on Sunday) serving and pouring the beer seems to have had a bad day. She couldn t be any more disinterested in answering questions or serving customers. We will definitely return and get some growlers

Good beer, nice people blah blah blah. Dude they let me ride there long boards around, then I got into a heated one V one ball hockey game against a real hockey player (I crushed him). This place is so fun, and they actually make there own food unlike all the other breweries that have those exact same outsourced bar snacks. Needs another bathroom, or if you need some tools you could definitely steal them when pooping. Love this place!
Love Hazy IPA and Pale Ale!! Definitely come back for that.
Tucked away in a corner of an industrial/commercial area, this space feels good for beers! Grab a bite from their food truck or just a pint!

Love this place. Its a regular go-to for me and my wife. Theres a good range of beer, super relaxing atmosphere and friendly service. To the fool who complained that they sat at a table without service, its a brewery, genius. The appeal of a place like this is that you dont have servers coming around pressing you to buy more. Show up, head to the bar and try something new. Great little North Van gem.

Super friendly staff, that explained the beer brewing process and gave samples to help explain and show the difference - incredible customer service. The food was great. Will totally be advertising this gem of a brewery that folks need to fo check out! Thanks Black Kettle staff!
Awesome brewery! Even more awesome Staff! We had a birthday party here, and the service was incredible. Very glad to have this brewery in our community :)

North Vancouvers hidden gem:) Ive read some other comments.... Clearly Karens. This place has a great selection in beer and the food truck is insanely amazing. Extra Bonus points.... Super dog friendly!
slow service..but there was one server. she did a great job
Great local spot. Tasty beers and Offspring pumping on arrival. Sensational.
Nicely renovated, updated beer menu and a friendly new manager, not much else one can ask for.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Appreciate it Thorsten! Hope to see you again soon!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Stopped in for a quick brew.  Friendly staff, good beer.  Let my dog hang out inside as patio was closed.  They are dog friendly! Will be back.

Its the bomb. great beer, great price, and on the walk to the seabus. Get the fries its the biggest pile of the  best seasoned double dip fries in Vancouver. Dont blow it and skip this spot. Oh but dont forget about the beer. Their Kentucky uncommon lager is the tastiest most easy drinking beer in Vancouver.
Best burger I ve ever had

Sry to hear about someones bad experience but my experience was awesome! Admittedly it wasnt as busy when we went but the bartender offered us samples, chatted with us about the brewing process and the different beers, and the wheat ale was amazing (also the white IPA was pretty good considering Im not much of an IPA fan!). Looking forward to their stout in the winter :)
one of my favorite burger spots in North Van! amazing
The beer is yum, the food is yum, the staff are awesome (even tho some of them are Aussies  ) and they are killing it with the outdoor set-up. Well done, folks! See you soon.
Terrific burger, great beer and friendly staff.
Great atmosphere, great food, and really great beer!

Absolute hidden treasure of the North Shore. I mean it as no disrespect to the other breweries on the North Shore (they are all great!) But Black Kettle is the crown jewel of the microbrewery scene in North Van! The service is kind of unconventional but in a weird and wonderful way that makes you feel at home.
hidden gem, the food is fresh and delicious, good collection of beer

Local brewery. Good vibes and chill. People stop by with their dogs while on a walk on the spirit trail along the water. Live music on Wednesday. Food truck. Typical pub food! Burgers, fries, wings etc.
Burger unbelievably good. I mean off the chart good.

Its a small place currently, and only offered two types of beer on tap when I visited, but the variety I tried was quite good (Sadly, I cant remember which). Person that was tending the taps was also quite friendly too. edit: Their Oatmeal Stout is very good, too.
Awesome beers and fries - we purchased a groupon and the deal was well worth it and a great way to check out a local brewery.
Great food, great atmosphere, and great staff! Very happy to have a dog friendly place in the neighborhood!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks so much Omid! See you soon!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Good beer, pub eats, dog friendly and nice atmosphere
Great spot for dogs, burgers and beer.

Great beers and great staff. Probably the best IPA I have had.   Doesnt have that wanna be hipster vibe.  Feels like having a beer in your buddies garage.  My new watering hole.  Keep up the great beer making guys.
For me as a foreigner it was a great experience. Its like you go to your friends garage and have fun. Beers were good, especially IPA, you can also buy beers for your way home.
Amazing brewery and good food too! Patio is dog friendly! Kevin was super nice and friendly!!
Great beer selection and very tasty burgers
Great beers and good food! On a dog friendly patio. The American cheeseburger tastes just like an In and Out burger
Excellent beer and the new bar with added options is scheduled to open in 6 weeks (tequila on tap....definitely worth waiting for and checking out)

I dont always walk around in this area of North Vancouver, but when I do, I always make sure to stop at #blackkettlebeer, the best beer on this side of the tracks! Im Chris cola and I approve this message!
Great beer! Their American Cheeseburger reminds me of In and Out. Covered patio is dog friendly!

name: Superflux Beer Company
address: Superflux Beer Company, 505 Clark Dr, Vancouver, BC V5L 3H6

detailed_reviews.review_text: This brewery is one of the most modern and sophisticated breweries I have ever visited. I had tried their beers before and knew they were good, but I was blown away by the size and style of their brewing facility. It was massive yet very sleek and stylish. I loved the tasting room and sampled several of their beers, leaving me satisfied. I also bought some glassware to take home, and I use it often. I want to revisit this brewery as they update the tap quite often. Thanks for the great experience, Superflux!
Very nice brewery in east Vancouver. Airy, bright with plenty of seats. Enjoy the assortment of IPAs. I got the happyness and it satisfied my beer craving. Service was prompt and nice.
My personal favorite brewery in Vancouver; dog friendly and it has the best beer. Patio is fun, and the food is delicious (always ask about the special popcorn of the week).

The best beer in Vancouver hands down.  Their IPA game is on point.  I was happy to be able to visit them on the first day of arriving and had sampled their offerings previously. My ONLY gripe is you cant purchase single cans and only 4 packs... for those that want to sample all the to go offerings, you either walk away empty handed, or empty walleted.. regardless, their hot dogs are fantastic and their beer is the best you will get in Van.

Wow! I was told to go here by a friend as they told me the beer was amazing.. but I ended up staying as the staff were the best! So knowledgeable and sweet. It was a perfect rainy Saturday afternoon. Special shout out to the manager Sabrina (I think that s your name-sorry) she went over and above taking care of us!
Beautiful interior, good selection of beer, every beer we tried is quite special.

Frequent visitor to this brewery because they make some of the best beers in BC by far - consistent when it comes to taste and quality, particularly for juicy IPAs. Only downside is the service can be disappointing and unwelcoming, sometimes it feels like they genuinely do not want you there. EDIT: Great communication post-review - all concerns were addressed and upon my next visit, service was excellent as desired! Have upgraded review to 5 stars :)
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Anant, Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback.  We are disappointed to hear that your experience has been out of line with our service standards and would like the opportunity to look into this further. If you have the time, would you be able to send us an email to info@superfluxbeer.com, so we are able to follow up on this issue? Thank you!

detailed_reviews.review_text: I ve never been to the brewery but my god their beer is extraordinary.  I pickup cans in a few private LC up in Squamish and am always floored how good it is.  The Pug east coast IPA may be the best beer I ve ever had, and Ive had thousands all over the world.

My third fave craft brewery around Railtown! It s ALWAYS busy and bustling inside (prepare to wait!). There s also lots of plants for the indoor houseplant lover to gaze at (check out their gigantic birds of paradise!). They have gourmet hotdogs ($13+) if you re hungry and happy hour beer+hotdog combos on weekdays. Fave beer is the Jellystone; hazy IPA, a tinge of sweetness, so easy to drink. Also bought the canned Pretty Much Yeah to drink at home and didn t love it as much. Superflux Lager is super easy to drink. Also had Happyness, a West Coast IPA. Definitely recommend the Jellystone if hazy is your thing.

Been doing a tour of all brewery in town. Superflux has really good IPA as they advertised. I recommend to drop by if you are like me, looking to try all the craft beers. The staffs are friendly, much nicer than other brewery that I have been to. Weekend was packed.
Slick brewery with a covered patio, indoor seating, can off sales, small food menu, other options if you cant have beer. Staff was quick and friendly. Great stop for friends and family.
Stopped in to try some beer and ended up even having a hot dog was lots of fun to see the brewery
Superflux is so great. Staff/customer service goes above and beyond; drink and food are superb. Baby and pet friendly. Zero complaints! Love this spot.

Superflux is superflucking awesome. They make such delicious beer, the tap room has a great atmosphere, and service is just right. What more could you want? So far my favourite is the Key Lime Cobbler beer, with Manana and Blacklight being close behind.

Great place, with great (surprising) tasting beers. I had a hard time chosing my next beer, and the waiter gave us small samples to help us decide. There is plenty of space, both inside and outside on the (covered) patio. Because of the covered patio, it can get VERY loud, making it sometimes difficult to hear what my friends were saying.

Some unique flavours in a hip new space. I had the creamery (strawberry cheesecake). Its hard to complain! Didnt get into the patio but it looked nice. The breweries are crowded in the area but theres always room for this one!

Great spot to grab beers with friends. They have a very unique selection of beers and it is a cool space inside as well. Made a bold move to get a hot dog and was 100% satisfied, definitely recco grabbing one to compliment the drink.
Excellent selection of beers and tasty hot dogs.  Highly recommended.

The hot dogs were decent, a nice change from an average dog. But thats not what gets them the five stars. Honestly my wifes deluxe japa style dogs are way better. But I digress. Its all about the beer. I had the Jellystone, which was very juicy, almost like a pineapple juice. But a very fresh and refreshing summer drink. Loads of flavour and goes down easy. Low on the bitters, even palatable for a non-beer drinker. Same goes for the Colour and Shape, which my wife ordered. I felt that one was slightly more muted than the Jellystone, and closer to a summer beer. Very enjoyable. The vibe of the place was very chill. Dog friendly, and great service. They know the drinks well and are able to recommend something thatll work for you.

One of the last additions to Yeast Van, but these guys were gathering a rep even before they had their own place. Look no further if you want to drink very good Hazy IPAs, Fruity Sours and Lagers. These guys are one of the best in town and the atmosphere is pretty cool as well.

Back in 2014 I tried superflux when it was being brewed out of Callister and I knew it was something special.  Fast forward 9 years and I get so excited to see their well deserved success every time I come by here.  The beer is just always exceptional. On my most recent trip I tried the Creamery Key Lime Cobbler. It was exceptional and played games with my brain with its very well done layered flavours. Come seasonally, the selection changes and honestly you ll find something pretty cool each time you come by

Talk about their IPA s!! They really know their stuff. The staff is so friendly and are so knowledgeable on the beers. The range of IPA s they offered was impressive, and each one was bursting with bold and unique flavors. Whether you re a seasoned IPA enthusiast or just getting into the world of craft beers, you re in for a treat here.
Great beer and friendly staff. The food served at the brewery is also amazing. Highly recommend to try their salads.

Nice atmosphere here. The waitress got all five of our drinks for us without even writing it down which was pretty cool. The menu is basically an assortment of ipa so you won t get to choose from much else on their tap.
Delicious! Only Canadian place so far with a true hazy IPA

ranked one of the best in BC for good reason. the beers are well-made and delicious, and the food (especially the hot dogs) is great. dog friendly and the best staff. a vancouver gem in a crowded field.
Solid beer, but kind of an odd vibe in here. It s not very relaxed or welcoming to be honest. That s very subjective so I would not knock down a star. Attentive service.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Brittany, we d love if you could share more about your experience at info@superfluxbeer.com. Thanks!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great selection on tap and to go. Hotdog was tasty AF. Happy hour is a must.

SUPERFLUX!!!  Not traditional at all, German brewmaster a would be appalled, but I love it.  A lot of really tasty fruity hazy beers to and a memorable Stout - chocolate, coffee, smoky scotch with a Camel nofilter.  Indoor bike parking.

Fun. Honestly, this place does a really good job of changing up there beers, so any comments I might have wont be evergreen. Worth noting: they add/ rotate in at least one new IPA a month and their remaining non-evergreen beers seem to be seasonal.
Fabulous beers every time! If you love the IPAs, this place is for you. And take some home too.
One of the really great brewery taproom experiences in Vancouver. Every beer was excellent, the staff are all fantastic and the space is beautiful.

Very nice venue, nice and open concept and beers are to my taste. Havent tried the food so cant give you feedback on that. Having said, you go for the beer and if youre into IPA then this is the place.
Great brewery, great beers! Can t wait to come back and visit again next time I m in Canada!

Wow! Awesome beer with super unique flavours. We loved the Coconuts IPA - nice hops with warm notes of coconut water. Not too strong and super delicious! We also tried the Honeydrop Pale Ale - rich honey tones with a little bit of a hoppy taste. The tasting room itself is super cool and very comfortable. Super friendly and welcoming staff! We can t wait to return and try some more beers on their patio!!

What can I say about Superflux? It s basically the perfect place. Large, bright, and clean with the loveliest staff! The beer menu is large and has something for everyone, the chef will change your life with his take on flavor. You ve probably never been excited about kale before, but you will be once you try his kale salad. It s a miracle! Please stay open forever!

West coast beer tour continues. On this family day weekend my date and I hit the Super Flux Brewery. Wendy s fav new beer is the Orange Creme Fountainbier. Light and citrus....this is a hot summer  must have . Too bad it doesn t come in cans!
Cool design! I love their peach gummy one, especially the aftertaste

This was likely tied for my favorite Brewery in Vancouver during our trip. We planned to only try a beer each here on the way to other places but that quickly turned into multiple flights to try the most amount of product. I do not remember her name but the bartender was extremely helpful and even provided us lists of places to visit while we were in Vancouver. Her recommendation for Pizza Coming Soon was spot on.
One of the best in Vancouver, especially for IPA lovers
Favorite brewery in BC, the IPAs are all very smooth and hoppy, other types of beers were all good too, highly recommended

Was chillin in east van and I went here and enjoyed some great popcorn and the scent matched the scene xoxo gossip girl Also bring back the Carolina gold and make white cheddar popcorn a permanent staple

Definitely in a league of their own when it comes to breweries! They have it all, patio, inside seating right in the heart of the brewing process. Also, snacks and mains, hotdogs and salads, and the best IPA s in lower mainland!!
Interesting atmosphere, tried a few beers and was impressed, havent tried the food yet, but looking forwards to future explorations of the menu!

One of the nicest breweries I ve ever been to. Lots of light wood and plants for decor more upscale than is typical. Wide selection of beer options. I had a delicious Tropical Fruit Smoothie. Nice little food menu as well. The sweet and spicy edamame were so good. Plates going to other tables seemed to be generously sized.
Their peach gummy and key lime beer (contains lactose) are super delicious. Tastes exactly what they sound like

If you drink IPAs (and even if you dont), drop everything immediately and get to Superflux. Honestly, I cant decide which of the deliciously hazy and easy drinking IPAs are the best, but theres no way to lose here. I have purchased my body weight in the Cans To Go (today, Creamery edition). Great vibes, amazing staff and hip atmosphere.
Great beer. Great service. Very attractive staff! Have the Big Mac Dog, you wont regret it!

Some of the best beer in the city and great atmosphere. They have some pretty unique drinks that are unlike anywhere else that are always worth a try. Would be a great spot for a causal first date. I bring all my friends who visit the city here!
These guys make the best beer in BC, hands down. Glad I got to make it to the brewery. Superflux should be your first stop when in yeast Van.

BEST BEER I HAVE EVER HAD. Every single one of their beers is unreal (IPA s for days!), and they use interesting and innovative ingredients and collaborations to keep things exciting for their customers/fans. Their tasting room in Vancouver and restaurant (Cabana) in Victoria are incredible, offering quality food and beverage, a beautiful atmosphere, and knowledge staff. Highly recommended.
Would have rated 5 stars but they stopped making Primodelecto Edit: upgraded to 5 stars on review
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi James, Thanks for your feedback. Primodelecto is one of our rotating beers that we make, it is actually set to be re-released toward the end of December. If you sign up for our newsletter, you will get an email notification a couple days before the release. If you have any questions, please feel free to send an email to info@superfluxbeer.com. Thanks!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Superflux is definitely one of my favourite brewies in town. Their beers are adventurous, fun and delicious. They also have a great chef in the house making some of the best salads and food in town. The only hesitance for  me to promote them is the fear of it getting busier. Also, I think they are doing a good job with maintaining distance and wearing masks for everyones safety. They sell cool t-shirts as well.
Top notch beer. The atmosphere and vibe could be better though. Must go if you want to try one of the best beers in Canada.
Great beer, great staff & lovely atmosphere
Amazing and welcoming staff, great beers. They are very welcoming of kids and dogs too! Really cool space inside, also has a great patio in the back in the summer.
Great vibe and service, nice space, tasty hotdogs, awesome beer, cool merch. Nuff said.
Some of the best beer in town. Always a good time, great hot dogs and service.

This is the best brewery in Vancouver by far. The beer was amazing and the staff is super friendly and helpful. Im so glad I found this place as I will be coming back for sure. If you like amazing beer, good food, and great staff then you wont be disappointed.

This place has an nice open concept style with and nice close family feel ( nothing like a hotdog to make you feel like you part of the team) and the staff knows the menu well. Staff not afraid to give you the right choices to take you to flavor town for the night. My take away is this vancouver watering hole is a top tier stop for a  nice day drinking day or a wonderful place to start  a bender

Great food, great beers and gluten friendly options aka cider! The staff are always super friendly, very knowledgeable and welcoming. The place is very nice inside, esp for a brewery. The outdoor patio is a bit loud but def worth it, especially if you have dogs!
Amazing food, service, and of course beer! Weve converted many friends to Colour and Shape and visit the tasting room every time were down from the Okanagan. Could not recommend more!
The breakfast beer was amazing!!

So glad Superflux finally has their own space! After years as a legendary pop-up brewery, they have opened a full facility, including a tasting room, and they have done it right. It is a beautiful space with excellent service and a tasty if limited menu. I love their beers and they are even better fresh, compared to canned. This is destined to be a favorite hangout.
Super tasty beers, must stop at location during a brewery tour
Superflux Color and Shape is my favorite Hazy IPA. I buy it any chance i get! Dont make it out to the tasting room very often but its a sick spot to go to for sure.
Fantastic tasting room and truly the pinnacle of IPA artistic expression

Everytime ive been to Superflux ive been met with friendly staff, amazing beer, and an incredible ambiance. Really nothing to complain about. These guys make some of the best hazy IPAS in Canada but people often forget how good the lagers and sours are. One of the best breweries in Vancouver hands down.

Great beers, great design, enjoyable space, and dog friendly! One of our regular local breweries when in need of refreshments on a hot day. The patio is nice place to relax, but we also enjoy sitting at the front window to watch the cars go by.
Great atmosphere, staff and pints. What else do you want. Oh wait. The popcorn was great

A wonderful selection of beer, especially the orange cream. The food was absolutely wonderful. We had the braised lamb neck and it was the best I ve ever had. The pickled vegetables were amazing as well. Highly recommended for both food and drink.

Great spot - very cute patio, beautiful large indoor space with a comfortable atmosphere. Industrialist aesthetic. Fits the vibe of the neighborhoods. Great beers. Cute menu and decent assortment of snacks. Had great service on a busy Friday night.
Very clean and modern ascetic. Interesting beers on tap and a few items to nibble on as well.

Showed up with my 1 year old daughter for a quick bite and a pint.  It was quiet, so we literally had the run of the place.  Sarah and Leah were extremely welcoming and very friendly!  Tasty beers, as per, and some good food.  Will be back for sure.  Cheers!

Stopped in just for a couple 4 packs, have never been before but was recommended by a friend. Cringed a bit at the high prices but after trying a few samples of a couple different kinds of beer I was sold. Extremely tasty and worth the price in my opinion. Employees were very nice and helpful, looking forward to going back and trying all the other kinds!

Amazingly friendly staff and hands down the hoppiest well balanced IPAs Ive had in Canada. They saw our dogs outside and let us know they are dog friendly, so in came both of our talkative huskies who were greeted with treats and lots of pets. Love these guys for not only their beer, but their attitude!
Great beers! Friendly staff! Feel at home! :)
I am a craft beer fanatic and their Indulgeousness imperial stout is one of the best I ve ever had. The layout is also very cool - I wish I lived in Vancouver so I could go back regularly!

Holy moly is this ever the PROMISED LAND: - Staff are amazing. AMAZING. It s a bunch of individuals with their own brands and they re all amazing in their own right. - Beer is spectacular. If you rank Vancouver as a beer destination on the world stage, a significant contributor to that ranking is attributed to the S-tier grade that Superflux deserves - Food is otherworldly. You simply cannot go wrong: if you showed up hungry and didn t leave sated, you messed up. - The music. Whomever is choosing the playlists  needs to win an award. It s all the deep cuts. All the nostalgic hits. All the things. - If you happen to come in when Dennis is around, a standard 10/10 Superflux visit gets a rare 11/10 grade because Dennis is one of the best humans in the city. Summary: Come for the beer. Stay for the bangin  playlist. Revel in just how darned great each and every personality attached to Flux is.

People here are super nice, dog friendly at patio and front of store, amazing beers, cool merch:) I absolutely love the heavy fruit (smoothie beer) and both their indulgeousness beers. Def my to go place to grab a beer now
The beer might not be my favorite, but the staff there are some of the best in the east van micro brew community... Hey Superflux...its me :)
Absolutely loved the aesthetic. Service was great and their beers were all very delicious. Highly recommend. Theres merch that they sell if youre interested in taking home shirts or totes.
If you like hazy dry-hopped IPAs, this is your place!
Came in yesterday with a last minute group of 12. They were super accommodating and sweet, and the service was terrific. The edamame were the best I ve had. Great recipe. Will be back!

Vancouvers kings of IPA just opened their very own brewery and tasting room. Top notch beers, with a heavy bent towards all things hoppy - Superflux have spent years honing their craft as roving brewers, and finally have a space to call home. And what a home it is. A large, beautifully crafted space, boasting stunning lines and interior design. Great location, centrally located in East Van among a bevy of other craft brewers. The food program is focused on gourmet hot dogs, with a wide range of toppings and flavours.

One word - WOW, fantastic service, amazing beers, atmosphere? 15/10!!!!! Shoutout to Amy and Tyler for making this experience the best night of our lives, from the moment we stepped through the door! Absolutely will be back (i wish everyday)
Great beers! Tried a few and picked up peach gummy and Ohms. It was perfect. Lovely atmosphere and the staff were very kind and fun!
Awesome selection of beer and food. Please take note of the alcohol % or you may be in for a surprise.
We brewery hopped (as tourists) across Vancouver and the beer here was the best we had. Delicious IPAs and fruit ales. 10/10.

Beer is always on point, and the food never disappoints. Staff is always friendly and helpful as well. Theres plenty of seating available but there might be a lineup to get in on weekends. Make sure you grab some cans to go.

We tried a couple of their IPAs as well as the Ranch Hot Dog. The hot dog was tasty and the ranch dressing on it delicious! The IPAs we tried we re all great. The room is spacious, clean and full of friendly faces - highly recommend!

Amazing staff everyone is so nice and accommodating and they have all the right covid precautions. The owners are fantastic too we met one of them in the brewery. Great beer, beautiful brewery. Would recommend
Good beers with a ton of unique brews. Great food here as well.
Hands down the best IPAs in the city. Their space is so beautiful and we cant wait to have beers inside again! A welcome addition to East Van breweries.

One of the best breweries in Vancouver now has a tap room! Tasting room to come soon, but for now their program is cans and hot dogs. Superflux has been around for years, originally brewing out of Strathcona, a few blocks away. Their bread and butter offering is hazy IPA. In my opinion, they can do no wrong. The only things I haven t liked are their take on a stout, cream soda, and coconuts IPA. Otherwise their repertoire of NE IPA & NW IPA are great. Collabs, great! They did a Pilsner with four winds, also great! Diablo cookie inspired collab with Tacofino, you guessed it... also great! Looking forward to the tasting room, but for now I m super happy to have a HUGE supply of their rotating favourites in the neighbourhood. Check them out!
One of my fave craft breweries!
Super friendly! Great to be welcomed by such nice people. Excellent beer, beautiful tasting room. Please, add some vegan options to your food menu.
Super flux might be my new favourite brewery. The vibe of this brewery is up my alley and I hear they have great food as well. Must try is their coconut beer and the other ones are also amazing.

The short: - visited once in Jun 2021, and loved it. Will visit again - loved their hazy ipas, and friendly service The long: - beers: 5 stars. Loved their hazy ipas (velvetone, color & shape, pretty much yeah). Like the 3 different pour sizes. They do not offer flights. - service: 4.5 stars. Staff was friendly, responsive, actively kept our alcoholic and non-alcoholic glasses full. We experienced one minor, negative incident while waiting outside however, hence not 5 stars. There was no queue and their covid info signage (outside) instructed to come inside if there is no line, so we did. But one staff member asked us to then go outside and asked us to  read the sign , as he thought this was mentioned in the signage. He repeated the quoted statement twice which I felt was condescending and unnecessary. Then I pointed out to him that the instructions are different from what he said, which he then accepted and apologized. - ambiance: 5 stars. Decoration was minimal, nice, and clean. Lot of seating. Restroom was clean. - parking: no dedicated spots that we could locate but street parking available. - covid measures: good, staff wore mask, had sanitization stations.

Cute new brewery with some tasty beer. Lots of IPAs but also other beers that theyve collaborated on with other breweries. Food menu looked aces but didnt try anything. Bathrooms were pristine, not a stitch of graffiti. 9 thumbs up.

name: Dogwood Brewing
description: Small, laid-back brewery crafting organic beers, with tastings, growlers & made-to-order pizza.
address: Dogwood Brewing, 8284 Sherbrooke St, Vancouver, BC V5X 4E8

detailed_reviews.review_text: Fun small space. Enjoyed the IPA and the London fog beers. Very nice tasting room friendly service.
Thought wed pop in for a quick pint, lovely staff and delicious beer!! Next time we will come hungry and try the pizza
Such a fun brewery! Incredible live music, great pizzas and the best staff! Cant wait to come back

Pizza and beer special was fantastic. You HAVE to check this space out. Easy and free parking. Awesome feel of the space. Great decor. Friendly staff. The organic London Fog, Honey and Fest are my faves to start. Cute spot.
Dogwood is a bit out of the way but definitely worth the trip. Its a small, funky comfortable brewery with a small but very well done, well thought out selection of beers. Definitely recommended.
This is a gem, an easy-going tasting room with wonderful personalities staffing the bar. A great place to laugh, drink good beer and make friends.

One of the best beer i ever taste! Great place to take a break and enjoy a great beer! You have to taste all the beers because all are great! The roast beef sandwich was delicious. I will Back soon! Cheers

What a little gem!  Service was very friendly, food was tasty and oh ya, the beer.... fantastic!  Light, amazing flavours!  Very unique flavours at that  .  We loved it and took some home too!  So worth looking up and stopping in.  Cant wait to sit outside on their patio

Hidden gem in Vancouver. I often visit Dogwood Brewery I play pool   most of the time, but they ve plenty of board games too. Mim and Julia are really kind, they both work really hard to give excellent customer service. Must visit if you re in Vancouver. Food

I was pleasantly surprised by this place. I did not expect to find a brewery in this area. The inside is on the small side, but they have done a lot with the space. They have an ample selection of board games to play, with long tables designed for social interaction. For having locally sourced organic beer, their prices are quite modest. I definitely enjoyed my first timer experience here. Without a doubt, this place is an excellent choice to either lose track of time with your friends, or to just stop in for a quick pint after work.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Rob, Glad you enjoyed your visit.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Tremendos ipa. Excellent malty lager. Snacks unexpected and taste good. Brilliant little hole in the wall brewery. Clean establishment with very nice people working there. You really won t be disappointed. London fog is my favourite.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks JB! Hope to see u back soon!

detailed_reviews.review_text: An unexpected gem: Great beer, great staff, great vibe. Despite being in an industrial estate, it has a nice outdoor area. Dog friendly.
Organic beer that is fun and tastes great! Larger patio that is dog friendly. Lots of room inside as well for small and larger groups. Clean, great atmosphere for all ages.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Ashlee. Look forward to seeing you back soon!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Brewery in the middle of nowhere, but definitely worth the trip.  Small brewery, only 4 beers on tap, + guest tap.  For a small brewery, was impressed they do a lager.  Some of the bigger craft breweries don t do a lager because they are harder to do.  Not only does Dogwood do a lager, it was quite tasty, with hints of earl grey tea and vanilla.  Staff was super friendly, pleasant, knowledgeable.  Next time I m in Vancouver, I m definitely going back.
