Amazingly unique place. Sitting on a quite street near marine drive they offer in house brew & in house freshly made pizza. Has lot of space to sit in. Decent parking lot. Apart from beer, They serve pizza, samosa, chips.
I was really surprised to like an organic brewery. They rotate taps slowly, so lots of time to get to know their offerings. That being said, if you like something, stock up. Nothing lasts forever.

Awesome little brewery in a more industrial part of Van. Proper little pizzas made in house to accompany their delicious beer. Trivia nights and pub games add depth to this out of the way, but awesome addition to the craft beer scene. Nice size room, warm and inviting. A couple seats outside in their parking lot, nothing to write home about but nice to chill in the sun regardless of surroundings.
Wish there was more food options. Beer is generally good and service has always been good and friendly.
Good vibes, music not too loud so people can actually converse. Good beer flavours. Theyve got board games!
Delicious variety of beer and a nice locals vibe, quiet area with a large indoor space!
Great place for a chill    .  Loved the vibe and their collection of crafted beer
The first place Ive ever had a tasting flight where I liked all the beers on the flight! Service was very friendly and the flat bread pizza was good!

loved the vibe here! the employees were super nice, and drink prices were very reasonable. the board games they provide are the classic ones like monopoly and scrabble, had a good time playing them with my friends! Such a great hidden gem :)

My partner and I have been coming to this brewery for a few years now. We absolutely love the beer and the staff is super friendly and welcoming. Feels like a family. Great environment and they even have board games! The coconut Chai is my favourite craft beer of all-time, so good highly recommend!!!
Worth the trip! Great organic pizza, flavourful organic beer, good tunes, boardgames, great staff. Cute tasting room setup

Ive been here over and over. Beer is great, the service is great. Ive seen the owner twice and he really cares about his customers and makes sure they have a good time. Ive seen him provide free beers and hold quiz nights,  getting everyone involved. On one visit, my friends werent sure where they wanted to sit, he opened up another part of the brewery so we could be seated there (and there was a foosball table!)

I was pleasantly surprised by Dogwood. A little out of the way (away from the main Van microbrewery clusters near Main and Broadway and in East Van), but it has a good selection of unique brews with reasonably priced flights. They have indoor and outdoor seating, board games and a Foosball table. The pizza was good too. I would go back.

Very happy to go back here again. A little chilly to sit on dog friendly patio but had a good IPA and a good pizza flatbread. Played some crib, enjoyed great service and look forward to visiting again.

This is the best craft brewery tasting room / hang out place Ive been to in the greater Vancouver area.  Groups of people playing games at their tables, its bright and you get service where you sit.  Nice work Dogwood! That was my review a few years ago and it remains the same today.

Very friendly, welcoming and enjoyable staff. And a few of their beers are my absolute favourites like the london fog, and coconut chai. Perfect spot to get together with a few friends and try some new unique beers !  And not to mention their pizzas are great and along with a few other snacks  Would highly recommend
Nice little craft brewery in the heart of Vancouver. Order the craft flight!

Dogwood Brewing is a wonderfully unique venue in South Vancouver. Located on a quiet street just off SE Marine Drive, this charming brewery has a amazing selection of local and organic beers, a cozy bar & tasting room, friendly staff and an overall fantastic vibe!  And even if youre not a beer drinker theyve got a great selection of ciders and other specialty drinks.  I highly recommend their new alcoholic Kombucha brew!

Jill and Astrid were amazing! I have learned, sadly through experience, not to expect much in the way of service from Vancouver Breweries. Maybe it s just me but I seem to run into the all to familiar hipster that looks down his nose at you. Not these two ladies! They were friendly and patient. Answered all our questions with a smile. Our whole group was impressed! Karaoke night is not usually a draw for me but the staff made it fun and we ll all be back! Great job Dogwood! A hidden gem off the beaten brewery path but they certainly left the attitude on the other side of town.

LOVE coming here! brought my mom with me for a mom and daughter date and we had such a good time. Our server Jill was exceptional! she kept us smiling thats for sure. i would recommend Dogwood brewery to everyone!

Awesome little gem of a place hidden in the south Vancouver neighborhood.  Great selection of beers, served in a very relaxing and well set up venue.  The staff were very helpful and funny to talk to about the history of the brewery. I highly recommend this little gem of a place for a visit.
Nice low key place in a quiet area. The made to order pizzas are a good pairingnwith the beer.

Dogwood brews delicious beer, and makes very good flatbread pizza. Their located in an industrial area close to the knight street bridge, its a cozy place with some old pub benches. I recommend trying the stout variations, they were all good! Staff are super friendly too!
Just the nicest servers - so friendly and helpful. Lots of regulars makes this place feel really homey and fun. Great vibes and delicious beer - and the pizzas are great, too!

Bruce and I love our regular visits to Dogwood - the beer is amazing and the atmosphere in the tasting room is super friendly and relaxed. London Fog!!!!!!  They do some awesome events here so keep an eye open for those too. Sunday is happy hour all day, great way to end the weekend.

Cool little brewery a little out of the way but I love the community feel when they did their pop up shopping day and had local makers set up their booths. Their peach ginger ale was yummy too even though Im not a regular beer drinker :) thanks for the cool event!
My friend ordered 2 kegs of beer during a summer party in 2016, it was excellent, so I ordered a keg for my Christmas party.

Very friendly service, nice space and decor, clean bathrooms, bunch of board games, live music night, menu looks great, and the beer is yummy. Close to the Stolo/Fraser River path for a nice walk after.

What an inspiring brewery for an aspiring brewer such as myself! The mission statement and values of Dogwood Brewing speak loudly about the people behind the scenes. Fantastic staff, warm and welcoming, talented brewer (Claire), and high quality beer!! The best stout Ive ever had was from here! Will most definitely be coming back!
Such a great experience! Amazing brewery and beer selection, super friendly staff and a homie local vibe! Will be going back!

London fog, coconut chai, the stout with a bit of a hint of sour almost were absolutely flavourful and delicious. Not often does a beer truly taste and smell SO much like its ingredients but whoever the brewmaster is .. does a killer job!!  The owner Greg is an absolute gem as well. Stoked to support such a quaint and charming little spot in south van!
Great space, great beer. The London fog is particularly phenomenal, if you can get it while its in stock. The stout is Smoky and awesome, and the coconut chai is unusual and wonderful.
Great TASTING ROOM with lots of selection. The comedy night was loads of fun. Cant wait to catch a few rays & have a cold 1,2,3 on the patio.
Incredible beer and great pizza! Service is very friendly and an overall great atmosphere. Highly recommend.

Great little tasting room off the beaten path in south Vancouver. Tried the London Fog and flatbread. Beer was amazing and not at all what I was expecting. Parking was easy, the place was clean and the staff were polite and friendly. Can t wait to stop by again next time i m in the area!
Great experience at Dogwood Brewing. Our server (Jill) was incredible! She was super fun and extremely helpful and on top of things despite it being a busy night! Thanks for the great service Jill.
Warm and friendly neighbourhood tasting room. Super friendly great staff ..and beers for most palettes.
These guys are doing a killer job! Their main beers are always good and their seasonals are always creative. Their custom Pizzas are great too. And really most of all... Friendly knowledgeable staff.

I honestly thought after having my son last year, I wouldnt be able to enjoy a beer or any alcoholic beverage again. I broke out into hives or got very red after a few sips. But than a friend introduced me to Dogwood Brewing. Not only does the beer taste amazing, its organic and I had no issues. I thought maybe it was just a 1 off. But I now have tried the Honey, their IPA and their pineapple cherry sour. Every one of them was delicious and unique. This brewery will now be my only beer selection by choice.
Excellent beer. Quaint neighborhood established. They make some tasty beers. If you live in South Van, this fine craft brewery is certainly worth enjoying.
Very hidden gem, this organic craft brewery is first of its kind and has a great selection to sample. Although it has a small seating space, I hope it will be discovered and enjoyed by more people.

Vancouvers only organic brewery, Dogwood also is the only brewery in South Vancouver and the only local brewery with a female brewmaster! Facts! Great beer and cozy little tasting room. They host different events and also have one of the most beautiful growler designs in town!   Plus, Boombox Brewing now shares the brew space so you can get beer from both breweries when you visit.
Great little hidden gem! Beer is unique and super tasty, and the staff are very helpful and nice :) I always stop by when in the area!
Had the Amber and it was great! Not tart and not too heavy. Had the pizza special which was decent as well. All in all a great experience.
Great beer, great food and friendly people. Couldnt ask for more! The pull pork (done in one of their homebrewed beers) sandwich is a must try!

Great Beer, friendly staff, this is an untapped gem, go here, try their beer, youll thank me later, also its organic, theres none of those gross pesticides swimming around in these sweet suds. Try the Rum Ball Stout,  its quite great!
Really top notch beer at extremely reasonable prices. Cozy little environment and friendly staff. Just an all round well run business and community.
Dogwood is neither a dog or wood, but ultimately its a fantastic spot to have beer and play dogopoly.
Beer fantastic. Staff excellent.  Need to create some kinda of atmosphere would be 5 start.  Highly recommended for local organic beer.
Its a tasting room, not a pub, so their menu is limited to snacks like chips or pepperoni sticks - as well as *really* good pizza.  Most importantly, great beer.
Great beers, delicious pizza, and a chill environment. Great place to come and grab a drink and play some of the  board games they have in the tasting room.
Great service and great beer! So glad this is the closest brewery to my work, worth the trip if it isnt close to you!
Very happy now w a few visits to Dogwood .. Keep up the good Beer n Service a fun little corner tucked away in S van
Such delicious beer! The staff are great, and theres a sweet outdoor patio!
Hidden gem. Stumbled upon this place and always go for a cheap growler fill and friendly staff. Nice music and food as well.
Fantastic! Beer and pizza were excellent
Great beer, good people, what more do you want!! Also have a great patio tucked away in Vancouver.
This place is way off the Vancouver craft beer trail, but is worth a visit. Tasty beers, a fun atmosphere, and the snacks/pizza I ve had were good.
Good prices for happy hour. Very cozy little space. Excellent beer. Will be coming back.
Servers were friendly, fast service and good ale. They provided food for the staff at the pop up market there.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Chris!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great place to have a quiet conversion. No too loud music. Beer, pizza and service are excellent
They have amazing beer and fantastic staff! The coconut chai blonde ale is such an original and delicious treat!
Attention to detail organically crafted beer is a real art Claire has it mastered. First-class Organic craft brewery well Done.
Great people - and great beer! We often bike here even though it is tucked out of the way- its worth the trip!
Great beer, especially the London Fog! Friendly staff also make coming to Dogwood always a pleasure :)
Great place to end a bike ride, sit in the sun, and knock back a few beers.  Food is tasty too!
Well crafted beer and good customer service.
Nice hidden brewery.  Multiple flavours and has food.
Great little place with really unique brews, super friendly staff, and the pizza is top notch
Tried this beer at Chipotle in Langley randomly and wow was it a good combo! Been buying six packs ever since!
Great spot with tasty beers and a fantastic atmosphere. Friendly staff and good vibes.
I love this place! Great selection of beer. Have to try their London fog beer
Service was great, beer was top notch, will absolutely be back.
Good beer, good hot sauce, awesome staff. Theyre like the Citizen Kane on laserdisc of south vancouver breweries
Great beer and even better service, defo a place to hang out frequently.
I really enjoy this brewery for their beer and friendly staff. Their London Fog beer is delicious!
Great tasting beer at a great price
Amazing creativity with flavor, loves the pizza and dog pics!!!
Great beer and super friendly staff. Ive been many times and will keep coming back
Nice atmosphere, great friendly staff, good selection of beers. All in all, perfect!!
Only my second visit. The beer choices are excellent!
Great beer, decent food, awesome staff and great atmosphere!
The 20oz (mass) might not be on the menu but it is available.  $9.20 after tax.  So good.
The honey style lager was pleasantly good taste...nice place to stop for a cold one..
Casual place, super friendly staff.
Great beer and delicious pizza. Well worth a visit

name: Nash Moving Ltd - Packers and Movers Companies Vancouver

owner.name: Nash Moving Ltd - Packers and Movers Companies Vancouver (Owner)

detailed_reviews.review_text: Was recommended Nash Moving and they did not disappoint. This was my first time using movers, and it was worth the money. They were very efficient, knowledgeable, professional, and friendly. I didn t find any damage in my units, all my items arrived safe and sound
I had a great experience moving my apartment. Nate and his team were very personable and professional, and most importantly, nothing got broken.
Second time my family used Nash Moving Ltd. and again it was 5/5 service. Super friendly, reliable, and generously accommodated my change in plans. Highly recommend.

I cant express how impressed and pleased and happy we were having these guys helping us with our move. Being a realtor I got Nash Moving recommended to me by another realtor. Then I tried them on my clients first and my clients were extremely happy with their service. Then we hired guys for our own move. The guys are working  so hard and so fast and we didnt have a  scratch neither on our furniture nor on any walls. They gave us over 40 large packing bins for packing (returnable), so we didnt need to get any boxes.They wrapped everything and they were working like machines. Yet, their prices are more than reasonable based on quality of their job and the timing. I always recommend Nash Moving to my clients for moving and to my friends and other realtors as well. Next time we move, Nash Moving is our to go company. Way to go guys! You definitely changed the way this industry works! Have you heard of people tipping movers before? Neither did I :)) And we sure did! These guys do amazing job and fully deserve to be tipped. Thats how great they are! We recommend Nash Moving for your next move!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Awesome, thanks Olga!

detailed_reviews.review_text: I used Nash Moving and Storage for a rather complex move, involving the sale of 2 homes with different closing dates, all items from one home being placed in storage for 3 months, and then moving out of the second home and moving all items into the new home over a 2 day period.  Nash Moving handled it all with ease, even making a last minute schedule change with no complaint!  The took great care of our belongings, securely packed, wrapped, padded and protected everything, and put it all back together in our new home.  They came ahead of time and quoted me on the move, were very competitive with their pricing, and they charged EXACTLY what they quoted.  I wouldnt hesitate to use Nash Moving & Storage for future moves, and gladly recommend them to anyone that asks.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Awesome, thank you Devin!

detailed_reviews.review_text: We have used Nash Moving Ltd. twice now for 2 major moves!  Both times we have been extremely impressed with their level of service & professionalism!  All their employees are super friendly and hard working!  Would definitely use them again in the future as well as recommend them to anybody I now looking for movers!  Thanks again!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Fantastic! Thank you Shawna!

detailed_reviews.review_text: We hired Nash Moving for our recent move from Vancouver to Nanaimo. Hands down, this was the best team of movers we have ever worked with (and weve moved quite a few times over the years!). Pricing was reasonable and transparent, communication was easy and clear, and the move itself was smooth and stress-free. Everything was loaded up efficiently and safely, and then delivered quickly and without a scratch. And the moving team was totally fun to just hang out with! I cant recommend them enough.

Im really grateful for Nash Moving Ltds services. They offered me a really good deal for the amount of work done. Nothing was broken during the move, which is a miracle, in my opinion. They are professional and they got it completed in a timely manner (other moving companies, in my experience, waste time sitting around trying to get even more money). This company is a company of integrity, one that can be trusted, and one Id definitely use again in the future.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Great to work wiht you, Tavia!

detailed_reviews.review_text: I hired Nash moving to help me move my one bedroom apartment this summer. They were very easy to work with, provided a quote over the phone after a virtual consultation that was super convenient, there were no hidden costs and they were by far the most affordable option I found.  The moving day was smooth, they worked well with the building security on both sides to accommodate covid elevator requirements etc and were friendly as fast. The dissembled and reassembled my large furniture and packed and unpacked my closets in minutes using wardrobe boxes.  Working with Nash saved me a ton of time and stress. I highly recommend, and told me realtor to refer his clients as well because my experience was so positive!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Wow thank you so much!

detailed_reviews.review_text: We had Nash Moving do our move during the summer. They came and packed our whole apartment in about 3 hours - that would have taken us probably 2 weeks full time! They were super quick and careful with everything, had a good sense of humor and were  also very respectful. The move was also quick and easy. The boxes they packed everything in make it so much easier to move and unpack too. They left the boxes for 1 month so we could have time to unpack, which was very convenient! Overall, a great experience and would recommend them to anyone!! Service: Moving-related packing
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: haha, thanks Andrea. We do love to pack!

detailed_reviews.review_text: The team from Nash Moving helped with a move this February and were fantastic! The crew arrived and moved out of a busy downtown apartment, navigating the single elevator booked for the move, and four storage lockers downstairs. The crew moved everything with care, and made sure everything arrived safely and carefully. They even heled to put some awkward furniture into a tricky crawl space in the new home. Cannot recommend them highly enough, efficient, safe, and friendly.

Used Nash moving to move condos and I was very impressed and would highly recommend them! They were professional, on-time and did a fantastic job. I had an issue with getting my treadmill apart in time to move it and they were kind enough to go back for it at the end of the move.  If I ever move I would be using their services for sure!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Glad to hear it, Lynette. WEd love to work with you again!

detailed_reviews.review_text: I used Nash moving in September 2020 for a move out to the suburbs and the process so very simple! I got a quote on the phone,  we video called so I could show them around my apartment and all the things that are going to be moved and I got a quote the very next day.  I accepted the quote and they showed up on the date. the move was seamless! they were very careful with all my items and wrapped necessary ones.  They disassembled my bed frame and reassembled.  I couldnt have asked for a more stress free moving day! the price is very fair and there were no extra charges beyond the quote.  Thank you again, I 100% recommended Nash Moving!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: We 100% recommend you as great customer, Lindsay!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Nash Moving was recommended by a friend, and they didn t disappoint. The frog boxes made things so much easier, and the crew was professional, did a great job within the expected time, and were cool people. No surprises, and we paid the guaranteed quote which was fair value for the job done. I hope I never have to move again, but if I do I ll use Nash!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: WEre here whenever you need us, Roland! lol!

detailed_reviews.review_text: I could not be more happy and pleased in every way with the service provided by Nash Moving Ltd. They were everything you could hope for and more. A friend of mine heard about their expertise and professionalism and mentioned them to me. Everything was shrink-wrapped and moved very carefully asking me where I wanted each piece upon arrival. One doesnt expect a mover to show personal kindness and thoughtfulness if you are having a particularly bad day. It was due to these unforeseen circumstances that I had to phone Nate and ask if he could possibly move more items on a day during which he had hoped to just relax. Nate and company are the best and most likeable movers I have ever used and Im now a senior! Nate is not only more than obliging he is compassionate too. It is perhaps this part of his personality that is as valuable as his moving expertise. I have never been in even a remotely similar personal situation before but Nates kindness made such a difference in my day. Thank you so very much Nate! Just in case any readers might think this is a marriage separation or problem within causing my grief please know that this was not the situation. I will be recommending Nash Moving Ltd. to everyone I know when they need a professional, reliable mover in every way! They do not come any better!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Doreen!

detailed_reviews.review_text: The best moving experience I have ever had. They are amazing! Needed to move in a hurry and Nash moving made it happen. Friendly professional reasonably priced and stress free. Nate even took apart and put my bed back together for me!  I highly recommend Nash moving!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Tracie!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Ive had a fair number of poor experiences with movers in the past, so Im ecstatic to have found a quality team like Nash Movers to help us move from Vancouver to Port Moody. (And will definitely be a return customer when we move in the future.) These guys know their business. More importantly, they demonstrate a real concern for excellent service throughout the experience. From start to finish, they were both professional and friendly, and they showed great care with our possessions and about timing. When youre buying a new home, in particular, the last thing you want is to have to worry about the movers. Nash earned my confidence and kept it from start to finish.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Wow thanks you so much, Colin!

detailed_reviews.review_text: I cannot say enough about Nash Moving Ltd. We were recommended to them about 5 years ago from a friend when we were moving, they went above and beyond and were so professional, respectful of our belongings and super quick and efficient! We just recently moved again last month and there was no question who we would use for moving day. We reccomend them to everyone we know and their experience has always been the same. My Brother and Sister in law are using them this weekend for a move and they messaged me today to just say how great they have been with their communication thus far. Thanks again Aaron and the rest of the Team at Nash Moving we will forever spread the word of how great of a service you provide.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for trusting us with your family!

detailed_reviews.review_text: This was the first time I used NASH and from now on it will be the only company I ever use. The guys were on time and so friendly and professional. They were careful with everything even my antique furniture(+100 years).  My husband packs very heavy and there were no complaints from the guys. They completed the move on time and left no mess. Next time I may even get them to pack for us. Very reasonably priced too, exactly as quoted.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Fantastic, thank you, Margaret!

detailed_reviews.review_text: I moved yesterday and I wanted to share my experience. Overall I had a great experience and I am so happy that I ve decided to use Nash movers. They provide & deliver boxes that makes it super easy to pack. My quote was done on a video call and it took less than 5 minutes. They came in time and where very professional. Super fast and efficient (I had used other movers before that took double the time to do the same job). They also picked up the boxes within one day of me texting them. I am very again very happy and totally recommend them :)
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Romina! It was our pleasure!

detailed_reviews.review_text: I had an amazing experience with Nash Moving.  Nate was professional, responsive and went above and beyond!  Their prices are competitive and I highly recommend this company for anyones moving needs.  Thank you Nate!  Susan Fuller

I have used Nash Moving for my last 3 moves. They are quick and very professional! I also recommend getting the reusable boxes as part of your package. They get dropped off before your move and picked up after you are done unpacking-super convenient!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: We appreciate you, Catherine!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Weve had a wonderful experience moving with Nash.  The quote was transparent, crew were friendly and they move stuff real quick.  Those boxes they provided were awesome and we didnt have anything damaged after the move.  Highly recommended!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Great to be of service to you!

detailed_reviews.review_text: I m so happy that I decided to go with this moving company. They were fantastic to work with and moved all of my furniture carefully and efficiently. About two weeks prior they dropped off 75 bins that I would never move without again. It saved me so much time and money not having to build and pack up boxes. They wrapped our fragile furniture and unwrapped it at the new house. They were careful and the move went smoothly. Communication was top notch. I can t say enough good things! I would never use another company. Thanks guys!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Wow thank you!

detailed_reviews.review_text: The Team at Nash are the best. From the quote, to the reusable boxes they let us borrow, to everything on the day, these guys were amazing to work with. Their price was locked in from the first quote and it was so great to have the peace of mind of no hidden charges.    These guys are amazing! If we ever do another local move we will use them again for sure!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Great to work with you, Stephanie!

detailed_reviews.review_text: What a wonderful moving experience! Nate and the crew took excellent care of me from dropping off my boxes to picking them up .  My move was a bit tricky due to complications with my condo parking but Nate went the extra mile and went overtime to make sure everything was perfect.  The movers are so professional and personable and I will recommend them to everyone.  All my belongings arrived in excellent condition and was delivered with a great attitude.  Thank you thank you thank you.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: No, Thank YOU!

detailed_reviews.review_text: I have had bad experiences in the past with movers but Nash Moving Ltd squashed all my fear.  Amazing customer services before and after!!  They made my move 150% stress free.  They even got rid of my junk!  I ve recommended to my friends who also rave about their services! I am not planning to move anytime soon but I guarantee when I do, they are the first call in my list!!!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you, Chantale!

detailed_reviews.review_text: My friend had referred me to this company.  I had not moved in many years and this was a big and emotional move for me.  They were extremely professional and very compassionate, hard working and kind.  I needed help setting up a couple of items cause I lost my tool bit and they were so helpful.  They moved my items with care and protection and nothing got damaged.  They took extreme care in handling items that were delicate. I highly recommend Nash Moving and if I ever need to move again, I will only use them.  They are absolutely amazing.

Nash Moving just moved us from Surrey BC to West Kelowna. They were fantastic. The quote was fair, they gave us tons of boxes and got everything out and in in excellent time. They are a great to work with. Id recommend them to anyone who needs a moving service.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Really appreciate it!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Nate and team are a great bunch of guys!  Very polite, on budget, no damage to any of our prized possessions.  Not that we are moving again any time but would definitely use Nash again!

These guys are phenomenal... I ve moved nearly a dozen times in the last 10 years, and by far this was my most positive moving experience. The team that came out were super funny and personable, and were also total bosses - they easily did things that the last movers said were impossible (removing door to apartment to get my ridiculously large couch out, for example). 5 stars is no exaggeration, would definitely book with them again. Super fair pricing as well.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Glad to help, Gina!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Nash, came recommended for me, and Ive since recommended them to everyone I know for good reason. I cant say enough good things about Nash. Beyond their price (which was the best quote), I liked the fact that they actually hire the same team of movers (many of them were all childhood friends) rather than random daily paid labours people. It was huge to have movers I trusted. The blue plastic moving boxes were a game changer.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the review! We really appreciate it. Those blue boxes really are like cheating :D

detailed_reviews.review_text: Nash Moving took care of me through a local move from Burnaby to Richmond. They were wonderfully efficient, and were able to help make a stressful move much smoother. Everything arrived in perfect condition, from the massive steel bookshelves to the IKEA furniture! I wouldnt hesitate to use them again for another move.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Great to hear this. Thanks, Brittany!

detailed_reviews.review_text: We used Nash moving to move us out of our home of 29 years, first into their storage facility, and 5 months later, into our new condo. They were always reliable, were careful with all our furniture and belongings, and pleasant and courteous. We loved the blue boxes they supplied, used their services to pack our most fragile kitchen and dining room items, and   were very pleased in all aspects of both moves. Nate was very accommodating when we found out on short notice that we could book an elevator for our new place. While we paid for our storage monthly, the second part of the move to our new place was included in our original quote to move us once into the condo directly. The flexibility and full service options were perfect for our situation. Highly recommended.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you, Bram!

detailed_reviews.review_text: After having a terrible moving experience with another company, we found Nash, and have since used them for 2 moves (yes we need to stop moving). Nash was professional with both moves, and gave us a fair quote. I have recommended them to all my friends!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: WOW! Thank you, Erin!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Excellent communication all the way, and they wrapped up all of our valuables with padding and plastic wrap, including our couch, wardrobe, TV, paintings, etc. Our whole one-bedroom apartment was moved in a half-day and nothing was missing or damaged at all. We were very happy with Nate and his crew.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much, Adam!

detailed_reviews.review_text: I found Nash on Facebook. I reached out to them for a quote and within a few days we had a video walk through a a quote. The guys were great. They were super professional. We had A LOT of stairs at the condo and no elevator...we didn t hear one complaint from anyone. They were quick and efficient and listening to a some great through backs. We would and have recommended Nash to friends.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Love it! Thanks Stephen!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Over all a great experience. Guys showed up on time. They were fast, efficient and professional. The men we dealt with were very friendly and polite and handled with care. They have a very professional booking system and get back to you very quickly. The price I had discussed over a video call conversation and there were zero hidden fees.  Ii would definitely put in trust this moving company with my stuff and highly recommend them!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Glad to have been of service, Carly!

detailed_reviews.review_text: We have used Nash Moving twice and both times they have been great! The have great customer service and are friendly and professional. They are always on time and very efficient. I would highly recommend them!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you, Sheena!

detailed_reviews.review_text: The service was professional from booking to moving day. The guys handled everything with care, and had all the right safety protocols in place to ensure to keep everyone healthy and safe! I highly recommend Nash Moving!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks, Denise!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Nash Moving did a fantastic job on our move. Professional and well priced. I would use them again in a heartbeat and always recommend to friends.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Awesome! Thank you!

detailed_reviews.review_text: These guys were awesome !! Super friendly and fun and know how to move efficiently. Moving can be stressful and hey made it easy! They were very careful with my stuff!! They wrapped everything Well and took their time to make sure nothing was damaged. They were great when they delivered they were kind enough to ask where I wanted everything. I would recommend them to anyone that wants an eco friendly way to move with a very fun crew!!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Than you so much!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Aaron and Nate are rockstars!! Theyve helped me out twice so far, and definitely will again in the future. Ive never had anyone move anything of mine with such care and diligence. Their prices are also very, very fair. I cant say enough good things about them both!! Thanks again for moving my very heavy aquarium on such short notice. :)
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Just had a very awesome moving experience with Nash Moving today, they arrived early and brought everything over carefully and rly professionally! Will recommend!

There arent enough words to describe how amazing they were. Right on time, respectful of my belongings and the building, kind and considerate, great price. What an amazing moving team! I highly recommend them! 10 out of 10. What a breath of fresh air in the moving industry.

When my wife and I moved in March during the pandemic the team was fantastic, they showed up on time 9am in Langley, loaded a 5 ton truck to the brim using their unique HEAVY DUTY blue packing tubs, carefully loaded our furniture and had it delivered and in our new condo in Burnaby by 3pm. The price was beyond fair and exactly what they quoted with NO HIDDEN Fees. I highly recommend this company, first rate service!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: So glad we could help! Thanks Nate!

detailed_reviews.review_text: If there was a 6th star as an option, Id immediately give it to NASH Moving! My husband and I HATE moving! (who doesnt?) But moving with NASH was the first time where we found ourselves ahead of schedule, drinking coffee (since we didnt need to help at all), and laughing. Seriously - the NASH team was having a good time and telling jokes, and my husband and I actually LAUGHED! Thats a huge testament to the difference with using NASH versus the other companies weve used in the past, where our stress levels were above maximum (and there was no sipping coffee or enjoying a good joke). I always recommend NASH and plan to never do another move without them. Theyre fun, fast, efficient and so strong that I dont have to worry about being helpful as a 52 person. They gave us moving containers in advance, disassembled all our furniture for us, and then reassembled it upon arrival. We were fully moved into our place and unpacked within a week, thanks to all the awesome help and perfect moving strategies. Thank you so much!!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: With 6 star customers it makes it that much easier! Thanks Jen!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Best moving team in the city. Ive worked with and along side these guys, I usually do repairs for movers, but Ive never had to fix anything for Nash because of the level of detail they put into each move.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: haha awesome! Thanks Justin!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Nash is my go to moving company every time. They are professional and always a pleasure to work with. 10/10 recommend!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Awesome! Thank you, Paula!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Nate and his brother are great at what they do I was stuck when my bedroom flooded They picked my furniture and stored it for one week Great job guys! I highly recommend Nash Moving
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Jerri! Glad we could help you!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great group of guys! Everything went smoothly. The owners Nate and Aaron bent over backwards for us. They brought us more crates when we needed more. They accommodated us when we had to change our moving date last minute. If youre moving, hire these guys!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: AWESOME THANK YOUI!

detailed_reviews.review_text: The best moving company we have ever dealt with! Employees were happy and very professional. Not only was ours a hard move, but the communication was excellent and the price was great. They were so helpful and did a fantastic job! Highly recommend this company.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Anne!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Nothing but good things to say about Nash Moving. Were about to use them again and also referred our daughter to them as well. Hassle-free, on-time, professionals!

This company has the experience and service to handle the most demanding moves. Great team and super nice guys take great care of your most prized possessions. Finding such a service driven moving company was certainly a pleasant surprise. Thanks Nate!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Nash moving was so accommodating, helpful, flexible and very efficient!  Would highly recommend them to anyone! Will definitely use them on our next move!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Awesome! Thank you!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Nash moving helped us with moving our office. Very accommodating, quick and efficient. Reasonably priced comparing to competitors and no hidden fees!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks again!

detailed_reviews.review_text: They are an amazing moving company that I have used for years.  Even my parents and friends have used them, and they provided excellent service every time.  Friendly and trustworthy.  I will be happy to use them for my next move!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: We do love referrals! Thank you, Michelle!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Nash showed up as promised. Did great and smooth job plus some extras in getting rid of donating items and stayed right on their quote. Will recommend them for sure.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: We guarantee our prices! Glad we could go that extra mile for you!

detailed_reviews.review_text: I used their move service. Very professional and hard working team. Their estimates were reasonable and  great work makes them leading service in Lower Mainland. I recommend this service to everyone. Thank you for providing excellent service. Keep it up.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: We sure will, Nayanesh!

detailed_reviews.review_text: We used Nash for a staging project and they were great. On time, professional and quick! It was a painless process. Will use them again.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Always a pleasure JO!

detailed_reviews.review_text: These guys were good. Period. Everything you could want from your movers-very punctual, cordial and professional. They give you one rate and thats it--no truck fees, mileage fees,  etc. I would recommend all over again!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Viv!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Nash moving has been excellent during my move which was bang in the middle of the pandemic. Nate and his team were fantastic!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks again, Priyanjali!

detailed_reviews.review_text: The guys were fantastic! On time and very professional, they made sure my move was done fast and efficiently. Will definitely hire them again for my next move!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Looking forward to it, Lilia!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Moving is stressful at the best of times never mind during a pandemic! Nash moving made it a seamless process. Thank you !
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: We are using the best safety protocols! Thank you Andrea!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Nash moved my family from our suite to new apartment.  Staff were friendly and personable and the move was done without damage.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much, Taya.

detailed_reviews.review_text: These guys are real pros. Aaron and his team are the best moving company Ive ever had the pleasure of dealing with and I would highly recommend their services!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you, Eddie!

detailed_reviews.review_text: its one of a kind experience! they are so organized and the staff are very friendly. i just recently moved but so excited to re hire this guys on the next moving. love this people.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you SO much!

detailed_reviews.review_text: I highly recommend these movers! They were professional, and were extremely helpful with some very heavy, very challenging items. They made the move much easier and less stressful.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank yuo so much, Kristina!

detailed_reviews.review_text: I cannot recommend this company highly enough. They have now handled two of our moves and gave outstanding service, going above and beyond in difficult circumstances. They are professional, personable, careful, and helpful.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Outstanding! Thank you!

detailed_reviews.review_text: A compete godsend for my last move. Professional, courteous and very friendly. Would recommend them and will definitely hire again for any move I need.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Cant wait to help you again, Jay!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Amazing company. Hired them for my move from Vancouver to Nanaimo and they were very friendly, fast and careful. Everything went great!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Glad to hear it!

detailed_reviews.review_text: I highly recommend them. Their service is great, they are very responsible, honest and professional. They did two services for us and we couldn t be more happy with their job.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Happy to be of service!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Excellent movers. Very careful service and fair pricing. Made my move so much easier.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you, Brooke!

detailed_reviews.review_text: They were excellent for our familys move! Accommodated our needs, were fast and clean! I recommend them highly!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Adam! Was a pleasure to move you guys into your new place

detailed_reviews.review_text: Professional and organized.  Best mover we have ever hired, and we have hired many!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you, that means a lot to us!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Many thanks to Nate and Nathan for all their support!!
Excellent team. They respond quick and provide detailed information. I would say that this company is one to remember. Services: Vehicle transport
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Much appreciated, Aldo!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great Movers, great people! Highly recommend them!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Graeme!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great professional and friendly service will highly recommend them
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Awesome to hear! Thanks, Jeff!

detailed_reviews.review_text: I am impressed with their professionalism and efficiency.  Thanks
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Reasonably priced, well organized, friendly and efficient.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you!
Thanks Paula!
Thank you!
Thank you Allan!
Thank you!
Thank you!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Worked for these guys for a few months and the owner would literally pocket the tips the customers would give the employees.. Few things I didnt like about the way they moved like not using dollys enough or not having a ramp on the truck to move things easier in and out of the truck and the owner would just brush anything i said off like its nothing. Shady owners.. The other co workers I did moves with were rude and lazy. Would try to make me do most of the stairs and try to do the bare minimum to get away from doing real work. Would not recommend anyone work for this company. Beware!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Its hard to even justify this one with a response! You worked for us for one day and then no showed. Weve been in business for 10+ years and have had employees with us almost that long. They wouldnt stick with us if this was the case. Feel free to ask anyone of my movers what they think of the owners! 99% of them our our friends if not family at this point.

name: Peqish Food Company
description: Healthy, counter-serve eatery featuring sandwiches, salads & baked goods, plus catering.
address: Peqish Food Company, 552 Seymour St, Vancouver, BC V6B 3J5

detailed_reviews.review_text: Love this place! Love how easy they make it for me to choose something healthy to eat even when time barely allows it! The grab and go sandwiches are tasty and I can t get enough of their delicious cookies. I also happened to have attended an event recently and was pleasantly surprised to have found Peqish catered it. Their spread looked wonderful. Will for sure keep them in mind if I need catering in the future.

Company with very strong values, welcoming and supportive. Peqish is a good company to work for. As Key Accounts Manager, I am doing a beautiful experience and I have a great work-life balance. I like the values of this company and their mission to assist people in being able to Eat Healthy on the go. Doctors and Chef really take care about peoples health and they are always looking for innovative recipes to create good and tasty products. Our food, low sugar, without preservative and additive tastes amazing. Excellent people to work with, all the staff is very supportive and hard working for the best of our company. The owners are very wise, knowing and supportive. There are many opportunity to learn and grow.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for your nice words Laura. It is truly a pleasure to work alongside of you and we are glad that you have joined us on the Key Accounts side.

detailed_reviews.review_text: I can t thank Peqish enough for bringing to Vancouver what we so desperately needed.  Their food is delicious, healthy and very reasonably priced.  I have used them for catering as well as just picked up a sandwich or cookie when I am on the go.  I love their brand and LOVE the fact that it was started by PhDs who see intake of food as medicine that can dramatically effect your health. It is time for a change and how great is it that clean and healthy food also tastes so freakishly good??? Keep up the goodness Peqish people.

Finally a great place to buy (actually) healthy, quality food! It s so good!! Their cookies and energy balls are unbelievably yum! It s also really comforting to know that no matter what I buy from Peqish I can trust it s going to be healthy. I m so glad I came across this place. Oh yes, and the service is amazing too! Such a nice bonus :)

Unbelievable catering service. First of all.. very reasonable pricing. The food is outstanding, especially the classic turkey dinner. They re twist on a stuffing is what breaks them apart from the rest. I d have to say their desert is #1 however. Highly recommend!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Joe. Happy to make that stuffin anytime for you. The apple galette with the salted caramel and candied pecan vanilla bean ice cream was a great end to a wonderful meal together. This year, you have to try our flourless chocolate explosion. a healthy, low sugar version of a chocolate lava cake.

detailed_reviews.review_text: THE most delicious, healthy dishes. The salad pots are a full of flavour and filling with out giving the heavy feeling after eating. This is my go to lunch spot. I couldnt recommend Peqish more highly if I tried. Developed by Doctors and nutritionists, this brand knows exactly how to feed, fill and nurture.  Big Thumps Up.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Sarah, thanks for the 5-star rating. Glad that you enjoy the food and feel good after you eat it. Our mission is to enable people whom are leading active and busy lifestyles to Eat Healthy on-the Go. A big part of this commitment to producing better-for-you foods centers on the fact that we focus on either making either making the ingredients used in our food or sourcing from like-minded suppliers. Eat in good health!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Peqishs vegan/gluten friendly better for you cookie is a must. Its delicious,  low in sugar and satisfies my craving for a bakery item. Love this item and excited for its relaunch!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: We will be relaunching in time for the Holiday Season, and will have a goodie bag just for you!!!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Peqish offers the right mix of quality and convenience that is sorely needed in Vancouver. Its the ideal place to grab a healthy on-the-go meal for any student or professional needing high quality ingredient slow food thats fast to get. Especially appealing to anyone craving for a local Pret-a-Manger.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks KZ...Quality together with convenience for healthy better-for-you foods that are meticulously created is something that is so important for us. Pret-A-Manger is an inspiration to us at Peqish.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Amazing brand philosophy, super delicious and yet very healthy sandwiches, salads, and wraps. Youre on the right track, Peqish. Hope to see more of your food and message reach a bigger consumer base quickly.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Varun. You can order direct from us for your next event, or through Spud as well as in select locations across the lower mainland.

detailed_reviews.review_text: The food is absolutely wonderful, from preparation to presentation, very pleasing. We used Peqish for catering services and they always impress with their many healthy and delicious options.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Simran. Glad that you enjoy our healthy options.

detailed_reviews.review_text: This is my go to restaurant. Love the  Eat Right Now philosopy since Ive dietary restrictions and lot of what is on offer suits my palate. We use their catering services as well at least once/twice a month.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Siraj. Always happy to serve you and the rest of your colleagues.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Prequish provided catering for our daughter s birthday party. Food was outstanding, and service communication was excellent. Highly Recommend! Would definitely use again for future events
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: thanks Nelson, we really enjoyed catering your daughters 1st birthday.

detailed_reviews.review_text: love this place!!!  Healthy and tasty breakfast and lunch options.  The best smoothies. They also have excellent choices for catering, lunch & learns and corporate events.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Shawna. Happy to cater more of your lunch & learns.  Hope the last one at St. Pauls went well.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great company, I love the salad and wraps. Everything is made from scratch , If you like healthy style, you have to visit soon!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Barbora. We appreciate the 5-star review and you will definitely be first in-line to receive a goodie basket of our hazelnut hemp bites.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Best chocolate chip cookie in town! The ingredient is clean, the texture and taste are absolutely on point!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: the perfect cookie takes care and attention to create. our old fashioned chocolate chunk cookie is a fav. we start off with real butter and whip it with organic  cane sugar and brown sugar. add eggs and vanilla together with sea salt. we then add Canadian flour and finish off with semisweet dark chocolate chunks.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Amazing food that is fresh and healthy! I would recommend it to everyone and if you are in the area, definitely check them out :)
Great food, I like their wraps to go. Good simple real recipes
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Michael.We love Good Stuff smoothies too.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Food is really nice, specially I love cookies as a student I get 10% discount I love this place!
People need to talk about this place more!! The food is great and the service is impeccable! Will definitely come back when I can.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Enzo. Happy to continue feeding you our delicious offerings through our on-line ordering service.

detailed_reviews.review_text: So nice to eat healthy food, that tastes great!! Peqish is yummy!
Great service and delicious food!!  The staff is Amazing at catering events !
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Lia. Happy to support cycle for sight anytime with our better for you snacking line.

detailed_reviews.review_text: I love their cookie!!!! And the service is good too! They are super kind
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: thats awesome. thanks Taisa. order your cookies now for the upcoming holiday season!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Best baguette ever!! very good quality, and there is a very nice variety of products.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks G! Glad to have you on our team! My favorite is the Ham & Brie Baguette.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Peqish food is fresh and healthy to eat. It s always delicious
the cookies are so yummy, also coffee. For this price great.
The food is healthy, tasty and fresh. Love it!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Tanya. Glad you enjoyed the food. We are working on setting up our national distribution strategy to get you products in Ontario.

detailed_reviews.review_text: perfect place to get healthy food fast!! love it(:
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: thanks Daniella. always appreciate your support...

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great selection of baked goods, sandwiches and wraps!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Lizzie Yan. Where did you have our product.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Love the cookies! Cant have just one.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Us too. Santa will be so jolly if he gets one of Peqishs cookies this year. My fav is the almond butter cookie because we make our own almond butter. Delish!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Super yummy sandwich and veggie/hummus combo!
this place is fabulous!!!! amazing sandwiches and soups!!!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Stacey D, sorry for the late reply, and thanks for the 5-star rating. glad that you think that our food is fabulous. that means a lot to us!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Tasty and healthy food. I liked it.
Great. Cheap and healthy
Great wraps
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5-star rating Jovan. Glad that you like the wraps. The lunch wraps are my fav since we use a lavash style flatbread rather than a flour tortilla.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great cookies
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks DG. I bet Santa would be grateful this year to receive a Peqish Old Fashioned Chocolate Chunk from you.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Ferda staff

detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for your five-star rating. We really appreciate your feedback.
Thanks for the five-star review. We really appreciate the support.
Thanks for the five-star review. We really appreciate it.
Thanks for the five-star rating. We really appreciate it.
Thanks for the great review. We truly appreciate it.
Thanks for the five-star review. We really appreciate it.
Thanks for the five-star rating. Next time you have a lunch and learn let us know. Happy to cater it again. Be well.

Thank you for the five-star review. We really appreciate the support.
Thank you for the five-star rating. We really appreciate the support.

detailed_reviews.review_text: This is a good spot to grab quick food like sandwiches, wraps, cookies, and coffee - on a street thats lacking these kind of options. The service is VERY friendly and most things taste good. My only reservation is that there isnt always good value for money. For example, the sandwiches taste nice but they dont have many toppings for the price.

A great option for office catering or a quick grab-and-go lunch. Catering service and delivery is excellent. Limited seating available inside and items go quick so after-rush is slim pickings. Always fresh and delicious. Portions appear smallish but are more filling than youd think.

One of those rare gems that understands that fast food doesnt have to mean bad food. Fresh, flavourful, and inventive recipes that are ready-to-go when you are... what more can you ask for, all in the heart of busy downtown Vancouver?
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Gillian. You are right. Recipes centered on delivering good nutrition and flavorful food is key. Of course without the use of all of those ingredients that are so difficult to pronounce. Sometimes it is easy to follow trends to drive profits, but with us wellness is our starting point.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Decent selection of lunch items, if you just want a full quick lunch (Hot or Cold) this is great little spot.
I found the fare both delicious, and filling. All at a reasonable price. The world needs more Peqish!!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks John. We agree that the world needs more Peqish and more importantly wonderful people like you that share positive words of encouragement and are so kind!

detailed_reviews.review_text: I got a chicken double cheese sandwich and pumpkin carrot soup. Delicious!
Damn good sandwiches, healthy, but expensive.

I love the idea of Peqish and I want to love Peqish, but I always leave feeling that I wish something was different. Hand crafted, fresh food to-go. Sounds great right? I thought so, but there is something off about bread sitting in a refrigerated case for multiple hours. The salads are impressive, but just feel expensive. Dont get me wrong... Peqish isnt bad. Its actually decent. Its just not as good as it could be. Staff is always friendly though!

Usually a good place to pick up something fast and healthy (sandwiches, wraps, soup of the day, salads), but it is hit and miss. The sandwiches Ive had seem like the bread is stale. Wraps are good, but could have more in them. Boxed salads are okay. Seared salmon / chicken is my favourite go-to there. Comes with quinoa and a tasty dressing. Actually went in today at ten minutes to 12 to get a lunch. There was already someone waiting at the till when I entered. After looking around, I chose what I wanted and went to the till as well. Nobody was there to serve us!  Several staff were in the back cooking and prepping things, but they didnt acknowledge us or come to the front to man the till. I was in a rush, so I just put the food back and left. Not sure when Ill be returning since there are a lot of other choices around. Peqishs main business is catering, and that fact certainly showed today. When the staff are there at the front, they are nice and friendly.
very delicious food and coffee but not cheap
Always with he broke machine
The wraps and sandwiches are very very dry
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for your feedback, Yuri. We have changed the packaging on our sandwiches to address this so they dont dry out.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Why? Why do you put so much onion on your sandwiches? I got a tuna sandwich a few weeks ago, or should I say an onion sandwich with hints of tuna. Today I got a Festive Chicken Crancherry sandwich, which once again only tasted of onion. Even on the list of ingredients it mentioned a touch of aioli, but didnt mention the many chunks of raw red onion that appeared in the sandwich. Hope that doesnt mess up people with allergies... Very not impressed. Want a nice sandwich made with local ingredients but want to be able to taste the ingredients I purchased the sandwich for, not the ones not even mentioned on the ingredients list.

Its not sockeye salmon, mislabeling an ingredient in the food biz may be detrimental. Got the salmon sandwich, to discover its a much whiter flesh, and taste was off. Also, theres barely anything inside (equivalent amount of fish that may be on one piece of nigiri sushi for example, thats it for inside the whole sandwich, meat/fish almost non-existent), just mostly the bread, mayo and some lettuce. It looked questionable, but was hopeful there was more to it than met the eye. After a couple bites I realized it was a let down. Not even worth half the price. I showed the staff, only a couple bites in, and explained my dissatisfaction, and no refund was offered.... Update, to address the response from Peqish: I am not interested in ever eating here again, not even for free.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for your comment. It is our policy to always ensure that guests are satisfied. Would you please email us directly at info@peqish.com to let us know when you purchased this sandwich and from which location. This will help us investigate. In the meantime, we would be pleased to refund you your money and also buy you lunch. With kind regards, Peqish management.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Cold Sandwiches... We ordered from Peqish for our corporate lunch day, I got the ham sandwich. It was cold, dry, stale, and utterly disappointing. I cant speak to the other items here but dont bother with their sandwiches.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Evan. Did you order this through Foodee or directly through Peqish? We take pride in delivering on our quality promise so this information will be important for us to investigate so we can ensure that this doesnt happen to future customers.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Peqish takes 30 minutes to prepare a side of fries. They offer extremely limited food options, and none of it is terribly fresh, outside of their baked goods.

This review is for the location in great northern way. Horribly expensive. Takes avg 30 mins to get anything made.they have  1 item menu which they cant even turn in less than 30. Nobody likes this place in our building. We are unfortunately without other options.
did an online order and was told be ready in 2 - 5 minutes and i should go now, upon arrival my order was cancelled .. so much for the time saving...
Bread, cheese and ham, a bit of spinach. The baguette is tiny, more like a 6 inch at subway at twice the price.
Stale/expired sandwich sent me home early from work early.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: I sincerely apologize for your unacceptable experience. May I ask which sandwich you purchased, as well as from which location and when? This will greatly help us determine corrective measures. Many thanks

detailed_reviews.review_text: Didnt like it

name: Best Ever Movers company
address: Best Ever Movers company, 488 Drake St, Vancouver, BC V6B 5S9

detailed_reviews.review_text: My experience with Best Ever Movers was amazing. I had to do an emergency move out and wasn t able to pack anything. They were on time, efficient, respectful, and went above and beyond. Thank you!
Very efficient move, they are very professional in the way they handled and stacked all the boxes and was able to fit in the truck in one go. I highly recommend them!
Allan is very experienced and very reliable. He provided very good and fast service. I would recommend this company to anybody who wants to move.
These guys were awesome. Super nice, thoughtful about stuff and professional. Would totally recommend.
Ray was amazing!!! They were so efficient and lovely!!!! Definitely going to use them again!

Affordable and Great Service! Highly recommend the Best Ever Movers. They were on time and ensured my furniture was protected for transport. They went above and beyond, even helped me drop off some items at a second location. Plus I really appreciate that the pricing was clear without any added charges. Thank you Best Ever Moving team!
Ray was awesome!! Super great guys, made things very easy!
Best movers! Nice, efficient, fast, accommodating, the works! Definitely recommend!

Best Ever Movers helped me out immensely They were accommodating of my last minute request for them to help me the next day, arrived promptly and were well equipped and prepared with additional blankets/shrink wrap. They expertly packed the uhaul I had rented for my move. They are the best. Ever.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for feedback

detailed_reviews.review_text: Best moving experience! Super quick, really professional and a great team. We were in and out in less than 90 minutes, smooth and easy. Would definitely use this team again and will be recommending to all my friends.

We have had an amazing experience moving. Alirezas team are so helpful and reliable, and have made our moving day stress-free. They deliver a great service and are very friendly as well as professional. Our items are delivered to us safe and sound and we really like their attention to details and time management.
Great experience. They helped move a heavy solid wood standard size dresser/cupboard from one residence to another. Very responsive and efficient. Professional & careful! Would definitely hire again.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for feedback

detailed_reviews.review_text: I had the pleasure of hiring this company for my recent move.  They showed up early, finished early and were very professional and courteous.  I would recommend them if you are looking for a hassle free move.

I was concerned with moving as we had to pick up from two different places and bring them all to the new place. It was heavily raining on the move day and there was not roofed loading area at the destination. Mr Ali and his professional team managed to wrap everything properly and safely. We landed in our new place with minimum hassle. Moving is much less stressful with Best Ever Movers!

John and his team made it so easy for us . We made the move to a Victoria and it went so smoothly . They were very friendly and hard working . They were great and we would recommend these movers to all my friends . Thanks for making this stress free . Betty and Don

moved from Granville island to coquitlam with these guys . they went above and beyond my daughter left her stuffed animal behind and one one the workers noticed and brought it too the new place. they were punctual and economically a great choice. i called last minute and i was also very happy with how reliable and friendly they all were would definitely recommend

My experience was great! They were very professional. Respectful of the house when they came in and out which was very important to me. Worked for hours without slowing down. My stuff was well protected and not damaged. I would highly recommend them.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the great review Vivian. We always love 5 yellow stars, however your recommendation and kind words are even better!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great experience with this crew. They moved our family last minute on a Sunday when our relocation specialist dropped the ball. The crew showed up, worked hard, lifted heavy, and were so nice and kind. Recommended!!

We have an excellent experience with this moving company. They are skillful in moving our furniture . They are very responsive and careful about everything. I like their punctuality too. I really recommend them.

These two helped haul an entire PA system, stage lighting, drinks, and recycling back to my house, at midnight, with 1 days notice, after my truck driver ended up not being able to make it. best money I have spent in a while. These two literally saved me hours and hours of having to find friends with a car large enough to take the gear out after our rave. Defiantly recommended.
Professional, punctual and affordable services. Best experience Ive had from any moving company. They provide excellent customer service and get the job done efficiently. Would highly recommend!!

Mike and his team came through on very short notice and worked till the job was done after doing 2 moves earlier in the day. We finished at 3 am. This is a company that you can count on. Great bunch of guys!
Mike and his team were great to deal with.  They made our move much easier.  They showed up on time, and they were responsive in regards to communication and booking.
We had a good experience moving with this company. Helpful and professional guys. Wrapped everything very well. Everything went smoothly.
The movers are amazing. They worked with our crazy schedule and moved till 2am with no complaints. They warp every thing properly. Highly recommended!
Very professional, were able to move things efficiently and safely. The job was done on time and reasonably priced. Would definitely do business again.
Totally, we are happy for their service. They are responsive, responsible, and friendly. I recommend them to trust them for your move.

detailed_reviews.review_text: We ve used MetroCentrex for over a decade, and its services have allowed us to connect staff and clients across four countries. Without the MetroCentrex communications technology, our travel agency could not assist clients from hundreds of cities. The costs are many times less than having multiple independent contracts with telephone companies. MetroCentrex consolidates everything using your existing computers and mobile devices. You have a single point of contact when new lines and services are needed anywhere in the world. Billing and services are consolidated, and requests are dealt with promptly. The MetroCentrex service is tailored to your specific needs. We started very small, and Metrocentrex allowed us to grow one line and country at a time. I can t recommend them more highly because there is always someone at MetroCentrex to help when needed.

detailed_reviews.review_text: I ve used Limor s services a few times now, and I m fully satisfied each and every time. Her team is courteous, professional, and so very efficient. (Packed a 2700-sq feet, 4-person house in 3-4 hours!)  For this most recent move, we also used their unpacking service, and man was I impressed!  The team was very thoughtful in where they put things and asked questions when they thought I may have a preference (since kitchen placement is so personal!). I especially appreciated how they removed all the boxes (from BBX moving), cardboard, and paper and put them in the carport, so the house felt ready to live in when they were done. So amazing!  (BBX Moving came and removed ALL the boxes and cardboard and trash the next day). Limor herself is always responsive, patient, and extremely pleasant to deal with. In the few times that I ve worked with her, I  always get a sense that she works very hard, takes pride in her work, and has a very strong work ethic. All in all, I would not hesitate to recommend them. Worth every penny!!

Had them come box up everything before a renovation.  They are very professional, very efficient and courteous; they packed everything perfectly even the oddly shaped items, that I was concerned with.  Fragile stickers where needed and all boxes labeled! Very thankful to Limor and her staff!!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much Elizabeth. We are grateful to be of help.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Vancouver in the Box exceeded all my expectations. They set up a video call right away to give me an initial quote and took the time to do a second video call after I got through decluttering. The Team that showed up at my house was professional, friendly and quick. They took time to walk me through what was done to make sure everything was done to my satisfaction and colour coded my boxes. Great job guys! I highly recommend this company.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Genoa! We are happy to take the stress away from your move!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Vancouver In The Box gave highly professional, exceptional work from start to finish. Limor and her team are amazing at what they do, and they provide courteous, caring service throughout. They come in with a plan, they hussle, and they get it done right! You won t go wrong in hiring them. We began with an on-site consultation where Limor walked through the house, took notes, asked questions about priorities, and provided suggestions on how to proceed. We decided to utilize her team for packing as well as some unpacking services. I am so very glad we did. It was critically important for us that we minimize the chaos of the move for Dad. He has memory issues that make any change to his environment frustrating and confusing for him. Limor proposed that we split packing across two days and leave the key pieces like Dad s bedroom and his tv room for the last moment. Also, they photographed Dad s space and when unpacking they essentially recreated it in our new place so that he immediately felt at home. It was brilliant! I wish I had taken photos of the boxes they packed so you could see the attention to detail in their work. We did not lose a single piece to breakage, and we had around 200 boxes of goods being moved. Everything was labelled and colour coded. And their art inventory service is such a great idea, I highly recommend taking advantage of that too. I m not going to tell you it was cheap because frankly it wasn t. But let s get real here: we hired trained professionals to provide a skilled service that supported our move and made our lives so much easier. I can tell you with absolute conviction that it was money very well spent, and we received excellent value for our investment.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much Joanne for sharing your experience . Its was our pleasure to take the task of packing and unpacking from your family!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Best moving experience ever in my life. They came to my house and packed everything in two hours. Then they unpacked after movers finished their job. They helped me figuring out my new place storage cupboards in kitchen, washroom and closets. This took away so much stress I had around the move. My new place was all unpacked and ready within two hours. No cardboard boxes to recycle, no tape, wrapping paper. All was taken care of as they bring their own plastic containers which were picked up right away. Stress free worth gold decision. So glad I worked with this company. I wouldn t do it any way in the future. Highly recommend Limor and her team. They were amazing.
