detailed_reviews.review_text: They say we pack you relax, and they are not kidding! They packed the entire apartment (1 bedroom) in less than 2 hours. They required nothing from me except for a quick walk through before they began (to make sure they knew where everything was and mark items that I didnt want them to pack) and after they were done (to make sure everything I wanted to be packed was packed). They were extremely nice and polite, and not only did they do an amazing job, but they also did it so quietly that I was actually able to work the entire time they were there. All of the boxes were labeled, so we knew whats where, and because they knew we would be moving the boxes ourselves, they made sure to pack in a way so no box was overly heavy. Moving is a tiring and stressful experience. Especially for people who work full time and dont have the luxury of taking their time. Do yourself a favour and let Limor and her staff take care of the packing for you. You will not regret it. I know we definitely will next time we move too!

PRE- REVIEW I have entered in the ZAP BC program.  I feel the way the program is set up their might be some room for speculation. They are offering a  level two charge-point charger to anyone who applies. They are in charge of the installation though. Seeing as I already have the required NEMA 6-50 plug installed with the correct wiring and breaker I should have a pretty quick application review time. I just got off the phone with the gentleman in charge of the program. He assured me that the program is set up on a first come first serve basis and all applicants are treated in such order and not based on the money they are going to make off of the installation. Im sure I can just plug in the charger (No installation required) *****************  Will update as soon as I hear back ******************** I received a quote for the charger and installation.  The price was somewhat reasonable. To certify the charger they have an electrician come install it on the wall. The price is a little high for those of us that are already wired up but worth upgrading your charger for this price. I would like to see this program amended in the future to benefit people that are already wired up. No need for the program to require an electrician to visit your house if you are already wired with a 240V 40 amp circuit. So...   in closing the program seems legit, and if you are not wired up this program is definitely a good way to get a LEVEL 2 charger and circuit put in. I only did this to support the EV programs and to upgrade my 16 amp charger to a 32 amp charger. (I have a volt so both chargers will charge in the same amount of time) but, in the future who knows if ill benefit from more amperage. Hope this helps  all interested in the ZAPBC program. If I have any problems with the installer I will add to this review. Steve Carey

I engaged Foreseeson Technology to install a ChargePoint charger in my condo parking spot. It took them and Charge Point 7 months to bring the system online. I paid almost $5,000 and invested over 30 hours of my time to try and trouble shoot issues with both Foreseeson and Chargepoint. The list of errors created by this installer and Chargepoint included: 1. faulty hardware equipment on two occasions; 2. over two months of failed software trouble shooting; 3. one occasion of incorrect electrical settings by Chargepoint; 4. over 15 occurrences of Charepoint staff that could not help address charging issues. Although the final result is a working charger, the road to this point was a circus of errors and tail chasing. If you are looking to install, I would encourage you away from Foreseeson Technology and Chargepoint. I have had a very negative experience and would not recommend either company. Best wishes in your search.
Most expensive distributor. Stopped asking for quotes because they never give better prices. Obscenely high shipping costs and charge 1% for credit card transactions.
Employees are rude

detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Robin, Thank you for your kind message and review! It is much appreciated! We will let the team know! Chris

detailed_reviews.review_text: The best landscaping company on the North Shore! With many experienced people working within the team they will not disappoint. From regular maintenance to keeping your gardens looking good all year round, to big garden clean ups & installations they re the best for all your landscaping needs.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Lindsay! Appreciate the kind comments! Its all about the people that work here and they are what make our company so amazing!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Its currently snowing outside, and coming down like crazy. But thanks to Great Canadian Landscaping, our sidewalks are clean and free of any ice. I was impressed with their friendliness, and how thorough they are, theyve done a great job. A few days ago, I went out first thing in the morning, and, despite the overnight snow, sidewalks had been already cleaned.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Carmen, Thank you so much for the comment and positive feedback! It s The Great Canadian Way! S(no)w worries now for you and your fellow residents! Happy Holidays! Chris

detailed_reviews.review_text: The Great Canadian Landscaping company did a moderate-sized backyard reno and design for us in October and November. They did a fantastic job and showed up every day until the job was completed, on time and on budget. Stephane and the rest of the crew were a pleasure to work with, and were very meticulous about all details, and had some great suggestions. The backyard looks amazing, and they left the worksite spotless. Cant wait for summer to enjoy it! We highly recommend this company and will definitely use them again!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Rob, Thanks very much for your review and kind words. We are glad you are happy with the work and look forward to helping you again if the need comes up. Chris

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great Canadian is very good. They design, install and maintain your yard perfectly . A one stop amazing experience . Locally owned and operated and always give me great service and great advice .
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Grant, Thank you for your review. It means a lot to our team to hear how much you appreciate our services and the experience you have received. We look forward to continuing to service your property for years to come. Chris & Team GR8CDN

detailed_reviews.review_text: Chris and team took over the site from an early botched attempt at a landscape installation on my 15,000 sqft property -- new construction and they were late in the game towards competition, we had to GO. It was still ground zero landscape wise, but even the landscape architecture was flawed and not what I wanted to achieve. We had to start over. While I had the tone, feeling, vibe and texture I wanted, the details were outside my scope, I had no idea how to get this done. Chris leaned in, created ideas and concepts from the words I had to share, partnered with a designer for even more input and we executed -- GCLC executed. They crushed the installation. Heavy equipment everywhere, dirt flying, landscape going down and yet, every single day they left the site, immaculate. Contractors dont work this way, ever. GCLC does. There is pride in every job that you rarely see, in each day, in how they show up, how they leave and if issues arise, pride in how they work to solve those issues. It was beautiful. It is beautiful. Since then, GCLC has continued on with me for 4 years -- weekly maintenance, snow removal in the winter (and they literally sing together, while moving snow in the cold! ...when the people are happy, the work done is always better, huge cheers to the culture this company has been able to create, its impressive). Each spring, we always find the next project to build on the overall theme. The maintenance team cares, as if its their house... and weve found, dare I say friendship! Its great to see them each week, always hustling, grabbing my input as they go. New tree, new garden bed? New drainage problem that came out of nowhere from an ever changing landscape? Lets never stop building GCLC -- you will always be my landscape team.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Tim, Thank you so much for your amazing review. It has been a pleasure to work with you and continue improving your home year after year. We love working clients like you and look forward to many years to come. Chris

detailed_reviews.review_text: I hired GCLC last spring to look after 3 buildings and added a 4th one in the summer.  I found them to be well organized and very professional.  From the time I signed the contract, I was introduce to the team leader who was going to perform the work on site and given their contact information.  From their first visit we could see a difference and tenants commented about the improvement.  Whenever I had a concern, it was addressed timely and professionally.  They have gone beyond and I am very impressed with their services.  I would not hesitate to recommend them and they certainly have my business for any future buildings the company acquires.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for your positive comment. We appreciate it very much. We appreciate the opportunity to work for you and the properties you manage.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Our experience with GCL started off differently than most. An employee, Luke, accidentally backed in to my vehicle in a parking lot. Instead of driving away he went looking for the owner of the vehicle to take responsibility. The owner of GCL made it so easy for us to have it fixed. After having a bad experience with another company, we thought we would give GCL a chance. If you have employees that are responsible for their actions like Luke, you must be a great company to hire! We were right, these guys did a great job. They weren t cheap, but you can t buy a Ferrari for the price of a Honda. Two guys came and worked hard all day and got our job done (garden and our lawn). They were worth every penny. We will recommend them to anyone that asks, and we will be using them every year! Thank you GCL, you guys are awesome!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Cory! Not the way we like to meet clients the first time but in the end it was not such a bad way to meet!

detailed_reviews.review_text: We are very pleased with the landscaping, natural stone retaining wall, front patio and driveway installed on our home by GCLC.   Jeremy, Peter, Catharine, Steve and the whole team were all extremely knowledgeable, professional, reliable and provided excellent suggestions on our project.  It was a big project for us and the results certainly exceeded our expectations.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Margo, Thank you for taking the time to let our team know about your experience with our company and the team that completed your project. It means a lot.  Cant wait  to help you again in the future. Chris

detailed_reviews.review_text: The Great Canadian Landscaping Company Ltd. performs landscape maintenance at two properties in Vancouver that I manage.  Both properties always look great and this really increases the curb appeal of the buildings I manage.  They are really on top of the properties landscape maintenance.  They always show up when scheduled and do a top rate job!  The crews very professional.  I find the Maintenance Manager, Derek, always responsive whenever I have a question.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for the positive comments. We really appreciate the feedback. We love taking care of your properties as well! Chris

detailed_reviews.review_text: Chris and his team are fabulous.  They completely transformed our backyard!  There were many different layers to the project but everything was completed on time and we couldnt be more happy with the end result.  Every trade was punctual, attentive to detail and a pleasure to work with.  Chris and Gord were patient with our design ideas and always conscious of our budget.  We could not recommend them more highly.  Thanks guys!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Tracy! We truly appreciate your review and the opportunity to build your dream landscape!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Had an issue with a Gift Certificate for this Company.  They took care of it immediately.  I was happy with the way handled everything.  Very professional.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Ron. Sorry we couldnt have been of service to you! Glad it all worked out.

detailed_reviews.review_text: We have used Great Canadian for over two years now and their staff are always extremely professional and prompt. They keep our yard trimmed year around and never leave any mess. Weve very happy with them and recommend them to our friends as well.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Louis, Thank you for your positive comments! We appreciate the opportunity to work for you and your family. Sincerely, Chris ODonohue President / Founder

detailed_reviews.review_text: Last summer we realised a dream! For years we fantasized about transforming our back yard from moss/ant infested concrete pavers with an uninspiring rock garden perimeter to an inspired eating and living space complete with cosy fireplace and easy to maintain yet beautiful landscaping. Choosing companies is mostly a random exercise so from the moment we initially met to discuss the plans, until the project was complete, it was nothing short of spectacular. Of importance, is that everyone who worked on the project offered many suggestions and solutions that ultimately added value to the final outcome. Plus the project was completed on time and on budget and everyone was professional, friendly and went beyond what was expected. Save yourself the agonizing search for a company that will meet all your expectations and choose Great Canadian Landscaping. Sandi Yang
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Sandy, Thank you for trusting our team to make your dreams a reality! It was our pleasure to work with you on this transformation. Chris and Team GR8CDN

detailed_reviews.review_text: Wonderful experience getting artificial turf installed by Braden, Tony and their team! Would highly recommend them if you re looking for a hard working professional crew to do an excellent job!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Nathan, Thank you for the opportunity to transform your backyard! Chris and team!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Friendly guys to deal with and the pricing is bang on for my needs. I have used them for both my commercial snow removal needs and for my home, as I live and work in North Vancouver. Highly recommend them to anyone on the North Shore looking for hard working guys that know what theyre doing.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Scott! Appreciate the review!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Love these guys, my yard has never looked this good! Lots of detail looked after, good advice and whatever they treated my lawn with in the spring is magic. Highly recommended.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Jane, Thanks for the comments on our team and the work we did for you! Appreciate the feedback! Chris

detailed_reviews.review_text: After following Great Canadian Lawns on facebook, Ive seen some amazing results from their work - It makes me excited to think about the potential of my own little yard and what I could try doing with their help!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Natalie!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great people , great results. Highly reccomend using them.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Eric and Kayzia, Thank you for the 5 star review. We truly enjoyed getting your landscape completed for your new home. Hope you enjoy many summers in your new piece of paridise! Chris and Team GR8CDN

detailed_reviews.review_text: Really great company! I love that they take care of their employees so well :)
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Hailey,  Thank you so much for your review. We greatly appreciate comments like this!   Chris

detailed_reviews.review_text: They did snow removal, good job. chris is the guy to get things done.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for for the positive comments. Its what we strive for everyday!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great Canadian and the team are amazing.  Would recommend them highly
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for your positive comments on our team! We appreciate it. Chris ODonohue President / Founder

detailed_reviews.review_text: I think this company is , one of the best landscaping company  in canada .
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Majid, Thank you for your compliment! It is truly appreciated. Chris ODonohue President / Founder

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great for all your landscaping needs.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Nicole, Thank you for your positive comments! Chris President
Alireza, Thanks for the positive review! It means the world to our team! Chris
Thanks for the 5 stars!
Cris, Thanks for the 5 star review! We appreciate you for taking the time to provide a review! Chris and Team
Thanks for the 5 stars! Appreciate the review!
Hi Aidan, Thanks for the review! We appreciate it a lot! Chris
Thanks Malcolm for the the 5 Stars! It means a lot.
Thanks Cameron, we appreciate your review of our work!
Thanks for the review!
Sean, Thanks for your 5 star review. We love working with you and your team at Crystalview Pool and Spa. Chris and Team GR8CDN

detailed_reviews.review_text: We have been using GCLC (Great Canadian Landscaping) for a year for our Stratas landscaping and we started using them for Snow removal this year (2019-2020). Our previous company over salted and killed a number of our garden plants as well as an expensive hedge. As well their attention to snow clearing was lacking at best. I was constantly out clearing our walkways and the city sidewalks that where our legal responsibility. GCLC uses IceMelt, a pet safe product, and a much more careful and thoughtful application that seems to not affect our plants as much, AND the gold star, the snow clearing is down to the concrete. Our sidewalks are clearer than our neighbours! The areas around entrances, recycling and garbage areas are thoroughly cleared making me worry less for my older neighbours whom the slippery conditions are a hazard. Thank you GCLC! Wendral Court Strata North Vancouver
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Mark for your glowing review! We appreciate comments like this and look forward to continue servicing your Strata property for years to come.

detailed_reviews.review_text: I called three times trying to get a quote for some work at my home. I was told each time that Chris would be getting back to me to set up a time to meet at the property. Never received a call back and ended up using a different company. I can appreciate that you may be too busy but at least let people inquiring for an estimate know. Other companies that were overbooked were courteous enough to inform me and recommend another landscaping company
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Mehr, I am sorry that things didnt get sorted as you had wished. If I can be of service still please call the office 604-924-5296. It was never my intention to not reply but for some reason or another the mistake was made. Sincerely, Chris ODonohue President

detailed_reviews.review_text: They were promt in the beginning, showing up at site meeting. But after that they ignored emails, messages, calls It would save much more time and more professional if they can just be straightforward and say  no, we don t have time for you
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Yasmin, I very sorry to hear about your experience. I would love to discuss it in more detail to make sure this type of experience doesnt happen in the future. We try our best to make sure all clients or potential clients are well looked after. I can be reached a the office 604-924-5296. Chris (Owner)

detailed_reviews.review_text: Pretty sad that  your employee was in such a hurry to park the company vehicle, he has put others in danger by blocking the stop sign. Unacceptable!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Heidi, I replied to you first on Facebook upon discovering the situation at hand. I realize that I missed replying to you hear and I hope you got my Facebook reply as I have not heard anything since. I did come down and move the vehicle right away after getting your message. What happened with our vehicle is unfortunate and the new employee has been trained on where to park the company vehicles moving forward. We also discuss this regularly at our team meetings which happen once a month. Unfortunately, he misunderstood and didnt follow the parking regulations that day. He was disciplined for his actions and I am sorry he put the public at risk with his actions. Sincerely, Chris ODonohue President / Founder

name: Spread'Em Kitchen
address: Spread'Em Kitchen, 2551 No 6 Rd, Richmond, BC V6V 1P3

detailed_reviews.review_text: Best ever. I love all their products and have been enjoying them for the last 2? 3? 4 years? I don t even know how long. The one I m ESPECIALLY in love with at this moment is this one. Thanks for making delicious non dairy cheese alternatives!! (I also wanted to note that the carrot and chili dip is one of my other all-time favorites!)

Holy Moly this stuff is a vegans heaven!! Seriously the best vegan cheese out there.. the flavours are just so unique and delicious!! YUM YUM I just got 7 of the spreads a feta!! So excited to make all kinds of things! Grateful for vegan businesss!!!!!

Im not vegan/veg, etc. But Im open to trying new things. I decided to give the chives and garlic cream cheese a try, and I dont regret it. I tried it with plain nachos. The taste reminded me more of hummus - which Im not mad about. It was really hard to stop eating it hehe. Then, I tried it on a warm croissant - which reminded me of a cream cheese taste - just a little bit more acidic than a regular cream cheese. Which is also not a bad thing in my opinion. All in all, I love it!

I cannot believe the flavour of the Jalapeno Lemon Cream Cheez. My sister kept raving about them and told me I had to try. Well I did. And now I will be raving about it to everyone else. Bonus..it s so low in carbs! Chantelle Bennett @thegenerousscoop

This is some of the best tasting and creamiest cheese on the market. The amazing array of textures and flavours will delight both vegans and non-vegans alike. I have to say I have shared this with family and friends and they all commented that they could not tell it was non-dairy. I purchased two charcuterie packages to share at small gatherings this Chrismas season and it blew everyone away. Words alone cannot express how delicious it is. They even sent me a toque as a valued customer. I recommend this company to anyone looking for a tasty cream cheese.

The marinated feta is AMAZING!! I had to stop myself from eating it all right out of the jar, its so delicious. I highly recommend it to anyone, vegan or otherwise. I am neither vegan nor lactose intolerant, and I cant get enough. Its so creamy and soft, you wont miss the dairy at all. I was told that I wouldnt regret buying it, and I certainly didnt!

You dont have to be vegan to fall in love with Spread Em! I first discovered them at the Vancouver Famers Market and was instantly impressed by the taste, texture and quality of their dips and spreads. The cultured cashew base is tangy and smooth, and all their flavour combinations are well balanced. I particularly like the jalapeno and truffle varieties. Their cilantro dip is awesome too. Spread Ems chef is always coming up with new offerings like olive oil and herb marinated vegan soft cheeses and a Philly-style cream cheeze that quickly became my new favourite (it is divine on sourdough toast with sliced tomato and cucumber). Highest recommendation.

We go through this stuff regularly, the dips are a staple for our kids (with veggies, on toast, on crackers, with dinner as a dip or sauce, etc) and the new cheese has become a solid dinner tool as well (makes amazing sauces, and is so versatile!). My only complaint is that the new original cream cheese flavour is sooooo hard to find still! We found it once and smashed through it in 24 hours, its so damn good, and havent found it again since! So this is more of a complaint to all the stores out there not getting their s*** together to stock this stuff, because they need to get on that!

I received 3 of your cheeses for Christmas.  We opened two right away and loved them both, but the third one I wasnt really looking forward to because I didnt think Id like it.   OMG!  I AM IN LOVE!  The flavours worked perfectly together and it turned out to be my favourite!  I savoured every last bit of it and though its long gone now, and not available where I live, I still think about how lovely it was and how wrong I was to think I wouldnt like it. The cheese Im speaking of is the Apricot, Chili and Basil one! Please dont ever discontinue this cheese.  My son has instructions to buy  more of your cheeses, that one in particular, whenever he comes to visit and I asked a few friends to look for it if they are in a place that might have it.  Alas, nothing yet, but I dream about slathering your lovely cheese on a piece of fresh baked bread some day soon I hope. Thank you so much for creating such fabulous products.  The best vegan cheeses Ive had! Thank you so much!

Seriously the best plant based dressings and cheese spreads. I live for their chive and garlic cashew spread. Better than real cream cheese in my opinion. The cilantro pesto is wicked too. Ive got a jalapeno cashew spread in the freezer that Im stoked to try too.. Thank you to the Spread Em masterminds for blessing us with your delicious creations <3

Love these cheeses so much! When I go to the farmers market I basically only go for Spread Em, and I always appreciate the friendly interactions I get from them!  Since I have a lot of food sensitivities these are an amazing vegan treat for me to have with veggies. My favourites are the cilantro dip, jalapeno lemon cream cheeze, original cream cheeze, and the beet and balsamic dip. Super yummy!

Soooooo Thankful. I eat only low saturated fat and these products make it easy. Wow. Wow. Wow. The flavours and textures are great. All spreadable. I am hoping, one day, they can make something that shreds, but that might be a bridge too far. Every spread  em cheese I ve eaten has an excellent flavour. I have returned to making mac n cheese with the smokey flavoured one, soy milk, and a little xanthan gum. I can t express my thanks for having found this company s products. Now, to get these products in the local grocery stores,

If youre looking for dairy-free creamy dips or vegan cheeses that are delicious and tangy and dont have extra-weird-taste that sometimes comes with dairy-free options, LOOK NO FURTHER because its time to get obsessed with Spread Ems. I cant say enough good things about everything they make. Im so lucky to live in Vancouver where theyre based, so its also a local option. Its all cashew or cashew-and-almond based, fermented, delicious. Like maybe its better than dairy? I hope they get famous but not too famous because I still want to see them regularly at the local farmers markets :).

These spreads are amazing! They have great texture and fantastic flavour combinations and are incredibly versatile. I love the tzatziki dip - either as a spread on a wrap or as a dip with corn chips. However, the Nacho Cheeze dip is a close second. Its creamy and spicy delisciousness!

I just picked up some of your Delight cheese, the other day and my Mom and I are both so impressed with it. If we didnt know it wasnt dairy, wed have probably thought it was. Its soo creamy, and has such a good balance of cheesy flavour. Its also a great texture, nice for spreading on things, having with crackers, etc. I highly recommend it! :)

I love everything about spread em! Ive tried most of their products, and every single one is amazing. Im usually convinced that I could make most recipes better myself, but am not too proud to admit that these are better than I could make. Each recipe is perfectly balanced, theres tons of variety, and I feel better than I have in years after eating 3 containers a week for the last few months. Thanks for feeding me every day!

I absolutely LOVE this brand!!! It s my go-to dip for entertaining and it s a great everyday go-to, too! The Jalapeno and Lemon is incredible, but I also love the Dill Truffle and Chives and Garlic. So hard to choose a favorite! They re all delicious and I highly recommend this brand to anyone who enjoys healthy, satisfying, delicious food!

Ive tried every single spread and they are ALL delicious. I am not remotely vegan or plant based - I *enthusiastically* eat meat and cheese - and I enthusiastically eat this stuff! The garlic and chive flavour tastes just like Boursin - you cant tell the difference. I was a bit reluctant to try some of the flavours (carrot chilli...?) but I have yet to be disappointed. Some spreads are sharp and tangy, some are smooth and a bit sweet, all are very flavourful and beautifully balanced. You can find them in many smaller grocery stores, but if you find them at the farmers market you pay $18 for three tubs - a huge savings over what youd pay in a store. And if you dont think youll finish them all (you will) they freeze beautifully. I cant say enough about these spreads. Go eat them now!

So, we just put red pepper jelly on our smoked cashew cheese and Marys crackers and were just blissfully satified with life. ALL of your cashew cheese blocks are absolutely amazing!!! Every cashew dip is incredible!!! You guys bring so much joy to our mouths!!! I am so grateful for all that you make!!! Thank you so much for being so awesome!!!
The cashew cheese spreads are amazing! Such a great flavour profile without all of the added junk in other spreads. Im excited to continue trying their products!

OMG! Their cheese/dips are the best! Every time I bring them to party people ask me what is this, its amazing? Thats how I first found them...and now Im hooked. Its the main reason I go to the farmers market. I used to be obsessed with the jalapeno flavour and now I love the dill. If you havent tried them yet you must!

I feel that Spread Em ( Cream Cheese Chives & Garlic has reached the Mt Everest summit of vegan spreads. Your amazing product enhanced our farm fresh picked meal tonight. Roasted baby potatoes, broccoli ,vegan sausage , cream cheese on the side ,adorned our dinner plates tonight. Your fine product will now be apart of our weekly grocery must have list. Such rich favours!! Thank you!!! Chocolate Brad

The best cashew cheese and spreads. Delicious and good for you (those tiny probiotics), it doesnt get better than this. I always have some in my fridge and I use it for everything, from dipping to cooking.
These dips and cheezes are delicious! I didnt even realize they were vegan or made of cashews the first time I tasted them. Now they remain a staple in my fridge and I cant get enough!
Delicious vegan cheese! Have yet to try a flavour I dont like. Their classic block is perfect for the viral tiktok baked feta pasta!
Literally the best vegan cheese you will ever find. No weird stuff, the taste is unbelievable, adds so much flavour to dishes, there is so much you can do with it!

If I had to choose something to suffocate in, Id choose the garlic and cheese spread. This stuff is SO good. The Garlic and Chive is ridiculous. I dont eat a plant based diet but this stuff is better than cream cheese. .
The best vegan spread cheese on the market. Wonderful people that run it as well. I especially love the feta it s very yummy.
Delicious, tasty and good for you all at the same time! Love the variety of flavours and versatility these products have - can use them in so many different ways! 100% recommend!
Spreadem Kitchen Cashew vegan soft cheese is so yummy on Corn thin crackers!! Love it.
SpreadEm is just the best.  I love every flavour so its impossible to choose a favourite! A must try for sure :)
Absolutely amazing!  Everything is magic in your mouth and even our non vegan family members love these products.  Super nice owner too
Spread Em is great! Love the flavours and the fact that theyre healthy, made with whole food ingredients, and make everything tasty!
Had the tzatziki dip! Amazing flavour and love that its dairy free!
Absolutely love these dips! The beet and balsamic is my favourite. Could eat it by the spoonfuls.
Our family loves this product. It s all very tasty, healthy, priced well and ships quickly
tasty, healthy, and can be used in so many recipes! Highly highly recommended!!

name: Otis Elevator Company
address: Otis Elevator Company, 17-3771 N Fraser Way, Burnaby, BC V5J 5G5

detailed_reviews.review_text: Sort of surprised reading through these comments since I have had good experiences. I am a building manager in the Okanagan looking after a seven story building with two elevators. They work great and rarely have any issues. The Otis representative who looks after this region, Brad is good. He is always quick to respond and helpful. Very satisfied

@ Tom Brown, Well, you have to consider the fact that you LIVE in an 8 story building that only HAS one elevator. Maybe also consider the fact that elderly and handicapped people are living in the top floors of a single elevator unit. Fact is, over 50% of all these buildings have never modernized their elevators, and all parts required have not been produced for over 20 years. Ever heard the term passing the buck? Thats what your building owners are doing. Yup, when older elevators go down...they STAY down for a long time...and there are plenty of reasons why. All parts come from the states and Europe, and since American Homeland Security prohibits any dropships to Canada for large companies such as Otis...your parts turn from overnight delivery to several days at best. Then consider that Otis has to deal with hundreds and hundreds of these out-of-date elevators where parts are non-existant and incorporate how many tech crews are available to get to the time-critical ones. Then consider the fact that all mechanics are unionized and work at their own pace. So you asked why doesnt Otis work the wknds?...maybe direct your question to LOCAL 82 and ask them why. Its horrible to be without an elevator...YES, but you have toss the blame where it really lies...and thats with building owners who dont want to pay the money to bring their units into the current century.

Excellent company to work for and to have service your elevator. They will do it as fast as possible pull guys from other jobs to get things fixed. There s only so many guys able to get all down elevators running.
All I have to say to all the people hating on Otis or any other elevator company. If your not in a wheel chair and your legs work. Take the stairs!!!!!
Great company

Our company has been dealing with Otis for years, in the past two years the Otis  has fallen to the worst elevator company in the province. They never make it to site on their scheduled time, then they apologize and try to replace that with an option for overtime. The problem is they do this every time which shows their tactics Such a scam. TK elevator is way better!
Impossible to get any Otis worker on site to check their faulty workmanship. What a joke

If your a developer and looking for elevators then do not look here they are the worst elevators imaginable. first it broke down for 4 months while they waited on a part then was up for a month and broke down for a week that was fixed and fast forward 2 months it broke down this week for 3 days they came out and fix it and now 2 days later its now broken again......I dont know how this is possible in a 6 year old building. They never show up to fix it when they say there going too and the people they do send dont look or act professional in and way. and reading all the past reviews in not sure how this company is still in business. SO BUYERS BEWARE DO NOT BUY FROM OTIS!!!! Ive lived in apartments for over 10 years and never had any issues until I moved here and now in a year 4 times its been broken in one building and even more if u include the other buildings in the complex.

Stuck in elevator and they never did anything. Our building manager took over and made she we were safe not Otis. Call the number in the elevator and still nothing done by them. Good things have a access to very good lawyers. Dont worry the records from our condo and fire department will be enough. Word of advice to people, pick any other company besides Otis as they cant do worse than Otis. This post was done as Im stuck in the elevator waiting for help.

I am in an 8-story apartment building in the West End of Vancouver.  We have a single elevator, which has been out of service since about July 24.  (That is, we have had no elevator for over a month now.)  Our building manager has been unable to get any news from Otis.  Initially, we were told it would take about a week to fix it.  Then another week.  Then Otis said they would come on Monday, and simply didnt show up for a week.  They evidently dont work on Saturdays, Sundays, or holidays. here are elderly people in the building who are missing their doctors appointments, and who dont like being unable to go out for over a month.  I have phoned Otis Canada a few times, but have never been able to get any information.  My wife has cancelled 8 physiotherapy appointments. (so far!)  Now the long weekend is coming up (Labour Day), people would like to move out. One person wanted to move out 2 weeks ago.  He cant, because theres no elevator.  I find it extremely odd that Otis will not work for double or triple overtime or whatever.  I have sent the main office (not the Vancouver office) 3 emails, which they cannot be bothered to acknowledge, it seems; there is not even an automated reply.  I phoned the Vancouver office just now - put on hold, and then transferred to a different number, which didnt answer.  I phoned the Vancouver office again, and there was no answer.  We have had no information at all from Otis for about 2 weeks now. Its incredible, really - there are about 60 apartments in this building, and no one knows when the elevator will be repaired, or even if it will be repaired ever.

Absolutely Horrible company, they held our strata for ransom when they lost the contract to replace our elevators because they were 1M dollars higher priced and literally shut down our tower. sick people could not get ambulances to care for them and the firemen had to go up 38 stores to try and get to them. Clearly the almighty dollar is the only thing that drives this company. Their stuff is proprietary and they wont let anyone else service the elevator programming, give me a break. Welcome to the 21st century Otis ownership, Too Big, Too Fat, old guys in leadership not aware of how this could play for them online we have a voice!!! I hear Richmond elevator is eating them alive with customer service and fair pricing. Merry Christmas to the ownership. Start thinking about being good stewards to your customers because client experience is real now and will hurt your business for years to come. Governors Tower and Villas in Yale town
Do they know our elevator (the only one) has been out of service since last October and the manufactured part will be here in March? Langley BC.... Good work Otis.

Company like yours should go out of business you got the worst mechanics ever fixing our 2 elevators each one 3 month not working due to part ordering from Germany and after fixing the elevators one week later stopped definitely we going to fire you and for all your customers think twice before choosing Otis. Otis will drag your business down. I ll file a big complaint to Otis Germany head office.

Literally the worst service ever! I was stuck in an elevator with my 2 children (3 years old and 9 months). When I pressed the call button right away they told me someone would be there to help me right away. 45 minutes later I called again and they told me that someone was on their way and should be there soon. An hour later I was still stuck in the elevator with my 2 small children and had to call the fire department to come and help me. I happened to walk by our front door later and FINALLY saw OTIS come.... 2 HOURS AFTER I CALLED! Im sorry but what urgency did they have? Absolutely ridiculous.

I wish I could give them zero stars. Our elevator has been out for multiple months at a building I manage. You ask for updates for your clients and receive none. Constant fixes that dont actually fix the issue. You call their office for immediate assistance and no one answers the phone. All of their maintenance reps are absolutely useless. Just look at the reviews, ALL one stars except for one. Avoid this company like the plague if at all possible.

Elevator has been down for half a year with fixes lasting only a week. Recent fix took 2 people all day to fix after they left the first ride down resulted in a fire! Had to have the fire department called. Department told us the work recently done resulted in an electric fire. They refused to take ownership of this mistake and sent out another member to try.

Worst company ever! In coquitlam location in our condo building we have 2 elevators and one of it is always broken. Now the second one keeps getting broken too. Imagine an 85 yr old person having an emergency or getting stuck in elevator not functioning properly. Complained several times but they seem not to be bothered at all. A persons life is on steak and this company takes no action to resolve elevator ptoblems. Seems like we are not living in Canada but a third world country where ppl life or time has no importance. I would suggest ppl to never live in condo buildings that have Otis elevators. Hope they rot in hell.

Have had the elevator out in my building for 1 month or more. The supervisor refused to talk with us. Refused to fix the elevator until they had enough time to. 1-2 months? Supervisor was hostile on the phone telling me how dare I call him and explain the situation.

If I could give zero stars I would. Its been over 1 month at our building, and still no fixes or even a response on when they will be here to fix our elevator. In this heat, its been that much more difficult to go up and down the stairs, and on top of that, we have elderly folks living in our building. I would avoid this company at all costs!!!

I am wondering which planet Otiss parts come from.  Weve been waiting forever for our elevator to be fixed at SAGE UBC.  Unfortunately once the elevator is installed theirs no recourse to another supplier.  Professional blackmail!

Worst elevator company in the world. Our 3-year old building has 2 cars and we have one or the other shut down for a month at least every year for repairs. In addition both elevators are making terrible noise and disturb residents all the time. What a sucker company!
Bad servicing calls to our complex in Langley... In 2 to 2 1/2 weeks, its been out 9 - 10 times! Still out of service... Sticker on it, to not use it!
Absolutely the worst... Maintenance contracts are a joke with OTIS. Elevators go down and stay down for months at a time.
its been over 3 months and the elevator in UBC Marine drive building 4 is still broken :)
Impossible to even get a return phone call for service. Extremely disappointed on that alone. Never even had a chance to get service from them, so i cant even rate the actual service!!
Horrible company! Takes For-Ever to fix Anything, and takes 3 guys to fix one esculator! Id be embarrassed to work for them
worst company i have ever seen  it is very unprofessional and untrustworthy
No one is picking up the emergency line when I got stuck in the elevator!
Please fix the elevator at UBC Marine Drive.
Elevator breaks down every month
Lawsuit against this company is needed.

name: Klo Portfolios
address: Klo Portfolios, 258 E 1st Ave Unit #3, Vancouver, BC V5T 1A6

detailed_reviews.review_text: Since the very beginning I had a wonderful experience. Angela was my first point of contact and assisted me throughout the entire process. Heather was extremely helpful as well. I wanted to get this finished as quickly as possible. Tarlan sent the final email and then I received the email from Addel with the confirmation shipment. KLO Portfolios did an exceptional job and I would order portfolios with them in the near future for my other works. I highly recommend them. I received my portfolio two days in advance and it looked extremely professional and high quality. Its beyond 5 stars. Thank you so much!

If your looking to revamp your portfolios I suggest looking into KLOportfolios. I am VERY picky when it comes to the print quality. I wanted something sturdy & not flimsy! I am so impressed. I received my portfolio today & couldn t be happier. Mine is Acrylic Matte in Black with engraving & color fill. But they have different material options, like aluminum or veneer if you don t like acrylic, they have tons of different engraving  options with or without color. The customer service is amazing! You send them your file and they work with you to get it perfect. Also the website is very user friendly. The best part: every portfolio includes overnight shipping, once it s done in production. Below is the  cover  I haven t put my prints in yet. No filters #supportsmallbusinesses

What can I say about Klo, their work is phenomenal. I had to get a portfolio to graduate this May with a Advertising & Graphic Design Degree, and wanted to make a bold statement. My professor recommended Klo, as well as one of my friends. The process was super easy to set the file up for whatever finish you were getting (die-cut, engrave, etc.). Klo kept in touch, and usually answered back to keep you notified about the process. All I can say is, I cant wait to show it off at interviews, and even portfolio reviews. Worth every penny!

I have used Klo Portfolios twice. This is a small business that exemplifies what it means to care about your product and your people. Both times their portfolio quality and customer service was excellent. With my last order I needed some advance information on measurements and Tarlan herself responded quickly and efficiently to every email and phone call I sent. I highly recommend this company both for the quality of their work and their above and beyond care for their customers.

I had a very smooth and easy process in ordering my portfolio, Elizabeth was prompt and helpful with the questions I had, and was timely in getting my proof approved and the way I wanted. I paid the rush fee to get the week turnaround, and it came just as expected- was shipped overnight and got here early in the morning with no issues. Klo did an amazing job on my portfolio, it turned out beautifully. Very pleased with the work they did. :)

Klo Portfolios is honestly the best place in my opinion to purchase your portfolio book, hands down! And this comes from someone who was very nervous and anxious about ordering. But from the very beginning to the end result I wouldnt have changed a thing and will probably revisit them in the future! The team at Klo is so supportive. I probably called quite a few times asking multiple questions about the process, how it works, which book would be best, etc. and they never hesitated to answer my questions. They always made me feel so confident and secure about my book with constant emails about the process and if there were to be any changes made, which I really appreciated a lot. And it so happened my book was engraved instead of a die-cut which worked out so much better! And they made sure to run everything by me first and send my proofs. They were always very professional and friendly. Willing to help accommodate any of my needs. Words cannot describe how AMAZING my book came out. So much better then what I imagined!! So sleek and professional! Packaged perfectly and so cute and personalized with my name all over the wrapping which definitely made me feel special. When I bought it to class, so many students feel in love with it and were blown away! They even decided to go with Klo for their books after seeing mine. Every job interview I have been on has said amazing things about my portfolio. It really leaves an impression. At my portfolio show, Im not kidding jaws dropped. I cannot express how awesome Klo is. From the every aspect they are with you and for you. I love them so very much!!! So please i recommend them so highly to you! And if this helps, I just got a graphic design job and lets just say my book stuck their attention ;) Thank you Klo for your exceptional work!

As a young graphic designer, Im doing a lot of things for the first time. Designing and ordering my portfolio definitely topped the list of firsts. Luckily, I chose Klo Portfolios to produce my portfolio. The process to order and personalize was very user friendly and it was apparent that they didnt overlook a single detail. I felt confident when I submitted my portfolio design. Shortly after, I received a phone call reviewing my submission. It was apparent that they were in the best interest of the final product being flawless by suggesting and explaining size adjustments to improve my design. Timing was as promised and quality surpassed my expectations. I received an innumerable amount of positive feedback from family, friends, colleagues and professionals at the AIGA Portfolio Review in Raleigh, NC. Klo Portfolios truly made the experience a great one and I couldnt be happier with my portfolio!

Great customer service. I used Klo Portfolios for my custom 11x17 portfolio cover and I get so many compliments about my book at portfolio reviews! I would like to thank Tarlan for personally taking the time to answer my questions and assist with my revisions. I absolutely recommend Klo Portfolios and I couldnt be happier with the process or end result!

I used Klo Portfolios for my custom 11x17 portfolio cover and was really blown away by how good the final product came out. The online process was easy, and they worked with me the whole time to make sure it was done right. I would like to thank their graphic artist Tarlan, for personally taking the time to answer my questions and assist with my revisions. To sum up, I absolutely recommend Klo and I couldnt be happier with the process or end result!

My experience with Klo was nothing short of excellent! Their team was incredibly helpful during the process of making my portfolio. It arrived in great time inside a Klo sleeve (and with a cleaning cloth, which was a super nice touch). Every single time Ive gone into an interview since Ive had it, the company will always comment on how much they like my wooden portfolio case. Thanks Klo!

My portfolio was UV printed. Klo Portfolios will not just print what you send them, they make sure your design is of highest quality and perfection. The outcome of my printed portfolio went beyond my expectations. Thanks to customer service I was able to receive it in time for an interview! Truly beautiful portfolio! Very happy and will return again!

My experience with Klo Portfolios has been excellent , I was a little apprehensive about getting a portfolio cover out of the country and also scared because the deadline of my presentation was coming and I didnt know if I would get my cover on time, I bought the rush order and I got my cover the next day. I would definitely recommend Klo Portfolios and give them 10 stars if I could Tarlan and all her team are so good at keep in touch and answering questions. The best experience!

GREAT experience using Klo Portfolios! I was getting one of their products as a gift for a friend and accidentally ordered the same product twice - they refunded my accidental order in less than an hour. Their customer service was very responsive and Allison was super in answering my questions. Definitely recommend using this company and I look forward to seeing the final product! :)

I got my portfolio today in the mail, and I cant tell you guy how thankful I am. It turned out more amazing than I had hoped, and you truly brought my design to life. I was honestly worried about the shipping, since it was over seas, but it arrived right on time and not a day later than quoted. I appreciate the craftsmanship on my new portfolio book, and will continue to use you for future business. Klo Portfolios will be recommended by me to all other creatives in my community. Once again thank you so much! Alexander Williams Graphic Designer Edit: Im curious to know if the 1 star reviews are because the particular designers didnt order their books early enough to receive them on the expected date. I personally live in the U.S, so shipping through customs can be a pain, and very time consuming.

Klo Portfolios is a great company with fantastic customer service. They were able to work with me and deliver a great product within my tight time frame. I get so many compliments about my book at portfolio reviews! Thanks so much Klo!

Klo Portfolios did an amazing job on the work I needed done. Yes, the price can be a bit steep for those who might be on a student budget, but were talking about custom crafted work and it is worth every cent. In my line of business, as a graphic designer, a printed portfolio is still an important piece of the puzzle and one of the challenges you face is standing out. Klo solves that. I received nothing but praise for the quality of my portfolio during my portfolio show and it helped make me stand out greatly. Needless to say, I am ecstatic about how it looks. The service, management, and every part in between was also on point. They got back to me in a timely manner, made things very clear, and above all actually made the process feel human with actual customer interaction. I honestly dont know what problems could honestly occur when that kind of treatment is being applied. I am still in aw of the work that was done and how efficient it was. Not to mention the amount of padding that went into keeping this thing safe was astronomical. They also did the printing for all my pages within the portfolio and that too was top quality. Ive had many printers send me prints that came out completely off point but Klo got it done right. Nothing but praise for these guys. If you have the budget and need to stand out, I highly recommend getting Klo to do your portfolio. They are second to none and I have yet to see portfolio crafters like them anyway, especially not online. If I ever need another portfolio done, I am easily coming back, not to mention Im recommending them to everyone at my school to get it done here. Thanks again for all the hard work guys! It was a blast working with you. Regards, Brendan Mudryk of Tyr Designs

Klos service is fantastic. They helped me meet my very tight deadline and they produced a beautiful product. All four portfolio cases that I have had them create are dead on to my designs and gorgeous. I would highly recommend Klo Portfolios if you want a perfect portfolio case.

I had the best experience with Klo! I had been eyeballing them a few months before I started my last quarter in January and I knew I wanted to order my book with them.  My professor told me that they were good but too expensive and that there were other places MUCH better and cheaper. I checked every place he gave me and even look on Etsy and was NOT close to Klo. The most important part was that they take it so serious. Everything is from scratch, so they know what they are doing! I called beforehand and gave them might ideas and my logo and what I envisioned and they literally made come to life!! On top of that, my book/table was named the best one on my portfolio show. I got incredible comments from so many people!  I was so happy with my book. Ill be ordering a, Ill be making a photo book this time!

This company is on top of it, and their product is very high quality. I had my grad portfolio book custom made with them. I was very busy the few weeks leading up to grad and I somehow missed that there was a mistake with my logo on the proof that I had approved. The show was in just a couple of days when I got the book with the mistake on the logo, however Tarlan assured me that they could have another one ready on time. She kept her word and the book was ready within a couple of days, with time to spare before the show. Nothing but good things to say about this company. They are honest, timely, professional, and very high quality.

Everything from start to finish was smooth. I got my proof within 20 minutes of submitting my artwork and Tarlan was very helpful with any questions I had. It was ordered and on my doorstep in a week. Not to mention my portfolio is beautifully crafted. I would definitely recommend!

I talked with Tarlan and she answered all questions and complications that I had with ease. Their customer service is beyond exceptional; we were on a first name basis by the second phone call! I rush shipped my portfolio and said I needed it by the 7th of April, which I thought was a little too early, but I thought Id give it a shot. It was in my hands by the 9th, much earlier than I thought! Everything turned out beautiful, and my personal experience with them was refreshing. I would recommend Klo to anyone, and they certainly dont disappoint with the wow factor.

I ordered a KLO Portfolio as a gift for my sisters 30th birthday to display her professional Theatre/Circus Design resume and photos. I was so thrilled with the product that arrived. Tarlan answered all of my many questions and helped me to refine the design. The final product was better than I could have imagined and made my sister cry! Thanks to KLO for the professional and thoughtful work they produce.

Klo Portfolios was a pure pleasure to work with. They allow you to customize the design of your portfolio uniquely to you. They are with you every step of the way through out the design process. My field is Interior Design and my portfolio is currently the talk of the school.

My portfolio turned out absolutely beautiful and the employees were fantastic to work with, even when I was at my most stressed out point. Tarlan deserves a raise.  Thank you for going above and beyond and completely assembling it for me!

To me one of the things that I love about this company aside from the fact that my portfolio looks amazing is the incredible communication that they have with their clients. I recommend Klo portfolio they are really polite.

I couldnt be more than happy with the experience that I had with Klo Portfolio. Not only did they make an awesome portfolio, they also had awesome communication skills in order to produce and execute what I had envisioned for my porfolio.
Great customer service. I was assisted with last minute changes. Quality work. My portfolio was delivered fast. I will use them again and I strongly recommend.
Love the two portfolios Klo did for my company.  Very cool, great quality, amazing value.  Love them!
Klo beat my expectations! Efficient and precise product by a family run local business.
Really good quality, and great team and service.

The portfolio I received from klo was very well done. I love the stained bamboo application! Completely custom! Their associates were very friendly & enthusiastic about the entirety of my project. They were also very service orientated when it came to last minute adjustments. When I received my cover you could really tell that they wanted to put as much love into it as I did with the materials within. Thank-you klo.

Im definitely not happy with the customer service I received. I ordered my portfolio and was told I would have it in my hands by Monday the 27th. Approximately a week before my ship date I e-mailed and asked if I could pay shipping to get weekend delivery so I could have my portfolio prior to my trip. I was told that I could and said I wanted to, but never received a confirmation or request for pament. I then called and left messages and received no response. I finally got ahold of someone and was told that early shipping never got added to my order and that it might be too late, but they would find out and call/e-mail me back. I never received a call or e-mail. I left for my trip and arranged for a coworker to pick up my shipment on Monday (my original ship date) so he could bring it for me and it had still not arrived, so I was not able to get my portfolio in time for my trip which is the entire reason I had ordered it in the first place. I do not know if my portfolio is good or not as I havent seen it, but I would not recommend Klo Portfolios simply based on the poor customer service I received.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your feedback, we tried calling you and you werent available. Our custom portfolios are cut, treated, and assembled in house so they do take some time to create.  Your proof was approved on October 15th and our turnaround is 2 weeks in hand from the time your proof is approved. We originally wanted to offer you a weekend delivery service as per your request and later realized and let you know it wasnt available so we shipped your custom portfolio on Friday with a complimentary upgrade to an express service you were not charged for, a $68 fee we covered for you. Unfortunately your package was held at US customs which we dont have any control of (I wish we did!) so it arrived one date after your requested date. We do our best to accommodate all deadlines even if its needed faster than our 2 week turnaround stated on our website.  You received a complimentary express shipping  upgrade in hopes youd receive it earlier for your trip and Im sorry you didnt receive it in time. Please give us a ring if youd like to chat further. All the best, Tarlan Seyedfarshi Co-Founder

detailed_reviews.review_text: My portfolio came with a huge scratch/scuff on it. I sent the picture to them and all they could tell me is that s how the leather comes and that it s part of the leather. I can clearly tell it is not part of the leather that something scratched it up. Not one of the images on their site show ANY imperfections. I paid a lot of money for this and upon receiving it, it should be flawless which it clearly is not.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Karli, This is a vegetable tan leather material so its untreated and because we cut them from large hides, there are natural blemishes and imperfections.  This is 100% part of the leather.  The upside of vegetable tan leather is that it patinas over time and ages beautifully, darkening and evening out completely.  We note on our website that all of our leather will have natural blemishes as this is the very nature of leather. We understand that mistakes happen although this is not one of them.  Please allow for the vegetable tan leather to take its course and patina, which will add beauty and character to your portfolio book and case.

detailed_reviews.review_text: So I ordered my portfolio (along with 15+ of my classmates in college) and it just went downhill from there. Almost ALL of us did not get it when it was requested because we ordered engraving and it took them FOREVER.  A few of my classmates also got told that the company had no record of them ordering rushed shipping (which we paid $40 for!) and had to fight tooth and nail with them to not even get it refunded in the end. WOULD NOT RECCOMEND DUE TO POOR CUSTOMER SERVICE AND ORGANIZATION WITHIN COMPANY.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Mary, Our custom portfolios are created from scratch so they do require the full amount of time required to create.  The turnaround starts from the time your proof is approved, not when your order is placed as we let you know. We did have an unexpected delay in our material and you were notified, your rush fee was refunded, and a complimentary pack of hinge strips was added to your order which you were happy about. Your  custom portfolio looked amazing and was shipped to you with an overnight service  which we covered, all facts that youve chosen to leave out :-) No matter the outcome, we wish you the best! Cheers, Tarlan

name: Gardein
address: Gardein, 12751 Vulcan Way, Richmond, BC V6V 1Z5

detailed_reviews.review_text: A very well maintained clean food processing plant. Nice office and staff.
Gardein awesome meatless foods , spices & flavor Mmmmm good
Good food company
Great place to work
Yeah.. whatever. My sister works there. Not reliable feedback.
Love the products! Have tried the whole portfolio!
Good company

Package had a picture of the product with sauce, get home to make item and no sauce included. False advertising add another scam cheap cutting corner company to the list.... just stop making food if your going to half ass it

Started in Canada then abandons the people of Canada who supported them for the United States.  Removed most of there products from Canada when they decided to move production to the United States, leaving Canada with only 4 products.  Not purchasing products by them any longer.
These guys were just fined more than a quarter of a million dollars after their vegetable oil leaked into a local waterway several times over a period of seven years. Need I say more?
Food is meh but everything else sucks like management and everything else like customer service
month

name: Wells Can Company Ltd
address: Wells Can Company Ltd, 8705 Government St, Burnaby, BC V3N 4G9

detailed_reviews.review_text: Very helpful staff. Great customer service. Excellent product options. I always return here.

I started canning/ preserving during the pandemic. Wells Can has always been stocked with everything I needed. The selection available at this store is one of the best selections I have come across in my trips to many other local canning suppliers. The staff here is always knowledgeable, polite and most of all...helpful. I recently attended this business and noticed some new signage. I feel it is very important for all businesses to have the same approach as Wells Can has had to the mandating of vaccines/masks policy. I wear a mask, and that is my choice. Some people choose not to, and that is also OKAY. Thank you for being open minded, and supportive of my freedoms as a Canadian Citizen! I will go out of my way to come here from now on.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the feedback on how we are doing with our customer service.

detailed_reviews.review_text: These guys were extremely helpful.   I purchased a pressure canner from them. Definitely will come back for some classes. Thanks for the help.

Very glad I found Wells Can Company. When searching for tins for my product, most of the results were US companies and I didnt want to deal with duties, taxes and border delays. Wells Can Company has just what I was looking for at reasonable prices. When I made a mistake with my order, they were very generous in fixing my error. Terrific customer service!
Great company. I finally had a place I didn t feel harassed regarding my mask exemption. Nice to see companies that aren t illegally enforcing on behalf of government.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the kind words.  We appreciate your business and friendship.

detailed_reviews.review_text: I asked Ron what I wanted he said I got it the price is not to expensive phone them first. First time there.
I always go to wells can company for all my canning supplies. I live in kitwanga b.c. Always good service there. Good selection of canning supplies. Well worth the trip.
Great place to get your cans and vacuum bags. The service was great with friendly staff.
Fantastic service and very informative staff. Will be back again for other foodsaver needs and jars i require
Always have what I need for canning at a great price. Friendly and helpful to walk in counter sale customers.
Always friendly and they have all the tins, jars and materials for smoking meats or canning. Great company
Fantastic customer service! Fast & friendly service every single time!
Everything you need to do canning and food preservation. Customer service was incredible.
Great store.  The staff are really friendly.
Awsome customer service.
Nice company, just didnt have what I was looking for.
My package arrived safely despite the long distance. The time estimate was correct. The packaging could perhaps have been more elaborate given the journey and the intermediaries it had to involve.
Great sell

Been using Wells on and off for about a year, just because theyre the closest place to us and it was convenient when we needed something day of. The service never impressed us, so we werent consistent. But today we went in and saw that they have signs encouraging people to defy the mask mandate and not requiring them the enter. Unmasked employees didnt even stay 6 ft away from us, even though we clearly took many steps back when they entered out personal bubble. We felt extremely dissapointed and disrespected. We will not be returning and have already contacted Burnaby bylaw. We will make the slightly longer drive to Pinnacle Distributors from now on, since theyre service has always been amazing!

Not a good experience with Wells Can Company. I phoned and got a quote on some bee keeping equipment and was given a quote , I then increased the order amount and was given a better price based on the amount. I placed the order and when I got the invoice (which was after the shipment) it was more than quoted. After a couple phone calls and emails I was told that was the new pricing  and I was quoted on last years prices and nothing could be done. They took over from another company that gave very good service , not the same now.  They didnt even offer to meet half way .  Hope they dont treat all customers like this ? Murray
Dont order from here they never answer their phone worst consumer service everrrrr

name: Herschel Supply Co. Head Office
address: Herschel Supply Co. Head Office, 611 Alexander St #108, Vancouver, BC V6A 1E1

detailed_reviews.review_text: Within hours of submitting my warranty claim, I received a gift card via email. Smooth and quick. Customer service was also super helpful and followed up via email to notify me my claim had been processed.

I recently bought a duffle bag off their website and when it arrived it had a stain on one side. I emailed customer service and they replied very fast, and we decided to get the defect bag returned and they sent me a new one. The new bag came within 5 days! I m very happy with the way customer service handled this damaged product and my new duffle bag is wonderful. I will continue to buy from Herschel in the future!
I love the products and the quality they provide. Worth every penny!! Also you get quick delivery when you order online and you wouldn t get disappointed at all when you recieve your product. Cheers!
Good people over at Herschel!!

I was really disappointed with my overall experience purchasing from them.  I found the description of their face mask to be promising more than what the product actually was. When I contacted them to try to find a win win solution without having to write a negative review, I found their customer service really disappointing.  To me if felt like they were more focused on trying to avoid responsibility for the issues rather than focusing on serving their customers. Their face mask was also on the more expensive end of the range.  If they had delivered well I would have had no problem paying that price, but it ended up just adding to my disappointment. I wish this company the best of luck in improving the experience of future customers.  We are all human and a work in progress after all. :)

Products are nice and well made. When there are issues with the products, customer service is lacking. Beware that their website reviews are groomed and negative ones are not published. I guess reviews that are negative if their customer service do not meet their website guidelines. Again products are good, just when there are issues you will be disappointed.
Backpack straps broke after one month of use.
Customer service refused to handle a repair request. Reason: the item purchased on the Internet is a counterfeit.
detailed_reviews.review_translated_text: Le service client a refuse de prendre en charge une demande de reparation. Motif : larticle achete sur Internet serait une contrefacon.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Pretty but poor quality products. No refunds. Staff are clueless when it comes to their product knowledge (i.e. they believe what theyre told, not what they can see). Oh, and head office has no corporate directory, no customer service and a looping warranty / agent call centre. Excellent company. Bankruptcy is coming.

I purchased a backpack in March 2022 in Sydney BC. Within six months, one of the straps had ripped from body of the backpack. I was told by a Herschel retailer that Herschel is a very good company that stands behind their products so I submitted a claim. I downloaded and sent 5 pictures as requested, which clearly showed the issue. I no longer had the proof of purchase but gave the date and place of purchase, as requested. My claim has been denied and closed and I have subsequently paid $25.00 to a seamstress to repair the strap. I am extremely disappointed in the Herschel customer service department and will not ever buy another Herschel product.

Horrendous customer service and junk policies pertaining to exchanges for brand new, tagged, and packaged/unopened items. Zero solutions, even with me offering to pay this company more money. Basically got the  too bad so sad  response. Nothing progressive or modern about this outdated business with outdated business models. What kinda business says no to money and turns down an extra sales opportunity?

**DID NOT RECEIVE REFUND UNTIL AFTER I FOLLOWED UP, OVER A MONTH AFTER ITEMS WERE DELIVERED BACK TO HERSCHEL** I ordered several things for Christmas. Upon arrival, I was very disappointed in 3 of the 5 items and returned. The return process was a hassle. I had to  request  a return, wait several days for a response, then pay return shipping. I did not anticipate having to pay return shipping although I acknowledge I did not check prior to ordering. I sent the items back 2/13/23, tracking shows they were received back to Herschel on 2/15/23. As of 3/19/23, over a month later, I d not heard a word from Herschel. No acknowledgement of receiving my return, no refund, nothing. I reached out to Herschel via email and immediately rec d a canned response email saying the company was very busy, it would take several days to hear back from them, and to consider their chat. I went to the chat and had to provide the order and return authorization number, and tracking number for the package that I paid to return. After proving that the package was signed for by someone named Gabby at Herschel, the refund was issued almost instantly. Of course the shipping was not included. There was no explanation of why my money had not been returned, and I AM POSITIVE MY MONEY WOULD  HAVE BEEN RETURNED TO ME IF I D NOT GONE TO HERSCHEL. At the end of the chat I asked why I hadn t received my refund without having to proactively reach out to the company? The response from Herschel chat was  No worries- the warehouse is really busy . No worries ?? Clearly on Herschel s end, but the chat person as a representative of Herschel certainly seemed tone deaf to what I was saying. It was a worry for me, that s why I ve been waiting for over a month. It s my money, and I worry about it! It s clear Herschel does not, so  no worries  I won t be ordering from your company again

one of the worst quality bags and clothes i ve ever purchased. for the amount of money their products costs, you d expect them to last longer than they do. i bought a little america backpack for $150 and the strings broke within a month. the cheap plastic and material used doesn t justify the price. waste of money. will never buy anything from herschel again

I placed an order 2520751 and received the backpack yesterday and had my four year-old try it on. Unfortunately, the backpack is too big for her, both straps fell off the edge of her shoulders. Therefore, I called Herschel Supply Roberson and asked if I could bring the backpack back there for a return. The staff told me no because this backpack is the sale item. I am quite surprised and upset for this reason: When I purchased the backpack, a 30-day return policy was listed below. There was not a pop-up window that told me I can not return the sale item. Besides that, the reason I bought this backpack is not because of the sale, it is because my four year-old daughter loves the butterfly pattern. I checked the size for the current Herschel backpack I have at home for my six-year-old daughter. The measurement fits the dimension that is described for a mid-value backpack on the website. But they are actually different sizes, which I realized after I received the butterfly mid-value backpack. I didnt know there are so many different sizes apart from XL and mini. This is also my first time purchasing Herschel online. I am quite disappointed with online Herschel. I thought I would return this butterfly backpack and purchase another one online from Herschel. But I also learned today that heritage kid backpacks do not have inside laptop sleeves and a side packet for carrying a water bottle. By contrast, Indigo offered the Herschel backpacks which have all those features that I mentioned above. In the end, I had to purchase another Herschel backpack for my four-year-old daughter from Indigo where they also do not have a no sale item return policy and they have all the features that I am looking for for a kids backpack. I talked to the store and they asked me to call customer service where they never answer the phone and Llivechat staff named James did not respond me back after I tried to explain my order, Indeed, he just closed the livechat!!!!!!! I will never buy Herschel again! Moms, please not waste your time on a company that does not want to serve their customers! The $50 dollar backpack is a lesson for me to learn!!!! Hope my post can help someone at least.

I shouldve read the review before I ordered online. I ordered two bags one in the afternoon the other in the evening   since I like the second one better. And I tried to cancel right after my second order, There is no option for cancel the order at all. So I sent the email requested for cancel and I even received the reponse email but It shipped the next day.The problem was that I need to pay for the return fee so I ended up going to the store to returned the bag. And now Im still waiting for the one that ordered. I cannot even cancel because they can not guaranteed. How can you do business like this This is so frustrating. Dont evev start the online service if you are not ready.

I have been trying to order a hip pack for 2 months (black) always out of stock. I finally place my order last night transaction goes through only to receive an email today telling me they can t fill my order and a refund will be processed within 5 days. What?
