The kicker is when I ordered it stated that inventory was currently at 8 remaining, funny I went online after I received the email and it stated 2 currently available. How do you run a company that can t produce inventory, I don t understand? This is the reason Target didn t make it in Canada. Is anyone in the same boat???

Herschel Supply Co Will not sell me the matching strapping material for my Turquoise City Bag.  Customer Service instead sent me a link for heavy black strapping material sold on Amazon.   Sorry the black does not go with the turquoise and medium brown leather front closure.  Poor customer service.  Lucky to get one star!

When I bought school bag the sales rep was all over me cause I was going to spend 189 for a School bag and sales rep garenteed me that if Herschel has a life warranty.. and then I went to Metrotown Burnaby location.. Store Manager told us sorry we can t help you and I have to go online .. it s been a month now.. NO ONE HAS CALLED US.. Claim is still open and when you call 1-877 number , no one answer.. FRAUD AND ABSOLUTELY FRAUD COMPANY!! MANAGER WONT EVEN LOOK AT YOU IF YOUR BRINGING ANY RETURN ITEMS ! And he was so Raisesest and he only helped WHITE customers!!

One star is really pushing it. I first emailed customer service... no reply. So I decided to call in,  the agent over the phone said I could bring the bag to a store to do an exchange (I also mentioned the bag is an online purchased) . I drove to the store solely just to do this exchange, but the salesperson told me I was not able to do so because it was an online purchase. It s frustrating to know that their policy is inconsistent and that I wasted my time!  I was gifted two bags, that will now be in the trash can as I would not wear merchandise from a company that doesn t have any integrity.

I have emailed Herschel twice and called to no avail about a product which was never delivered. I have been ignored so will contact my credit card to cancel my charge. Will never do business with company again.
well, I bought a backpack and payed extra for 1-2 day delivery, and well . We are pushing in 6 days. I would HIGHLY suggest trying to buy it in person so that this doesn t happen to anyone else

Herschels customer service is one of the worst Ive encountered. I had the bad experience of filing a claim with them and the instructions are very ambiguous and hard to follow. I hope other customers would have a better experience.
This is the design and accounting offices, not purchase. They shut the white drop down gate on me after I rang the door bell at 6pm.

I would rather give 0 stars. First of all, they dont answer phone calls. They have no return policy of online orders when they are on sale. its horrible policy. Never gonna buy their products now on. They are greedy, no exchange and refund policy.

I was sent the wrong size item, customer service said to give it to someone as a gift, and would not issue a refund or even replacement. second customer service rep said they would issue a refund, but did not follow through.
They dont accept returns if the tag is off
Not open during their posted business hours, no access after ringing the bell several times and waiting.
No one answers calls or voice mail?

name: Switchboard Technology
address: Switchboard Technology, 4180 Lougheed Hwy. #305, Burnaby, BC V5C 6A7

detailed_reviews.review_text: Our team is very happy using the switchboard product. This app is super useful and helpful for users that lack advanced knowledge of technology. I liked how user-friendly the app is. I would recommend this app to anyone who is looking for a quick and easy way to use the logbooks.

After hearing rave reviews from others in the industry and reading the reviews on the google playstore, I decided to give this one a try after 2 others. This one is by far the best. Its got everything we need for our operations and then some. It didnt cost as much as the others and there are updates with new features and fixes free of charge. App runs smoothly and have no issues with officers either. This has relieved so much stress for me so thank you!! I have also left a review on the google playstore, got to support a local company!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the kind words Matthew! Let us know if you need anything else at support@onswitchboard.com! :)

detailed_reviews.review_text: We run a fleet of about 60 trucks in it, truly Switchboard is doing an outstanding work in the field of ELOG book, its not only easy to install but also very user friendly. Moreover, the support team is more than helpful just a msg away. Keep growing and keep serving Trucking industry.

It was great chatting the with people at Switchboard. Theyre friendly and straight to the point in providing their service. I would highly recommend them if your fleet or truck is looking to install ELDs!
Its great working with Switchboard. Easy to use app and great customer Support.
Very good Customer support team especially Wall-e......he rockzzzz

Got to see this program in action Wow takes trucking to a new level . Every company should have this program you can actually see where your driver is and it is not a phone app that loses service whenever theres no reception quite impressive
5/5 Great Customer Service experience. The management is super good. They resolved the issue with the ELD right away. Thank you.
Simple and user friendly application for trucking industry. Always there is a quick response from the support team.
We have been using Switchboards ELD solution with our fleet for more than a year now. Great product, great people!
amazing and easy to set up and use :)  great customer service as well thank you!
Excellent customer service. It was really appreciative when client is treated with upmost hospitality.
I use Switchboard as my AOBRD and it works perfectly. Officers like it and it was easy switching over from paper
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Raju :)

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great local company pushing the trucking industry into the 21 century!
Fantastic product and best customer service around!!
Innovative product and great service
great service.
ELDs work great
Excellent customer support.  Just need some bug fixes other than that the product is very efficient.
They have a great Support Team. Great Company to work with.

I get set up with this company last year, and they are completely useless! I m trying to cancel their service for last 3 months, and no buddy can t help me ! I don t recommend this Company! Samsara works 100% better, I can use gps Without Electronic Logbooks! After seven months, I still didn t cancel my service with this company ! I try to call and speak with customer service. Also, I sent couple emails and I never get transfer! I would like to share,my experience with them. Everyone deserve,to know what kind of company is this! I am pretty sure there is more people who has same kind of experience,with them and they can confirm,customer service of Swich Board is 0!!

I am with switchboard for many years now. Trying to get a simple answer from them that what are the subscriptions i have but nobody have any qlue. Seriously? Is this how you guys are running business? I ll try again to get an answer and ll post again and again. When we are in Canada, we need to provide services like canada. You are taking money in dollars not in any other currency. Why so pathetic services?

Using their services from 2+ years and their technical department is helpless and not understandable. From last 2 month Eld is working but not updating to back office, Tracking not working  and no internet working. Explained this situation to 5-7 people differently. No one leave notes for next person. Every time I have to explain this situation to the new person. Almost wasted more 10-12 hrs with these guys over the phone and they are wasting their time too. These guys don t understand that replacing eld can better option for customer and them. It can save time and money for both.

I bought it  thought it was cool and simple but it no working with my 2020 peterbilt ,support  says we working on it ,in meantime they still  taking  money out  of my account for a services  that dont work I want my money back  like your website  says. One word integrity
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Teresia, for 2020 Peterbilts/Kenworth trucks, we provide a special cable adapter for you to use, please contact us at support@onswitchboard.com to ask for the cable adapter, thanks!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Purchased this and have downloaded the software. When creating an account it said Switchboard unresponsive and kicked me out and now I cant log back in as I have no username and cant recreate the account as it says it already exists. Called Switchboard and emailed them but still have received no help. My ELD is on its way but Im starting to regret my purchase if this is how customer support is going to be.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Dale, Im sorry to here that! You must have had an older version of Switchboard - if you download the latest version you should see no issues regarding usernames and password. Otherwise, please let us know at support@onswitchboard.com!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Customer service 0. More then one week waiting to call me back. Told them i need to start my trip again in Saturday need to fix my log book issue. No one care.
Idk what this is but it looks kinda ghetto and spooky round these parts so I gotta warn yall
Very bad experience.
Helpline service is very bad

name: Balderdash Brewing Company
address: Balderdash Brewing Company, 1420 E Georgia St, Vancouver, BC V5L 2A8

detailed_reviews.review_text: Ive always enjoyed a cold beer on a hot day. This craft beer is  very smooth with a mellow taste.. You have a new customer!
Fantastic beer for a great price. The  Sneaky Weasel tastes like original Innis and Gunn, it seriously does. I really like all of them.
Hi guys, really enjoying your Sneaky Weasel Lager. Usually Id drink Sleemans but your bang for the buck far exceeds them. Great beer, great price. Cheers,

I was hesitant at buying this beer but after cracking open my first Sneaky Weasel it will be my go to beer. Great beer at a great price. Not sure if all these craft breweries realize that they heading towards pricing themselves out of the market, always the price is going up. Balderdash has a great business model and a great beer! Keep it up!

I Am sure in my 67 years I have tried A LOT of different beers,,I Am not one who always drinks just one product, I like different beers depending on occasion. I like a guinness ( dark and strong taste ) at times. My other go tos,, Sleemans honey brown and Keystone red. I must admit ,the packaging of Sneaky Weasel is what caught my eye,needless to say I was more than impressed with its smooth taste. Now I tell my friends if they want a refreshing change try Sneaky Weasel. Also great to support local.

Started liking beer on a group trip to NFLD.  Honey Browns mainly but got Balderdash Sneaky Weasel cause of the cool name and can design (and it was cheap) now its my beer.  Very smooth, all kinds of notes one after the other.  Just delightful
That Sneeky Weasel tho. The price + the taste my god you cant get a better deal now. Well done over there,
Love SNEAKY WEASEL . Tastes better than many way more expensive beers. Well done they keep sneaking back into my fridge! ;)
Have not been to the brewery yet but Im pretty sure I am paying some of your bills. gonna stop by soon from Harrison for some merch though. I need a flag to fly above my house.
Balderdash makes one of the best local lagers Ive tried. Sneaky weasel is always my go to for a great beer for great value.
Went to neighbors house and they offered me a beer. It was Sneaky Weasel. Good beer. Love the cans and box . Told others now they buying .
Typically super cheap lagers taste awful to me but the sneaky weasel craft lager is pretty tasty! Great work
Everything you could want in a beer. Great taste, inexpensive, and good graphics. Love the Sneaky Weasel.
Really good beer and at a great price. No problem serving this beer to anyone.
They have one of the best beers i have ever had in my life
I have not been there but love sneaky weasel lager.
Thanks for making great beers with great price.
Great beer.  Great price.
Great beer at a great value!
I love my sneakys.
I like the sneaky weasel a lot! But the Sly Fox IPA!! You guys nailed it!! Very good!!!! Easy drinking and a clean finish! Cudos!!
Have you considered naming one of your beers dodgy badger
No brewery here. Update your address.
This location does not exist, I wandered through the back alkeys for 2 hours and gave up and ended up falling asleep in the park.
Is not here, don t waste your time

name: FoodPak Ltd.
address: FoodPak Ltd., 14480 Knox Way #110, Richmond, BC V6V 2Z5

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great company, the delivery guy is professional. Enjoy working with FoodPak.

I am the co-founder of a new start-up wellness company. I came across FoodPak by total coincidence when a truck with their logo on it drove past me on the highway last summer. I had just been discussing the issues we were having around sourcing the sustainable packaging we had hoped to use for our new products, when I turned and saw the FoodPak advertising right there on the truck in the lane beside me. That was the beginning of what has been the most positive and professional experience we have had as new entrepreneurs on this journey. Nick was so informative and patient with our high maintenance requests, and went above and beyond with sourcing and creating the perfect packaging to fit the vision of our brand.  He listened, then communicated his plan, and then executed on that plan on budget and ahead of schedule.  We are already excited about what we can create with FoodPak in the future and are so grateful for the outstanding customer service and product we received.  Thank you!

Despite all the challenges 2020 threw at us - we were able to kick start a business and grow exponentially in a matter of months. Key to that quick growth and success has been the efficiency and expertise of the team at Foodpak.
Excellent customer service. Listened to my needs and produced fantastic packaging for my product! Thanks so much for all your help!
Great company
Such friendly staff
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Peter!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Very nice and good, I like
Good
I am driver

Have purchased a couple machines, an impulse sealer and a bunch of bags. Although I had experienced an issue around sales communication vs reality of the delivery, the issue was resolved with fairness and I have enjoyed working with this company generally. Their machines are quite good and the  warehouse among the cleanest and most organized I have ever seen.

detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Rajesh, I m not familiar with any business dealings we ve had together but I d be very interested to learn about the less than positive dealings you ve experienced with our organization. Please feel free to reach out to me directly at jff@foodpak.ca.

Yogeesh, We appreciate you taking the time to review our business. Can you please share the context around your negative review? I m not familiar with any business dealings we ve had but we work hard to provide a positive customer experience so any feedback you can provide us with will help us improve that experience moving forward.

Hi Paul! I was surprised to see such a negative review so Ive dug through our records to try to find any past business dealings and couldnt. Id be interested in learning more about your experience to see how we can possibly rectify it. Can you reach out to me directly so I can see what can be done about it?

name: Prettech Canada Inc.
address: Prettech Canada Inc., 5791 Prince Albert Street V5W 3E1, Vancouver, BC V6H 3X8

detailed_reviews.review_text: Michael and the Prettech Canada team were fantastic partners when purchasing some equipment to start up our farm distillery in Ontario. Speaking as a very small scale player, I was amazed at how generous Michael was with his time in guiding me towards the right equipment solutions. The team was quick to respond, flexible with my needs, and overall enjoyable to work with. Looking forward to partnering with Prettech again in the future as we scale up our business.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Congratulations up coming opening, Im on standby if I can assist. Ryan, i appreciate the kind review.

detailed_reviews.review_text: I have had the pleasure of working with Michael and Prettech Canada over the last year. Not only is the equipment exceptional but the service is fantastic as well. Michael does extensive work to ensure you have the right equipment for the job. Multiple times he has come to my facility, and gathered all the information I needed for my space. He is an invaluable asset to my company and would recommend him to anyone looking to get in the brewing or distillation space.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Exceptional client, thank you for the kind review Peter. Im looking forward to your continued success nice work!

detailed_reviews.review_text: As the General Manager for Pure Spirits Inc, I have had the pleasure of dealing with Michael Chaplin of Prettech Canada since the summer of 2022. His company has provided exceptional support and direction in order to help us achieve our goals. We look forward to continuing our collaboration for years to come, and highly recommend his company and services!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Nino

detailed_reviews.review_text: We hired Prettech Canada to design our custom stainless  ethanol holding tanks, as well as install a new production still at our distillery in Delhi, ON.  From the very start Michael was available for us almost around the clock any always had the answers to keep our project moving in the right direction.  The engineering team brought our vision to a reality.  We would highly recommend this company and will use them exclusively in all of our future distillery expansion projects.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Brilliant thank you for the nice words Joel. Ive enjoyed working with you and your team. Its truly a pleasure working with a winning team of for thinkers. Nice work

detailed_reviews.review_text: I ve had the opportunity to work with Prettech Canada on brewhouse system engineering and quality assurance. Exceptional attention to detail, and some of the best welds i ve seen around. The team was a pleasure to work with, friendly and personable. Spent some time with CEO Mike who goes out of his way to ensure customer success. Kudos!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Jonathan, Ive enjoyed working with you & look forward to some fun projects in the future.

detailed_reviews.review_text: I purchased a small brewery system from Mike from Prettech Canada and so far have been satisfied by the craftmanship of the builds and impressed by the service from the company. Also the care of securing the products within the container, to make sure it arrives in perfect condition. Mike was easily accessible for getting information and pass it to me right away.  He goes above and beyond the scope of service for me.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the opportunity to earn your trust and business Clayton, its truly been a pleasure. Please let me know if and when I can assit you and your team with anything. Looking forward to stopping over for a Cold one. :)

detailed_reviews.review_text: We have the fortune to be located close to Prettech Canada and thus we have experienced the outstanding customer service long before the delivery of the equipment. Michael has provided useful suggestions, recommendations, physical help and even tools to tackle and solve many of the challenges associated with the entire process and not only limited to the equipment delivery and installation. Recently the equipment was delivered and we were highly impressed with the quality of the manufacturing and the attention to details. All this combined with competitive pricing make, in our opinion, Prettech Canada the number 1 choice in brewing equipment.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Enrico, it was a pleasure working with you. I really like your location and its been a fun project. :)

detailed_reviews.review_text: Had the pleasure of collaborating with Prettech Canada on a project. Their level of professionalism and pride in their craftsmanship and work is top-notch. You can be 100% sure you are in good hands with Prettech. Look forward to working with them again in the future.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Kris is the owner of  Attention to Detail and thats an understatement his craftsmanship is amazing he put a mere polish on some copper tanks that had them piping with brilliance. I can hardly wait to work with his team again! If your looking for prompt service and a keen eye for detail Kris is your man!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Michael and I have worked together since long before the conception of Prettech Canada. Watching him grow the business has been a real treat. Integrity is important to him and he puts everything he has into his business. Prettech Canada provides amazing brewing equipment, and quality customer service. I would definitely recommend them to anyone looking to start or expand a brewery.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the kind words Paul.

detailed_reviews.review_text: As a wine and spirit consultant, I deeply appreciate quality, reliability and creativity. Prettech Canada has always provided me with excellent service, invaluable to the needs of my clients. This includes custom-made equipment including mash-tun, fermentation tanks, pumps, cooling unit etc. Lead time is good, with a genuine support for each request. I highly recommend Michael and Prettech Canada to any new or existing customers.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Laurent, Im happy to help any time your welcome to call me 7 days a week Im up until midnight. Cheers, Michael

detailed_reviews.review_text: I have been working with Prettech Canada for quite some time now. I just have to say that it has been an amazing experience through and through. Mike is excellent at networking and delivering results. His resources astound me! Better yet, he hires local agents, bringing jobs to the US. Not many companies can say that theae days. I would absolutely recommend Prettech Canada to anyone looking to start a brewery, or even expand on an existing business!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Jacob

detailed_reviews.review_text: Worked with Mike and his team at Prettech designing 6 -- 5000L jacketed tanks for wine.  Upon seeing the collaborative finished design I was impressed with the quality of work and the attention to detail.  For instance, a little hook was welded to the tank near the mast to hold the bar that swivels the mast.  This was not requested but was a nice touch. For travel across the ocean they arrived rather quickly, installation wasnt too complicated, cooling system was plumbed and we were up and running. When there is the next expansion phase  Prettech will get a call.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for you rave review Mike its a pleasure working with a high level pro it makes our job a lot easier at Prettech Canada.

detailed_reviews.review_text: We recently purchased a 10BBL brewery from Prettech Canada and have been very pleased with the quality of the product and the workmanship. We had a few minor  issues along the way but Michael was able to resolve these problems in a timely manner and see us through till we were completely satisfied.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Wow thanks for the Steller review Rhys

detailed_reviews.review_text: Have worked with Michael and Prettech Canada for years. Not only could you not ask for better brewing equipment and advice but Mike and the team go out of their way to make sure clients are happy. Wonderful people and help. Thanks for everything and I look forward to many more years of success!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Matthew, Im passionate about the craft & working with people just like you and look forward to many more years of diligence! Cheers!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Ordered a pair of brite tanks from Michael and couldnt be happier. Very competitive pricing and great customer service. Michael picks up the phone and responds very promptly which made the whole process run smoothly. Will definitely be ordering from them in the future!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Ryan, we focus on perfection on our welds and sanitary finishes. I look forward to engineering your next project. As a repeat client you will enjoy a discount. Cheers!

detailed_reviews.review_text: I was contacted almost immediately after requesting a quote. Even after explaining that I was a brewing student working on a project planning a brewery, Mike was still happy to help. In fact, he gave me multiple quotes and plans for different sizes of equipment, as part of the project involves scaling up. He even connected me with industry people in my area. I will definitely be contacting him if I am ever planning a brewery in the future.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Grants is a high-level student from the Olds College Beer Program. He has a drive that is compelling and belongs to this industry. His forward approach is noteworthy and I look forward to trying his wears. Ill also be looking forward to seeing and tasting some of your future-orientated award-winning beers! Cheers

detailed_reviews.review_text: We just started our cidery in July. Michael was excellent in his approach to our needs and he had a genuine interest in our success. His follow up was in a timely manner and his support continues to this day. Thank you Michael and Prettech Canada !
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Boyd, Ive enjoyed working with your team. Please reach out if I can be of assistance. Cheers Michael

detailed_reviews.review_text: Had some tough brewing questions and issues and Prettech Canada helped me work through them all. Not only did I get the custom tanks I needed but also the expert advice I was looking for. Thanks to Michael and his team for taking great care me. I could not have asked for anything more.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Matt, feel free to contact me anytime. Im often up late working with my engineers so if you have any tough questions Ill figure it out. I really enjoy helping

detailed_reviews.review_text: Mike and the Prettech team are great at what they do. Everything from their manufacturing and customer service is phenomenal.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Gaurav, thank your for your 3rd procurement Ive really enjoyed working with you and the Maan Farms & Estate Winery projects over the years. I appreciate what you bring to the table, Im happy to assist anytime!

detailed_reviews.review_text: I purchased 2 fermentation vessels @Prettech  Canada. Michael was prompt and reliable. Im looking forward for our next purchase.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: My Pleasure Maria, I welcome your procurement anytime

detailed_reviews.review_text: Very best company prettech Canada inc. I appreciate this company work. High recommend
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Madusanka, thank you for the kind words, if you can use any further assistance from engineering my team are at your disposal! I had my senior engineer send you a compressive 3-D  diagram for your still assembly today.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Highly recommend! Excellent service, great results.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the kind words im happy to help anytime!

detailed_reviews.review_text: DO NOT UNDER ANY CIRCUMSTANCES USE THIS COMPANY!!!   Please learn from my mistake and others.  Very poor customer relations.  Fermentation tank welds are not ground.  Mike doesnt understand equipment configuration.  This WILL be your worst mistake.  They are outside of the USA and thus out of your reach for recourse after problems occur.  My brewery is up and running thanks to Stout Tanks and Kettles ability to provide good quality equipment at a good price.  Mike is a CON MAN.  You have been warned.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Craig, I am very sorry to hear that you had a bad experience with us. This is not a typical experience with Prettech Canada. Every piece of a equipment is checked and double checked to ensure the best quality product, prior to shipping. These checks do include welds. At Prettech Canada we pride ourselves on the quality of the product we provide to our customers. Stout is a well known company and a solid competitor for smaller equipment. I am very glad that they were able to take care of your business needs. Stout Tanks and Kettles has a great reputation. Stout does ship from China. I think that every American and Canadian business would love to have North American based assembly. Given that you love your new tanks, you can see that outsourced assembly does not inherently indicate poor quality. It does however allow companies like Stout Tanks and Kettles to offer prices that are more reasonable for a business such as yours. When we last spoke, I was not aware that your complaint included welding issues. Please feel free to reach out to me directly to address your concerns in more detail. Happy Brewing!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Mike hired us to do some Warranty Repairs for a client in Cold Lake. The tank was severely cracked and a lot of time went into repairing it. We had verbal authorization from Michael to go ahead with each step. They have not to this date paid their bill to us and the do not answer any of our attempts to contact them. Be wary - they dont pay.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Shawna, sorry to learn your still having problems with Prettech Asia honoring there repair bill. I left there firm 1.5 years ago for that exact reason. You are correct they do not pay hence me moving on if you require Prettech Asias contact information again please send me an email and Im happy to forward you Maria Li contact information again. Respectfully Mike 604 783 6003 text is best

detailed_reviews.review_text: In pursuing contact with Prettech Asia, they have indicated that Prettech Canada is not selling their products and will not guarantee anything Prettech Canada sells. Our company did a warranty repair for Mike in 2017 and still have not been paid for our work, despite numerous attempts to collect. Buyer beware - this company owes us over $6,000.00 and refuses to pay. As a reply to your reply: You hired us 3 years ago in 2017. This is when we did the work. We were never paid for that work. The cost of the repair was communicated throughout the process, it was inside the tank on an outlet in a very difficult to get to spot. We needed to chase the crack because each time we attempted to repair, it would spider out further. We brought in NDT testing (after you approved it) to confirm that the repair was good. We travelled to Cold Lake twice (290+KM one way) to complete this repair. We have been out of pocket for the testing, the materials required, travel and the labor for 3 years. We have attempted to collect. Asking for photos of an obscure and hard to get at part of a tank we have already repaired is unwarranted. Ask the client. His tank did not leak after the repair.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for your reply Shawna, Prettech Asia was the firm I left 4 years ago for the exact reasons you have mentioned. Poor craftsmen ship and not honoring there warranty work. The work was done for Prettech Asia and once again they didnt honor there commitment. They didnt like the fact that your minor fix cost more than the whole tank. Prettech Asia owes you $6000 dollars. Im not associated with Prettech Asia in any shape or form. The tank that had the 2 inch specialty weld done on it. The value of the tank was $5200 dollars the 2 inch fix was $6000 I believe Prettech Asia asked for photos and they werent provided and the client Prettech Asia had trouble justifying there *exorbitant bill*.  Sorry to hear you have had bad luck with Prettech Asia as well. Prettech Canada has multitudes of 5 Star ratings for my commitment to the Craft Brewing Industry. I look forward to sharing with you the best welds in the industry!!!

detailed_reviews.review_text: My husband made the mistake of working with this man and company. I highly advise against it. What ever cost savings you believe you might have you will lose on the back end 10 fold.  This man is a liar and a snake and uses fake reviews to inflate his horrible 2nd hand china products.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Younique, We am sorry to hear that your husband did not enjoy his experience with us. I believe that we have attempted to address a few other reviews related to this purchase. We appreciate the feedback we have received from these reviews. As a business we value our customers happiness and will always make attempts to create a positive buying experience. While there is definitely diversity in our reviews, including not just purchasing clients, but agencies that we work alongside. All components to the business are important, and we value each review that we receive. I can assure you that any reviews that we have received are legitimate. I am sure that any of these businesses would be happy to share their experience and show off their equipment! Prettech Canada wishes you and your husband all the best, and a Happy Mothers Day!

name: Repel Technologies
address: Repel Technologies, 7007 Victoria Dr, Vancouver, BC V5P 3Y9

detailed_reviews.review_text: I ve build a few houses in the last few years and had a great experience with Repel Technologies on my latest project. They use quality products and are knowledgeable with the latest technologies available.  Alvin provided me with professional advice that was invaluable in choosing the best products for my home. Felix was an excellent installer who worked carefully and made sure everything was working properly. keep up the great work!

I would recommend Sam and their team for all sorts of jobs big and small. Their team is professional and organized. Sam is excellent at providing his expert opinion to save homeowners money and make the best overall project. Ive used Repel for many projects and could not recommend them enough.

I used Repel for my house and I was amazed at the professional and quality of work done by Sam and his crew. They were on time organized and did not leave any mess behind for me to clean up. They take there time and put some thought behind the work they are doing. The wire maybe covered by drywall after but they take there time to tie them up and organize them. They don t leave a maze of wire they hide them making it hard for a nail to accidentally hit anything. Would recommend them to anyone looking for quality work. Great crew with amazing knowledge. Service: Installation

Repel updated  my entertainment system in November. Their prices were competitive but their services were great. They provided feedback on what was best and even suggested not replacing some of components to save us some  costs. When a slight programming issue arose after installation, they responded quickly and fixed it!  Highly recommend this family run company for your needs.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you! Glad you are enjoying your system.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Repel Technologies helped me with my new home build and provided all my audio/video, home automation, and sound acoustic treatments for my home theatre. Very knowledgeable staff! Staff was a pleasure to work with and was able to provide us with the experience we were looking for and on a reasonable budget. Would recommend these guys for anyone looking for custom audio/video and automation services!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you! The pleasure was ours.

detailed_reviews.review_text: My not-tech-savy boomer parents wanted to put a projector/movie room in their brand new house. Repel was extremely patient with them and walked them through the different options and price points, creating multiple quotes along the way. The repel team communicated very well with our contractors even though they were extremely hard to deal with. We worked mostly with Alvin and Erik who were very friendly and knowledgable. They ended up also suggesting and installing a beautiful smart TV and sound bar in the living room and also installing our door bell system. The best part is they were able to connect all our devices to a single remote making everything extremely easy to use. My parents love their TVs and were extremely satisfied with Repels services! Thanks Repel!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Youre welcome Megan!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Would like to say one BIG thank you to the owners of Repel Juji & Sam. From the day of meeting them right to the completion they were available helpful & communicative. All issues that arose during the process were rectified in a timely professional manner. Their technician Alex was truly amazing in his technical knowhow and service. In construction of a new home I felt they took care as if their own. I have recommended and will surely continue to recommend Repel. Great team including Jujis and Sams son Alvin. GUYS I appreciate your help & work. If i missed anyone I apologize. SEE ON THE NEXT PROJECT!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks! Looking forward to the next one!

detailed_reviews.review_text: BEST PRICE IN TOWN with the same HIGH QUALITY products and service as other popular brands. Alvin, the owner, was very professional, knowledgeable, responsive, personable, and accommodating. He came on-site several times - something few companies do. They work VERY hard for you. One time, the painter ruined the HDMI cable, so Repel brought a new one - except it was defective, so they stayed a couple hours until Alvins brother brought a replacement and retested everything before they left. It was so easy to just leave a new cable without doing anything, but these guys do everything with diligence. We got their home monitoring install + service, security camera package, low voltage (TV/telephone/internet) install, home theatre package, central vacuum, water bug, you name it. Repel offers competitor top tier monitoring service package for a price cheaper than the competitors basic price! Weve used their products for 3 months now, and the only issue I had was with the security cameras. The manufacturer is from China and partially state-owned so Im a bit paranoid about installing their app on my phone. And weve had a couple of connectivity issues on the monitor. HOWEVER, it does the job so I cant complain. If you are deciding between Repel and another company, always, always, always choose Repel. Save yourself some trouble, time, and money.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the kind review Michael!

detailed_reviews.review_text: We recently built a new house and used Repel for our home automation.  They were able to hit our budget needs and still deliver on most of the technology that we wanted for our home build.  Juji is a very attentive business owner and Nick/Alex are skilled technicians.  I recommend their services if you are in the market for an affordable automation solution.  Additionally, I find their home monitoring excellent thus far.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Gordon, we are happy we could help the needs for your home!

detailed_reviews.review_text: We recently built a house and had a good experience with Repel.  The owner came into our home and did a walk thru with us on the products we picked and went over product locations with us.  Nick did all the rough in and was great to deal with and would call when he was unsure about something.  Alex comes in and does the finishing and was very capable at the job.  Would highly recommend.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Kern, we really appreciate your kind words!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Contacted owner for upgrade of alarm system.  Alex the technician arrived promptly  and troubleshooted existing system and basically repaired existing after determining main board in great shape. Adjusted siren. Saved us hundreds. Thanks
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Harj!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Built my new home and couldnt be happier to have found this fantastic alarm home monitoring company.  Excellent service, knowledgeable and very prompt responses for any type of questions my wife or i would have.  Local company thats just trying to help one home at a time. They also have a system called control 4 that hooks up to your phone to allow you to operate your lights with a touch of a button at home or over your phone.  I would recommend this place to anyone thats thinking of replacing your old alarm system or looking for a new one.  Give them a chance, Im glad I did.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Tom, we are glad you are happy with our service!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great customer service during construction of our new house. Alvin was able to answer all of my questions and offer suggestions throughout the process. Very friendly family run business who care about their clients. Thanks to Justin and Alex as well!!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Youre very welcome Garry!

detailed_reviews.review_text: I got 3 quotes for a security system for a new home install and their price was the best. Very good communication and professional installers
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks!

detailed_reviews.review_text: its been a pleasant experience working with Repel guys. great team and very knowledgeable about security system. thanks again for the great service.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great reliable company. Alvins been great to work with.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Travis!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Amazing service and very knowledgeable!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Victor!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Sam was unprofessional and camera system broke down within few months after installation. After multiple calls Sam hasnt send  the technician for repair.They are using cheap Chinese cameras. I wont recommend this business to anyone

detailed_reviews.review_text: I agree 100% with the previous review. Repel installed a camera system which broke down after 1 year. They said it was only guaranteed for 1 year which was how long it lasted. I dont think a  reputable  company would have installed cheap  products knowing they wouldnt  last long.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Michael, were sorry to hear about the trouble youve experienced. Our standard warranty offering is for 1 year. Please give our office a call and we can provide you with solutions for your issue. Our office can be reached at 604-322-6300.
