name: First Lion Enterprises Furniture Assembly & Office Installation Company

owner.name: First Lion Enterprises Furniture Assembly & Office Installation Company (Owner)

address: First Lion Enterprises Furniture Assembly & Office Installation Company, 1783 Manitoba St, Vancouver, BC V5Y 0K1

detailed_reviews.review_text: I usually dont write reviews but the level of service was outstanding so I feel compelled. I was in a bind as a purchased a treadmill and .. yes they did say it was curbside drop off but I was in a panic when I realized how big and heavy it was when it arrived! I was going to get a buddy to install it but I decided to use First Lion when I saw how massive it was! I contacted them and they came to my rescue with very short notice the next day. They brought the treadmill in and set it up for me quickly and efficiently. I have to say that they were so calm and professional I was SO IMPRESSSED and I felt so confident in their skills and knowledge. i HIGHLY recommend First Lion as they were truly exceptional ! If you need an installation DO NOT HESITATE!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Jinelle, Thank you very much for the kind words. We appreciate your business and we hope you enjoy the new treadmill.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Trevor and Gabriel showed up on time and were pleasant and efficient. They installed our Bestar wallbed in a professional manner and were able to cope with Bestar packing the wrong screws for the handles; They had extra of the correct ones from a previous installation. Gabriel showed us how to use the features and warned us about possible usage missteps. Hiring them to do this was definitely worth it! Service: Furniture assembly
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Susan, thank you for the kind words.  We appreciate you calling us for your installation and hope you enjoy your beautiful new wall bed.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Bought a large wall unit for TV from Ikea, they put us in touch with Task Rabbit as their recommended installers. After several phone calls, emails, texts it became apparent that they new less than nothing about installing a wall unit or anything else for that matter. Although we were told they were professionals, the installer asked what tools he needed and if we would help him put it up. Not sure, but thought that was what we were paying him for to install and know what tools to bring. It became very obvious that we were gong to be in for a terrible experience so cancelled and started searching for an alternative. I found First Lion online and thank you to all that have sent in their experiences and expressed their satisfaction because it was from those reviews that convinced me to go with First Lion. Spoke with Gabriel and was impressed with the very pertinent questions he asked, obviously knew what he was doing. My experience: nothing short of absolute satisfaction. Extremely professional, knowledgeable, polite, hard working, perfect install. I expected to be pleased but was actually amazed. They are the only install company to use, bar none. More costly than Task Rabbit maybe, but worth every penny and more. They said they would arrive at 10am, they arrived at 9:50 and were working by 10. They finished at about 3 and although I asked them to take a break they politely declined and kept working. Gabriel and Brent were just two great hard working guys and deserve to get the kind of reviews that are listed here. Do yourself a favour and skip the stress of a poor install and just get First Lion to do it right the first time and sit back and enjoy. Cant say enough about them, really, awesome company.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Daniel. Thank you for the kind words.  Were glad you had a good experience.  We hope you enjoy the wall unit.  Gabriel!

detailed_reviews.review_text: We hired First Lion to set up our downtown office which consisted of modular office desks, filing cabinets and partition walls. Not only did these guys get the job done flawlessly, but they completed our office so quickly that we were able to save money with their reasonable hourly rate. We were quoted a flat rate by another company but decided to go with First Lion instead and we are happy we did because we now realize that the other company had quoted us an inflated flat rate. We will definitely be calling First Lion again in the future for our furniture installation and assembly.

VERY GOOD! I am a designer with 20 years of experience contracting carpenters, installers, furniture assembly, and moving trades and I met  First Lion a year ago. They do it all perfectly providing great solutions-oriented to details and are reasonable prices.  I recommend them to anyone. Barbara Smyth VOD Office Design. vancouverofficedesign.ca Services: Local moving

Wonderful experience dealing with Gabriel and the company in general, from the start to finish. We had quite a few items from Ikea that needed to be picked up , delivered & assembled and we are so glad we chose First Lion Express!! The prices are very competitive as compared to other services out there. The service is equally or more professional and worth every penny spent. Would definitely recommend First Lion Express. Also love the fact that a part of your service fee goes towards supporting the endangered species. Great job !

Gabriel came to help me with a delivery of IKEA goods to furnish one of my four bedroom suites. I wanted to try out his services first as his rates were very reasonable but I didnt know him personally. Let me just say that as a professional real estate agent I have many encounters with handyman/contractors but I am glad I called Gabriel as he was extremely professional, punctual, and knowledgeable with lots of care when it came to transporting my your goods and installation/building of my furniture. I will 100% be using Gabriel and First Lion Express again to get the other 3 suites furnished and have no hesitation in recommending him and his professional services.

Gabriel is nothing short of heroic.  He returned my call within minutes, was extremely professional and pleasant, came the same day, and assembled a really heavy, bulky, complicated piece of Ikea furniture in two hours - all by himself when the instructions had said you needed two people.  The hourly rate is the same or lower than the others and without all the hidden fees.  He was so great that when I needed some handyman work done, I called Gabriel without hesitation.  Once again, he was tremendously kind and professional.  I think the second job I gave him was even more difficult than the first yet he did it graciously and with a big smile for a really, really good price.  Gabriel embodies what the tradespeople of a bygone era were like - incredibly service oriented, punctual, professional, completely trustworthy, honest, hard-working, and very highly skilled. As an aside, as a single woman, I am very careful about who I let into my home.  I had no hesitation about Gabriel and in fact when I had to step out for a few minutes he was even thoughtful enough to say Ill keep your house safe while youre gone .   Hire Gabriel.  He will give you the very best, highest-quality, most professional service for the best price.  He is the real deal.
The installation guys were polite and on time. They did a great job installing my pax wardrobes and ensuring they were mounted correctly. I was really impressed with the level of service.

My roommate and I are both students, with a mix of IKEA and other furniture. We booked in with First Lion and were met with professionalism and timely service. Due to poor weather, I was concerned about our move date, but received a call beforehand assuring me that everything was still a go. Our furniture was handled with care, and the team even helped us with some of our more delicate pieces; pictures and my bike. The quote given was quite reasonable, and the job was done in a matter of a couple hours. It saved me the huge headache of arranging people and vehicles to help. They will definitely be called in the future; should I ever need to move again.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Keely, Thank you very much for the kind words.  We are happy that you had a good experience.  We hope you and your roommate enjoy your new place. First Lion Express Team

detailed_reviews.review_text: Moving is such a hassle.. First Lion Express made the move extremely flawless & stress free. The guys were great, they moved my stuff very carefully, wrapped my nice white furniture so it wouldnt get dirty or scratched. They took extra care of everything & I really appreciate that. I would 100% use them in all my future moves. They have excellent customer service & answered all my questions thoughtfully.

Gabriel is THE MAN for the job. My experience with his service was nothing but positive. When it comes to your home, you want someone like Gabriel to be working on it. He knows what he is doing and his services are insured. He is meticulous on quality of the job, such as what material to use and precautions to take before moving on to the next step. Get it DONE RIGHT, call First Lion Express.

First Lion helped install a queen sized murphy bed purchase at Costco. It was not a small job, but they were here on time and extremely professional throughout. Lots of small troubleshooting done on the spot, appreciated their time very much.
First Lion helped install a wall mount bed for us and I was extremely impressed. They were on time, professional, did an excellent job and I would highly recommend them.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Jonathan, Thank you kindly for the feedback.  We hope you enjoy the new murphy bed.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Recently had an Ikea wall unit and TV wall mounted by Gabriel and Brent , and I have to say I was happy that I chose First Lion . After reading the reviews of OTHER companies out there , I knew that I had to get the right people , or risk a potential disaster . These guys were on time , explained everything to me , made suggestions , and were very professional . The end result is that it looks great , and was a stress less experience for me . I highly recommend this company .
Call First Lion if you want a clean crew that shows up on time.  My Pax was built quickly and properly, and consistent with time and billing estimates.  Many thanks to First Lion!
The absolute best company for furniture assembly and moving. It was so fast, they were so knowledgeable and I literally won t use another company for my next furniture assembly or move.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Stephanie, thank you for your kind feedback.  Were happy to help.  Enjoy your new furniture.

detailed_reviews.review_text: They are very professional and their response was very fast I love their service I ll hire them again Service:
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for your feedback K. Glad we could help!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Expert furniture assembly.  100% reliable and professional
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much Gail. :)

detailed_reviews.review_text: Ive used First Lion four times over the past couple of years. Outstanding service and results!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Laureen, Thank you so much for your review.  It was a pleasure working with you.  We hope youre doing well.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Quality service and friendly people!
Kind, efficient, helpful and great!!! Thanks Gabriel!!!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Glad to help. Thank you again!!!

name: Provident Security Corp.
address: Provident Security Corp., 2309 W 41st Ave, Vancouver, BC V6M 2A3

detailed_reviews.review_text: Provident Security has been awesome in providing quick service to our team. They support all of our locations and always go the extra mile to ensure that all of our information is kept confidential. They are available 24/7 and have fixed ANY issue that arises. If you never want to worry about the security of your home or business again, use Provident. We couldnt imagine using another company - they are superb!

I have personally used the services of Provident Security since 1998. As a  local Westside Realtor, I also have no hesitation to refer their services out to my Clients as I know they will be taken care of. They are an amazing company.  Customer service is phenomenal.  The guaranteed response time has come into play a few times over the years and I have always been taken care of quickly and efficiently.  Great personal service and follow up.  Professional staff.  I highly recommend Provident Security. I wouldnt choose any other company.

Ive been a Provident client since 2006 and have had them look after three homes. Most recently we worked with Chrissie on the sales team who coordinated an installation in our new home. Reza & John were the Technicians who did a great job getting everything installed and set up. Weve also made great use of the concierge service, including getting last minute deliveries to both our home and even the beach.

Provident Security is amazing. Having had such a great experience with them in Vancouver (at our home and 2 business locations), it made sense to have them take care of our Whistler place. I am amazed by how much convenience and piece of mind they have given me. Provident has called us when our water sensors went off.  I know that we dodged a huge bullet (a friend didnt know about a slow leaking pipe in their place and it cost them over $100,000 and almost a year in renovations). Provident has also let me into my own place (when I left my keys in Vancouver).  This saved my family and I over 4 hours of travelling time. Provident - you rock

Provident put the best possible spin on our recent break-in.  With the alarm ringing, the thief was in and out in 2 minutes and Provident arrived 1 minute later (i.e., in 3 minutes!) They definitely saved us from a robbery of much greater magnitude. Provident personnel could not have done a better job  - from providing accurate and reassuring details in the initial phone call to us, to greeting us with empathy when we arrived at the house, boarding up the broken window and even cleaning up mud and glass from the interior of the house.  They walked us through what had happened and gave us tips to prevent further break-ins. These two Provident employees really helped offset our distress at being broken into and definitely exemplified the high standards advertised at Provident.  We cannot recommend them more highly.

I couldnt be more impressed with Provident.  5 mins or less is unbelievable, the staff is well trained and incredibly professional, they are on a serious mission to get the job done quickly, efficiently, with quality and safety as top priorities.  I even had the opportunity to get a behind the scenes tour of the business from the founder, and I could not believe how well it is run.  Their business systems & processes are very well thought out to handle every scenario imaginable with precision.  Im a huge fan!

Provident Security has provided security surveillance for our house in Vancouver since 2008. Their service including installation, maintenance and continuous monitoring has always been personable, prompt, courteous and thorough. We highly recommend them.

One of the things I value in a company is there commitment to giving back to the community. I have helped organize a yearly kids charity run and have been fortunate to have had Provident support the event with the donation of the use of their huge inflatable slide (a very big hit each year with the kids). They have gone above and beyond to help make our event a success. It is not just about $ but about community too. Thank you Provident.

We have used Provident Security at our home and business since 2007. Not only are the the most responsive and most proactive security company we have ever used, they are among the most innovative. I was introduced to their Night Owl system and we have used it on several of our construction sites. I always enjoy the footage of bad guys being arrested on camera after Night Owl spots them, in the dark, after hours. Provident then vectors the police to exactly where they are hiding, and our sites stay safe. Provident has always given us great value for money.
We used Providents concierge service to shuttle us around town. The cars were on time, the drivers courteous and the routes efficient. I thoroughly enjoyed their service and recommend them highly.
Responded quickly to service calls. Technician (Harry) was punctual, knowledgeable and professional.

Customer since 2015, now onto our second home with them. Cant recommend their service enough, from initial consult to installation to ongoing monitoring service, they go above and beyond what most would expect from their security monitoring service!
Provident Securitys concierge service is an amazing offering
Great company, respond quickly to alarms and wonderful customer service
Great alarm company.

Being a long tenured customer of this company means nothing - their accounting teams mistakes/deficiencies are blamed on customers and even though services are paid for in full - they refuse to fulfill their services. Horrible customer service - was not always like this...not sure what happened to this company. All our neighbours have moved onto other security providers and I can see why.

was driving sunday to pick up my wife from the hospital along 7th avenue..saw one of theere cars run a stop sign and almost hit me..followed him to the next one and he ran that too never stopped..after he stopped at 123 7th ave west.. i told  him he ran 2 stops signs and almost hit me becuz of that..he tol me to talk to the manager..was very upset and told there employee not to drive if he cant obey the rules ..he got rude with me and strarted arguing that i should mind my own business..so i contacted the office and reported there employee and how he acted..driving and as  a employee taking   no responsibilty for his actions..my opinion i would never hire a compnay that has employee that do this to others..it shows and reflects there hiring of employees..just imagine how  they take care of your property that needs protecting...disgusting ...

name: Deci3D - 3D Printing Company
address: Deci3D - 3D Printing Company, Online Contact ONLY, 450 SW Marine Dr #608, Vancouver, BC V5X 0C3

detailed_reviews.review_text: It was such a delight working with Deci3D - the team was always super communicative and thorough! They are also super knowledgable and provided recommendations on how the product can best be made/printed to fit your needs.

Amazing customer service. Nate and Michael took their time to make sure what we asked was possible. Quality of products were amazing as well. Already consider them as friends, thats how good they are.

This was my first time ordering a 3D printed part. Nate did an amazing job helping me through the process. Their prices are very fair, production is quick, and the pick up is easy. Sent them my file and it looked better than I imagined, very precise as well. Will definitely be ordering more from them in the future!
I m happy how this family of Totoros turned out for my friend as a birthday gift. I had a lot of questions as I ve never done printing before. I got great help and quick service. I ll print again!

Very reliable and professional service in local Vancouver. As a part of research team, we had been ordering 3d printing services from the US with much higher prices and leadtime, but we completely switched to Deci3D for our printing now!
Nate at Deci3D was able to print my design quickly and inexpensively.  Delivery was fast too.
Fast service, great prices, AWESOME people. I love picking up my orders - theyre so fast and available to pick up in Richmond. Ill always order from Deci3D, truly the best!!

Deci3D replied swiftly and overdelivered. They walked me through 3D printing in a detailed manner, taking time to explain the differences in materials, printing process, and best practices for using the parts. Their pricing was very competitive which surprised me as I always thought it would cost at least $25-40 before material costs. I was quoted less than a quarter of that. The folks that run this seemed very passionate. Given the opportunity, Ill be giving them my business again.
Great experience working with Michael on numerous projects. Always first class service and I feel he likes to get to know the client. Thanks again Michael, always a pleasure!

AMAZING customer service. Response time is incredible and product was ready by the next day. I requested a CanadaPost lettermail sizing tool for my small business. I have been using the tool everyday and the quality is fantastic! Will come back for any other 3D printing needs!!!
Love printing with these guys, super fast and great prices.

I was super happy with their services...Excellent communications and was able to do exactly what i wanted and super fast as well...turn around time was within 36hrs....will def use their services again
Excellent service, these guys work until late night to help me with a tight deadline. Strongly recommend their services. Thanks Nate.
These guys are the best. Fast turnaround and quality work. Always a pleasure to do business with. :)
Great work and service. Easy to deal with. Good pricing. Even dropped it off at my house. Highly recommend
Fair price, quick, good and accurate print, perfect support.
Quick turnaround and communication (this was a 3D print order)
definately recommended for a high quality 3d model with good customer service
Great service!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Adam!

name: Vancouver Solar & Electrical Ltd (V.S.E)
address: Vancouver Solar & Electrical Ltd (V.S.E), 3807 Marine Dr, Burnaby, BC V5J 3E3

detailed_reviews.review_text: Recently, Tarum and Vancouver Solar completed our solar installation, which was a major component for our new home to gain a national, Net Zero certification.  Tarum made it easy for us and performed admirably.  We are delighted on a job well done!

Tarum & his team were hired to install what was supposed to be a pretty straight forward 190+ solar panel installation.  The hicup was the delay of the new roof installation on the facility.  As a result Tarum had to work closely with the roofing contractor to make sure his installation met the warranty requirements.  I have to say that Vancouver Solar did an exceptional job of doing quality work despite the obstacles.  Tarum took care of all permits & dealing with BC Hydro to join its grid.  He made sure that the job was done right.  We are pleased with the finished product & would highly recommend Vancouver Solar.

Vancouver Solar was the best out of three quotes. I compared not only price per watt, but type of system and warranty. Our roof has many segments and some skylights, which added complexity, but the installation was done well and looks very clean. There are no visible wires on the roof although the system has 9 separate panel locations. Tarum the owner made the whole process easy including the permit application and the setup for net metering with hydro. He was happy to give me detailed explanations on the types of solar, we went with optimizers and an inverter, and answered many questions of mine. We re now 2 months in and the system is working really well. We ve had no issues and the app is easy to use. I m so happy to see our credits at BC Hydro building up this summer for when we need it in the winter. In the end I cannot recommend Vancouver Solar enough. Great job guys!

My wife & I researched the system, received quotes from 5 different contractors. Tarum made a big difference with his proposal, he performed an aerial site survey and thoroughly explained his design from the electrical service connection down to placement of each solar panel.All permitting completed, Engineer s sign-off, coordination with BC Hydro for our net-metering application, all taken care of and the installation completed promptly with a clean site each day. I would highly recommend Tarum & his team at Vancouver Solar & Electrical.

We researched and compared solar companies for about 6 months. I had spreadsheets cost comparing cost of installation with panels against the impact of the system. My husband researched panels and system set up. We were utterly careful, cautious and very deliberate and probably a little annoying to work with. Tarum was EXCEPTIONAL - and so thoughtful, patient and willing to share. He was flexible with system set up, thoughtful about our needs and utterly reliable. He was super careful with our roof, and handled all the paperwork with the city. I would absolutely recommend him! Exceptional experience and were THRILLED with our system!! It was affordable, designed well and brilliantly completed. I also waited for a windstorm before posting my review - just to be certain!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Megan, thanks ever so much for leaving such kind words. We re so glad that you re happy with your new solar array and we ll be keeping our eye on it on our remote monitoring software for years to come. All the best to you and Mick, you were such pleasant customers to work with. Tarum

detailed_reviews.review_text: We purchased 2 commercial systems from VSE, one in the city and one in a rural location in the interior of BC.  Tarum and his crew were fantastic from start to finish, great recommendations, very good value, fantastic attention to detail on the installation.  We are going to use them again for a 3rd system and would recommend them to anyone!
Installation was on time and on budget ! Our last bill was negative -$82 including all our electric Car charging. We would definitely recommend Tarum and his Vancouver Solar Team

We were building a new home and wanted to go all solar. We contacted some other companies, but Tarum was the most professional in explaining our options and had competitive pricing. Tarum took care of all the ordering, permits and schedules, and worked with our builder for the installation.  He also contacted BC-Hydro to setup the net-metering account. It was a hassle-free and smooth process. As we were the first solar in our area, Tarum had to spend a day tutoring to the electrical inspectors how the solar system worked. We now have 44 solar panels installed on our roofs along with a battery backup system and it has been working great.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Michael, thanks ever so much for your kind words and for being a great customer to work with. Ill be keeping an eye on your Solaredge EV charger inverter monitoring system for the solar array and built-in Tesla EV charger, aswell as your 3x Tesla Powerwalls with whole-home backup. Enjoy hour energy Freedom as the grid is now your backup!

detailed_reviews.review_text: We wanted to install solar panels and contacted several providers. When contacting VSE we were immediately impressed with Tarum s knowledge and experience. He offered a site visit and came out the same day. He used a drone to capture the roof capacity and within a day had a plan to us. Within two weeks from start to finish we had a 33 panel system. His staff are courteous and friendly. Our system is now functioning efficiently with a user friendly app for tracking output. We are pleased with our choice.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Paula, thanks ever so much for being great customers and also for positive feedback. Over the next 25 years I shall keep an eye on your Solaredge monitoring to ensure all is operational and that its meeting its predicted generation targets. Im glad your very satisfied with your new system and all the best to you and Nick. Best regards Tarum Lloyd

detailed_reviews.review_text: Vancouver Solar installed my solar panel system. The install went really well and I can say the workmanship and system is top notch! Tarum is very professional and always kept me apprised of everything. Tarum has a huge amount of experience and knowledge in solar systems worldwide and it shows when you observe him in action. I would recommend Vancouver Solar to anyone!

Vancouver Solar & Electrical Ltd (VSE) was the 3rd company I contacted to add more solar panels and how much would it be for a battery? 1st company, said, that I dont need a battery because, I got net metering from the power company. But did give me general price without too much details. And never got back to me on the cost of addition solar pannels. The 2nd company quoted me $25,000 for one Teslas Powerwall. After supplying them with pictures and diagrams of my exisiting system. But did not visit me to see my requirements. Only VSE quoted me and visiting my site and told me the addition requirements need to meet the current code. So after getting an engineers report (extra $), an upgrade to a 200 AMP electric service panel two handle my two electric cars ($5200) plus $1400 to the power company to disconnect the power on request, (blackouts are for free, and on the Sunday we had to change our clocks, we had four extra practices due to power backouts for about 10 minutes each, there was a major wind storm that day). The extra solar panels were installed within a month of contracting. But we waited three months for the transfer switch (Telsas Gateway) to arrive, but never came. So we had to disconnect two circuits to make room in the 100 amp panel for the solar power. The addition solar give me a total of 12.5 KWatts. During the summer months we had a large credit with the power company after the hotest summer on record and all the power we used for the AC. And was not until fourteen months later due to supply chain managment problems that the battieres came and were installed. During the installation of the solar panels, VSE did extra free not solar work for me. By installing a mounting bracket on the side of the roof. Saving me from hanging upside down over the edge of the roof 10 meters above the ground. We shall monitor our power usage and needs here to see if we may get a third powerwall in the future. In our home we have two adults working from home online, one going to school online, two RADAR stations (24 hrs/day), HF/VHF/UHF/SHF radio station, and emergency Internet. So our power requirements are unique that other companies would of gotten the business if they came over for a site inspection. VSE was the only company to do that and give a detail quote, and a report of the payback. Therefore VSE got the business. The Covid19 and supply chain management delays had nothing to do with VSE. Therefore I would recommend VSE for your power and Solar needs.

When Looking for a Solar Solution We had many estimates. VSE took the time to explain the different equipment options and guided us through the whole process. They made it very simple and were professional throughout. They arranged all the permits and registration for net-metering. We are very pleased with the work carried out and the follow up since.

Tarum and VSE is great to deal with, they answered all my questions, moved quickly for the install, and dealt with issues that arose due to a convoluting permitting process immediately. I would recommend their services for anyone looking for a solar installation.

When I contacted Vancouver Solar & Electrical Ltd., I received a prompt response and Tarum proved to be very knowledgeable, answering all our questions. Installation was swift & efficient. Tarum also helped me with the City Hall requirements. I can now make electricity even in the rain!

Tarum did an excellent job of installing my 31 solar panels quickly and thoroughly. His recommendations  for what I required were spot on. So far the panels have generated close to 3MWh and are great for charging my electric vehicles.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Jim, Thanks for the positive feedback and for being a great first Tesla Powerwall customer. Its been over a year now since we completed the installation of your 33x LG NeonR Solar Panels, Solaredge EV charger inverter and the 3x Tesla Powerwalls which now backup your entire home. On our Solaredge & Tesla mobile apps, I can see that everything is still working perfectly and that youve been charging and discharging your Powerwalls every evening, so that you avoid the higher BChydro tariff brackets. Im glad that your still happy with your system and that you enjoy your energy independency and Net-metering payments for the next 24 years. Kind regards Tarum Lloyd

detailed_reviews.review_text: I got excellent, knowledgable service from Tarum at VSE.  He was available and helpful at every step of the process and Im very pleased with my solar system.

WOW! From the word go this company was extremely Professional, Knowledgeable, and Helpful. From the second I called they were able to understand what I was looking for, put together a plan, deal with permitting, and give my home a high quality installation with the industries most superior products. If you need anything with solar or battery back up I 1000% recommend this company!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Scott, Thanks for being a such a fantastic customer and your support towards me and the team. You were truly the best customer to work for. Its been 6 months now since we installed your system. I can see that each of your 50x 325W Canadian Solar panels are still producing correctly on the Solaredge app. Also your 3x Tesla Powerwall batteries are charging and discharging as they should be, aswell as backing up your entire home during your regular Grid outages in Alberta. Im proud of this flawless installation we did. I promise to keep an eye on your system for many years to come and that it meets its calculated predictions. Kind regards Tarum Lloyd

name: MistyWest
address: MistyWest, 554 E 15th Ave, Vancouver, BC V5T 2R5

detailed_reviews.review_text: We are really happy with the services, and friendly and professional design advice we have received from Misty West. Our product required multi-discipline expertise and the Misty West Team knows how to deliver and scale through each design phase. Having worked with many engineers and design teams over the years, Misty West has provided the best experience. It is quite clear their expertise and understanding of how to scale a product and business is far above the rest! We will use them again in the future for our product design needs and manufacturing advice. Thank you!

Ive had the privilege of working with Leigh and Josh at Misty West one summer and the experience was incredibly inspiring. It was really refreshing to be part of a team that works just as hard on the creative vision as they do on technical strategies. Leigh and Josh are incredibly knowledge, immensely curious and wickedly creative people who know how to lead, encourage, and mentor a team to create the best work possible for their clients.

Working with MistyWest has been a real pleasure.  Their thoughtful, methodical and intelligent approach to engineering and product design are distinguishing traits of the firm.  They move quickly, and precisely to maximize productivity and creativity in solving the design issues that naturally arise in any product development cycle.  A great asset to any venture.

Enthusiastic, helpful, and truly caring. MistyWest is a true hardware pillar in Vancouver. Always impressed with their ability to bring a community together, and to share their experiences with a wider audience. The staff are quick to make useful suggestions and offer valuable insights, not just on your product, but on the business too.

Wonderful company!!! Mystywest has the best talents working on multiple state of the art projects. As an engineer working in high tech for a few years, I definitely recommend them if you need real experts for your innovative projects.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Elsa - its a pleasure to make connections to other engineers in the field! If you find yourself free you should definitely join us for our Hardware Meetup events. Theyre pretty fun! https://www.meetup.com/Vancouver-Hardware-Meetup/

detailed_reviews.review_text: I have worked with MistyWest for over a year now on projects critical to our group. They have a rare combination of design, mechanical engineering, and electrical engineering that is hard to replicate in other firms and their team dynamics are positive, organized, and transparent.

Great team with a ton of insight. They give invaluable engineering advice from prototyping to future, large scale production. Most importantly, they are extremely personable and quick to respond to questions and concerns!

There is a fake review here using my former name and my photo. I have had no business dealings with MistyWest. However, in all my correspondence with the founder and other employees, they have always been professional and courteous.
We offer the best engineering and design services in Vancouver. Our focus is on projects that help to make the world a better place.
Hi. There is a fake review here using my name and another image from another site. I have had no dealings with Mistywest.
Awesome team with a broad technical background.... oh and the office dog is pretty cool too.
Professional and  knowledgeable. Thanks for the excellent service.
The owner is nice.

We only had a quick, informal meeting with Josh.  He started off with talking about what the company can offer and past projects, which seems really impressive.  However, when I described my project to him, it didnt seem like he was listening and at some point, actually pulled out his phone.  Perhaps he was not impressed by our small project and saw no value in continuing the conversation. Anyways, we took our project elsewhere, somewhere which seems to place more value into it, regardless of the size of our project.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi John, Im really sorry we werent able to help you. I searched through my email and I dont see any correspondence between us. Could you remind me what your company is and what you came to us looking for? I would be the first to admit that we do suggest to some people who talk to us that we are not a perfect fit when it either makes more sense to hire someone internally or go with an individual rather than an integrated engineering team, but I dont recall ever turning someone away without a good explanation of why it might more sense to take a different strategy. Many other firms may be more likely to take on the work even if it isnt the best move for the client. Are you sure it was our company that you talked to? Again, Im sorry that we did not get a chance to work together and I hope that you have been successful with your venture. Best regards, Josh Usher

detailed_reviews.review_text: We were very fortunate to have been referred to Laddie and Innova Security Systems by a builder/friend even though our own builder had referred us elsewhere.  Through our research, the valued referral and after meeting with Laddie, we were convinced he would have our backs with regard to our home security and he and his staff did and continue to do so with exemplary representation. Laddie has tremendous technical knowledge, never stumped for a solution and vast up to date product information to always present to us best options. He provided and continues to provide us with step by step explanations of accessing systems/equipment, advised best options, price differentials, set up, etc. and virtually walks us through every aspect of our home alarm system, security cameras and fire protection. This constituted and still involves much time, effort, site and home visits and patience from Laddie and his staff to afford us this education and experience. Often we have had questions or concerns on a weekend and Laddie always responds and has surprisingly shown up at any time of day including evenings, Saturdays and Sundays to assist us. We believe this speaks volumes in addressing his character and the commitment of him and his company in providing an excellent service. We believe that reading reviews substantiates your evidence in the due diligence process, so we realize this and do not hesitate in recommending Laddie and Innova Security Systems. We are confident that it would be a challenge to find a better company for your home security needs.

Great professional team! they setup our entire house with Cameras, security system, Cable,  Fibre, central vac. excellent customer service throughout install and after to get setup on using the system. Everything can be accessed through the app on your phone. highly recommended

I would highly recommend Innova, I had a great experience and they did an amazing installation. Sam and JD were very professional and Laddi helped setup our security, cameras, and theatre room for our entire house. I can easily access all features on my phone, Im very glad I went with Innova.

I came across this company through my great friend. Innova Security Systems know what to do best. Top quality solutions is what you need! Technicians are highly trained professionals. 100% would recommend!

I came across Laddi thru a close friend of mine who was building my house in Vancouver in 2016. After few detailed meetings, my wife and I, decided to hire INNOVA Security Systems for a full turn key project. Laddi and his team were extremely detailed, explained me all of his work in a step by step process and time it will take. I am happy to say, everything was executed in timely fashion and everyone in my family was properly trained on home automation hardware that was installed. I highly recommend Laddi / INNOVA Security to anyone who is looking for low voltage system installed by a very technically sound person. I wish these guys success and for sure will use them in future.
Great service, we have used Innova for our retail business alarm for years now without issues. He does it all on time and works around our store timing. Great guy to deal with
Techs are highly skilled & professional! Honestly speaking, I thought the job couldn t be done until Innova came and amazed my eyes! I highly recommend Innova Security!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for choosing Innova. Looking forward to work with you in the near forward.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Have been dealing with Laddi for years now and he has been great with all our clients. He provides great after sales service which really differentiates him from other companies i have dealt with in the past.
Breathtaking home cinema installation! I love how everything works from one remote, from my room lights to custom created scenes! Top Quality work done!
Innova Security.....good service and conversation also good  .I like this company and employees, employer as well
recommend this company, very professional and quality is amazing!
Great to talk too amazing soft spoken sales guy and technician.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: THANKS FOR GIVEING ME REVIEW

detailed_reviews.review_text: Thank you for the great service, would highly recommend this company
Very good pricing and quality work.
i like light

detailed_reviews.review_text: Amazing company with an environmental protection policy to be respected and admired.
Extraordinary virtual process engineering from design assist through construction.

Great building

name: Primero Cleaning Services
address: Primero Cleaning Services, 1783 Manitoba St #1601, Vancouver, BC V5Y 0K1

detailed_reviews.review_text: After calling responding quickly and fix our schedule over phone call. David and him team come to our house in 2 hours and start cleaning. They cleaned deep and finished quickly. Now my house look fresh and new, we are getting fresh air now lol. Thank you David for your professional job

Davide and his team do a great job in keeping our sports facility clean. responsible crew, communicates in advance if there are any changes and keeps our instructions in mind. Very glad to have the Primero team with us.
We are using Primeros services for about an year now and the service has been on time and as per schedule. Davide is always communicative and understanding. Keep up the good work!

We have started use Primero Cleaning in June 2019 after we have tried different formulas(hourly day cleaner, night cleaner etc). Best thing we did ,impeccable job done by them. A pleasure to arrive in the morning and find the restaurant floor, the bar, the stairs  and the washrooms super clean . Many many thanks Davide and I will recommend you to any other managers I know.
Great job by Davide to bring our office back to its former glory! He was very courteous and super efficient! Our staff was really happy with the end result. Highly recommended!
I am happy I switched to Primero Cleaning. They are doing a great job cleaning our storefront sales area and actually do extra cleaning when they see the need. Great company to deal with.
used for work, very professional, competitive pricing, we have even switched from our current cleaners to Davides company; would recommend!
Primero has been cleaning my office for years now and they are great, fast professional and have great prices.
I am very happy with the company Davide is very professional in time he does excellent job I will highly recommend him
The cleaner always does a great job, and Davide is very flexible and easy to work with.
Well organized company with very good cleaning services & competitive pricing, thank you.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Our multi-family housing office has worked with Steelhead for 4 years now on a referral from another firm. We have exclusively used Toshiba products which work particularly well with our windows/Mac blended environment. I had nothing but issues with my enterprise level HP MFP because it would not get along with MacOs. The Steelhead team offers fast and thorough tech support. Many things are diagnosed and dealt with by phone and failing that someone is always available for s site visit. The sales team is thoughtful and interested in delivering the best and most cost effective solution. We dont need to think about our printing, copying or scanning needs because Steelhead always has us covered.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: We appreciate you taking the time to share your experience. Thanks Jeffrey! We look forward to working with you for many more years. - The Steelhead Team

detailed_reviews.review_text: If there were 6 stars, Id give them to Steelhead! They have been indispensable on several occasions after our maintenance contract expired. Not just once they ve gone above and beyond; they know their stuff and always gracious and helpful. It really is a pleasure to know this company!

Steelhead is always willing to work with us to generate new solutions, they bring value with their printers which are so reliable. Service calls are responsive and they do their best to equip us for success. During the pandemic they have come alongside us with our fees, we couldnt have asked for a better partner in this season.

Steelhead Business Products has provided service for the non profit I work for years. I have always found them professional, clear and easy to work with. In fact I was recently trained by one of their employees who was very pleasant and very easy to understand. When we have had problems with photocopier, we always get great service. Thank You Steelhead.

After dealing with Steelhead for the last 20 years, I can say they are the best team around for helping you with your copier needs. From helpful and polite staff in the office to tech support and delivery service that come to your home or office all over the lower mainland when there is a problem that needs fixing or a machine that needs replacing. A great group of people from a great company.

I just saw the review on after sales support.  Let me tell you that if you want bad support, try companies like An.. or Col.... where you cant even get someone to answer the phone.  We switched to Steelhead about a year ago.  Average wait time to get someone to answer the phone - none.  (Im not even going to tell you what the other places were like - and another nameless equipment place asked me to do something illegal - seriously).  Steelhead is either able to remote in or walk us through a problem in about 10-15 minutes or they have someone onsite in about 4 hours, which is critical in tax time.  One time with one of the competitors we had to buy a small printer from Staples because they were going to be days to fix a problem.  Days.  In tax season.  Really!  My office manager has just told me were never switching because she can at least talk with a person at Steelhead.  They have been patient with us and we so appreciate that we arent a big customer, but they dont treat us like a small one.

What a fantastic company!  Weve been using them for years and their product and customer service is absolutely wonderful. Professional, knowledgeable and helpful staff who are quick to help solve any problem.  They have been fabulous to work with and I cannot recommend them enough.
Virginia at Steelhead is the most helpful and kind! She is always able to assist with any of my inquires. She is super patient and able to provide fast solutions.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the lovely compliment, Olivia!

detailed_reviews.review_text: We would highly recommend this company for any of your printing needs. They were friendly, courteous and taught us how to use the printer easily. They have excellent service and are readily available.
Always quick to respond to service requests, competitive pricing, great to deal with. We have used them for many years for the copying needs in our medical office.   Highly recommended.
Great customer service!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Got fired after 3days because I couldnt pick up work fast enough  . Probably a company looks for marvel heroes who can do everything in a few days. Now I am wondering what probation period exists for. Dont even bother working here for an experience. You will learn nothing.

The part-time workers have noticed that this company is very inhumane. The employees have worked hard for the company for nearly three months and have not made any mistakes. There is no problem with their ability to work. They can find any reason to fire employees. They only take advantage of legal loopholes. During the three-month probation period, employees can be fired without reason. Its legal, its very unfair to us workers, a regulation is not a good company! Its best not to go again and change to a more humane unit! No wonder their company keeps recruiting newcomers to try out and then dismiss them, a vicious circle! Very contempt disgusting! There is one more disgusting thing. Before entering the company, you have to have a medical examination and buy iron-toed shoes. We need to spend at least 50 for the physical examination to check for tuberculosis and get the report signed, etc., and 80 for the iron-toed shoe market. Their family paid 40 physical examinations and 70 iron-toed shoes for reimbursement. However, the reimbursement will only be granted after the probationary period has passed. So the decision is entirely in their hands. You did not make a mistake, if they want to fire you, they will fire you. And they wont reimburse you, and they will confidently say that the contract says that they will be reimbursed after the probationary period. What a shameless unit!

Disgusting company! I advise you not to work in this company! Especially the management team, no respect at all and this is a company that doesnt follow the law, did lots of illegal things. Stay away from viva, you will find all the other companies are 1000 times better than this one working environment is so bad especially in the sales team.

detailed_reviews.review_text: In marketing one of our clients new upcoming real estate development projects, we were looking for visual and rendering solutions that were not only unique but one that has not been used in the industry. In essence, we wanted to wow our developer client and also provide a wonderful representation of the project for prospective buyers and realtors to appreciate the realism of actually being inside of one of the townhouse units, through our project website, brochures and at our Presentation Centres. Our results with Stambol have been amazing. Their 3D, 360, AR, and VR work for us has exceeded all expectations. Never before have we been able to offer such high quality true to life images and renderings for a pre construction offering. Our client, prospective buyers and realtors have all been wowed and we are very happy with the work Stambol has done. The team at Stambol has been awesome to work with and dedicated to ensure client satisfaction. Stambol is a great partner for us and we look forward to collaborating with them with our future development projects.  We would greatly recommend Stambol Studios for anyone looking to do 3D, 360, AR and VR  in their respective industry. Nevin Low, Executive Vice President Nu Stream Marketing Inc.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much, Nevin. Your vision to incorporate these effective immersive technologies into your marketing flow is unmatched. We love working on every one of Nu Streams projects.

detailed_reviews.review_text: We just completed a project with Stambol for our companys townhouse project in North Vancouver. Stambol created VR tours of several of our home types and we are using this cutting edge technology in our sales centre to help help customers see our home plans in three dimensions. This is a game-changing technology and it offers so much more than traditional 2D drawings. Dogu from Stambol has offered us exceptional service and a great deal of advice and guidance as this is relatively new technology and can be intimidating to many. Stambol is highly recommended and we plan to use them again in the future.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: We are incredibly pleased to have worked with such a forward thinking team, Kevin. Immersive technologies are the best way to showcase your unique vision and every detail you are carefully crafting in the final product. We are thrilled you are benefiting from our VR and visualization solutions at many levels and cant wait to work on many new projects together that need stunning visuals and most functional interactive applications.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Stambol Studios has exceeded my expectations, and the quality of their work has been incredible! Dogu, Mehmet, and their team were amazing at bringing my idea, vision, and VR experience to life. If you are looking for an unbelievable company to execute your AR/VR/XR needs, Stambol is the company to go with. Their work is mind-blowing! Thank you for all that you did and will do Stambol! I look forward to many projects together!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: You are the absolute best, Naomi. Your story and vision has been the most inspiring for all of us at Stambol. We appreciate the authenticity and fresh perspective you bring to every detail of one of the most fun and innovative health care products ever built. Your prompt feedback at every step does not go unseen as it made the overall process made our job twice as easy. Keep on being awesome! We are excited about our amazing partnership going forward!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Pacific Coast Community College has been working with Stambol for over 4 years on our online advertising and marketing. They have successfully managed our requests and guided us into best practices that have helped increase our lead generation 50 fold since we started. The team at Stambol is incredibly creative and flexible and are able to translate our desired outcome into a cohesive strategy that works.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the kindest words, Tracey. It is an absolute pleasure to work with you and your team at the Pacific Coast Community College. Your passion to serve and finding innovative new ways to reach the target audience has been an inspiration all around the industry. We are truly glad to have been part of this amazing journey and use our creative muscles and marketing technology expertise to be able to help. Looking forward to many years of creating exciting and innovative projects together.

detailed_reviews.review_text: I have had the pleasure of working with Dogu and team at Stambol for a few years now.  While I have greatly appreciated their expertise and technology in the rapidly evolving VR space, I am always impressed with their utmost commitment to the highest quality product, all while embracing the newest and most novel applications of the technology.  Dogu is a highly innovative thinker and deeply thoughtful around where VR and AR are going, such that they were able to demonstrate an entirely new way to recreate the experience of walking through our Health & Technology DISTRICT and Innovation HUB, allowing us to share it around the world.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much, Rowena. We are thrilled to be partners with such an amazing organization as Health and Technology District. You devotion to bringing the development of all the bleeding edge technologies into the healthcare space is very exciting. It was our pleasure to with your team and take a part in showcasing the DISTRICT, the Innovation HUB and the future of health technologies. Looking forward to building worlds together that truly enhance this space.

detailed_reviews.review_text: The team at Stambol Studios do excellent, high quality work. That s easy to see. What I m most impressed with, however is the work that goes on behind the scenes. The team at Stambol made an extraordinary effort to get to know our goals and offered different solutions to help manage and meet our needs. Regular check-in s and updates kept me informed and engaged in the process. And, perhaps most importantly, the Stambol team itself has a cohesive spirit and is well organized which made everything go as smoothly as possible. I ve already recommended Stambol s services to other business owners and will continue to work with them for years to come.  Edoye Porbeni, CEO Future Health Ventures Inc.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for the kind words, Edoye. We hold ourselves to the highest of standards when it comes to understanding your goals and finding the best solution possible within any constraint. Your innovative ideas and vision have inspired us all here at Stambol. It has always been great pleasure to work with you and we look forward to continuing to innovate together for the many years to come.

detailed_reviews.review_text: What a fantastic final product to market our Heritage Townhouse units.  Dogu and Mehmet were consummate professionals to deal with and were extremely supportive in working with the changes and adjustments that invariably come with putting together a complex finished product.  Highly recommended for anyone looking to go next level with marketing any real estate spaces.  The realism of the finished product which hasnt even broken ground yet, is truly stunning !!  Next generation tech !!  Thanks Team Stambol !!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much, Amir. We are thrilled to have been a part of this unique heritage development project with our immersive real estate marketing tech. These beautifully designed spaces were a joy to visualize and it has been an absolute pleasure to work with you and your passionate team to make it come to life. We truly look forward building several next generation applications together.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Dogu and his team have been a pleasure to work with, this emergent technology is changing so quickly so trust was paramount, I am confident that the end product was both high quality and well priced. Really appreciate the extra work that went in to the final products. We used Stambol for their VR and then got some really great Renderings as well.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for these very kind words and your trust in us, Matthew. We are always thrilled to work with you and your team and help showcase beautiful unique features of every property you develop.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Stambol s technology and concepts are game changers.  They worked very hard with our marketing team to ensure the project is delivered on time and with the anticipated results.  We intend to continue working with them on exploring other avenues of using their VR/AR tech.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much, Ardeshir. We are truly inspired by your vision and your pioneering work in using technology to showcase your projects. It is a true pleasure to work with you and your team and we look forward to creating magical activations together for the many years to come.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Stambol has been professional to work with and delivers a fantastic product.  They will be our go-to company moving forward.  Great experience.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for the kindest words, Rachael. It has been an absolute pleasure to work with you and your team. We look forward to creating many exciting visualizations and applications and showcase unique aspects of your projects together.

address: Warm Buddy Company, 801 W 1st St #4, North Vancouver, BC V7P 1A4

detailed_reviews.review_text: I love this company!!! I just got a replacement for my Ultra Body Wrap and this product is amazing. I got the soft pink wrap and it is wonderful to curl up with and has an amazing scent. The customer service is exceptional. Highly recommend ****  Thank you Warm Buddy Co.

As a family who has survived cancer, we appreciate this wonderful product. I have used magic bag in the past and found that the warm buddy is my preference.  I support local and buy made in Canada products.       everybody needs a warm buddy and a warm HUG.
Warm Buddy products are both therapeutic and cute. From a retailer perspective (as we have been for 7 years) they sell very well!

I work at Warm Buddy co. At work I started getting an Aura, which means im getting a migrane. I  warmed up Spa Wrap and put it around my neck and warmed up the Sleep Mask as well. I was able to stave off the headache and my Aura disappeared faster than it would have without the warm buddy products. My entire family uses Warm Buddies. We use them for everything from aches and pains, to warming us up on those cold nights! Even our dog loves her Warm Buddies.

I have been using Warm Buddy products for years and have given away as gifts many, many products. I couldnt survive my back pain without my Warm Buddy heat pad.  This is a fabulous company and I highly recommend their products! B. Bottomley

My whole family uses and loves Warm Buddy heat wraps to warm up beds at night, treat stomach aches and just for general comfort and stress relief. They can also be used cold to cool off on these hot summer nights. I use my body wrap to help relieve back/shoulder pain after tennis, golf or workouts. Works way better than pain medication! We have given many Warm Buddy animals to our family and friends as gifts and everybody loves them. They also warm-up!

I had the most horrifying experience with this company today at the ESI spa show here in Vancouver. It was quite busy at the show with many woman in front of me at their booth looking at their lovely things they had to showcase and sell. It included their stuffed animals (warm buddies) , cozy robes and other warming bottles. Everyone was touching and feeling and when it was my turn I asked the woman how much the teddy bears were. She replied in a very rude tone  they re all a different price . Ok well how much is this one I asked, I would like to buy it for my daughter. $20 dollars! She said rudely and so I handed it to my daughter and went to get my wallet when she said  give me that one back or pay for it first if you want to see anything else, nobody wants to buy one that a child has touched . I was so shocked! So shocked. And so were the other women (whom I didn t know). They all put the items down that they were looking at it. And one woman said that s the rudest thing someone could ve said. Especially a salesperson trying to sell their product! A child s product ! I was not only embarrassed and mortified about the situation, but my daughter was so upset when I told her I m sorry we aren t going to buy this anymore. 15 minutes later when I was walking around a woman from a different booth approached me and said she was so sorry for what that woman said to me and my daughter. It was so extremely rude and unprofessional. They really should not have this woman representing their company. ( she was wearing a lime green long sleeve underneath her black vest with short hair)  Hopefully the owner reads this and addresses this issue so it never happens again to anyone else. I can t imagine anyone wanting to support a company like this. I know I can t. EDIT: Thank Karen for replying to me. I do accept your apology and I can understand that it was quite busy and probably would ve added to your probably stressful day. I was just really wanting to buy a warm buddy for my daughter. Thank you so very much for your offer of sending her a warm buddy, she will be so happy about this.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: I am so sorry that you had a bad experience with my company. I was attempting to find a Warm Buddy for your daughter as you said you were not sure which one she would like. That is what I understood. I was in the process of bringing choices for your daughter to see. What was going on at the same time was a customer wanting a Warm Buddy that had not been handled. Normally I would have allowed your daughter to keep the labrador she had while I brought more options. I wanted to explain what happened as I did realize that you were not happy. This show can get very busy and I am sorry that you left without our resolving the situation. I am the owner of the company who you referred to and this situation is not what my company is about.  It is always my intention to have happy customers and for everybody to have access to our products. I would be very happy to send your daughter a Warm Buddy as that is what my intention was at the time. Warm Buddy options can be seen on our website. Kindly accept my apology as there seems to have been a misunderstanding which caused stress for you. Please contact us at info@warmbuddy.com with a product choice and shipping address, I will be very happy to send you a Warm Buddy for your daughter. Again, please accept my sincere apologies for the unfortunate experience. Warmest regards, Karen

detailed_reviews.review_text: The products are super cozy, the quality is excellent and the customer service is really efficient with quick response and solutions ;))
Great products! Get them!

detailed_reviews.review_text: I was impressed by Hedgehogs personal commitment to their projects; they had boots on the ground making sure everything went smoothly, without micro-managing. They have a keen interest in what each subconsultant involved has to offer, to gain an even more thorough knowledge of the different pieces that make up the puzzle - this is only part of what makes their project management stand out. They have an inclusive project team mentality, making sure all aspects are covered and comments heard, while still being efficient.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you, the pleasure is ours to work with you. Were always making sure we re there until the lights turn on!

detailed_reviews.review_text: I had an amazing time working at HHT. The quality of work delivered to customers and clients is beyond every standard in the industry. The management has a direct and open relationship with the employees which makes working at hedgehog a great experience. Working along side top rated professional  engineers at hedgehog prepared me for taking on more difficult challenges which led to my current role at Tesla.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for sharing such glowing sentiments. We appreciate and value your feedback!

detailed_reviews.review_text: The staff at Hedgehog have been incredibly helpful, professional, and supportive throughout the design and building process. They were able to integrate many of the requested features for my project and were highly responsive to feedback and effectively set up times for collaboration and communication throughout.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for sharing your feedback - we greatly appreciate it!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Hedgehog is ideal choice to lead any engineering project involving automation, power delivery, or functional safety.  The experienced team is prorfessional, courteous, and effective.  With their impressive background spanning manufacturing facilities, infrastructure, submarines, and even amusement rides, Hedgehog delivers amazing results for all stakeholders.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: We truly appreciate your glowing sentiments. Thank you!

detailed_reviews.review_text: I had the pleasure of using Hedgehog Technologies as an outside engineering resource on a large project. They were very professional, flexible, and easy to work with. The experience went so well that when I moved on to another company and needed outside engineering help again I immediately thought of Hedgehog and have worked with them again on multiple additional projects. Thank you for your help Hedgehog. I look forward to working with you more as the need arises.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for sharing and we truly value your relationship with us!

detailed_reviews.review_text: I had the opportunity to see Hedgehog Technologies from the inside as part of a six-week management project. I have seen the inner workings of a lot of consulting companies, and HHT is genuinely in a league of its own. It all comes down to excellence, inclusiveness, and fun. First, excellence. This is a company that seeks out unique, challenging work that most other EE companies can t handle. This is a sharp, elite team that is brought in on complex projects where human lives are at risk and safety is paramount. This can be seen in their projects - roller coasters, deep-sea submarines, and more. Second, inclusiveness. Diversity is good, but it s really inclusiveness that matters. I saw how deeply this runs in HHT s DNA. On my last day in the office and at the end of a successful project, I wanted to pick up a few bottles of champagne for the team. I mentioned this to the president, Mike, and he kindly mentioned,  don t forget to pick up some de-alcoholized bubbles, too.  I had completely overlooked the fact that there were team members that do not drink. It was absolutely front-of-mind for Mike that everyone gets to be included. And speaking of fun, there is a reason you see so many smiles on LinkedIn and Twitter posts. Be it games of Coup at lunch, team events, monthly food culture events, or Friday runs to the DL Chicken Shack, there is a welcoming nature to this team that puts a smile on your face plus they can solve the really challenging problems.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for sharing your thoughts and feedback with us. The team greatly appreciates your glowing sentiments!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Very nice people
Highly unprofessional. Projects cost overshoots by even project management standards. A company that shouldnt be trusted with audits or any other engineering tasks.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Mark, A review such as this concerns us and we can t find any record of you in our system. Would you be able to provide more detailed feedback on the incident in question? Please reach out to info@hedgehogtech.com or call us at 604-210-0204 to provide further information on this matter. Best regards, - Cale

detailed_reviews.review_text: We had a great experience working with the code tactic media. They understood the need of our business really well and provide a ongoing support. They take care of our needs right away, and Gonzalo has great communication skills. He listens carefully to the customer feedback and always incorporate into his design decisions.

CodeTactic built my website two years ago. Throughout the entire process, all promises to fulfill and execute deadlines were met. Technical language and systems were explained in a clear manner for someone without their background to grasp. CodeTactic ensured to understand my history, goals, and overall vision of what I needed my website to communicate. They took the time to ask all the questions necessary to ensure that we were always on the same page. Anytime I had questions and issues with anything they were quick to reply and provide solutions. The end result is CodeTactic delivered on what they promised. I loved what they created. They have built me a website that I am proud to own. The website is an accurate reflection of the high quality of my business. Their customer service continues to be quick, accurate, and helpful whenever I have a question with my site. I would highly recommend CodeTactic to anyone who is searching for a company to take care of such an important part of their business goals! Yohannes Petros Founder/Owner - Hanes Hummus

Gonzalo in particular has gone above and beyond to ensure our website functioned the way we liked. They have definitely been able to help our company grow. Overall great company, quick response and great quality work. Highly recommend!

Highly recommend staying away from freelance designers.

detailed_reviews.review_text: I recently built our home and wanted it to be smart. Im a pretty techy person and I wanted the house to do everything I always wished it could do. I had a lot of things on my wish list, and a lot of questions. I met with several vendors, and each one was different, but ADS was the only one where I was happy with the price, the service, and willingness to work with me to get everything exactly as I wanted it. Others would say no one does that, its not possible. ADS would say, interesting, let me get back to you! And they always got back to me, and they almost always had a solution. If it really was impossible, they helped me understand why. Of all the things I did for my house, making my home smart had the most details to work out. ADS helped me work out every last detail exactly as I would want it, with lots of good advice and suggestions. And they are always very responsive to my questions, so I am reassured that if I need anything, theyll be there for me. And I love my smart home! Now, ADS job is done, and I can confidently write this review, that they are awesome. Also, youll soon learn that it is a father-son team, and I love that. Amarjit and Karn are super nice, and they will earn your trust very quickly. It was a big (and expensive) project and I wasnt just going to hand out my trust either, they really earned it with their honest and transparent dealings with me. When youre dealing with a construction/reno project, trust is key to a stress free experience, and youre going to get that wit ADS. (And trust me Ive had my share of horrible experiences!) So now, Im going to hire them to do my automatic blinds. Theyll always have my repeat business.

I built my first home and had no idea of the capabilities of automation and smart features in a home. I got multiple quotes on the basic features I did not know about.  I received quotes from multiple companies  and I had no understanding of what work was going to be done or the benefits of it. Karn at ADS was patient with me and explained the features and benefits of everything. They created a system that was customized for my family and our budget. Upon completion of the work they have returned for service calls and upgraded my system from remote locations when needed. They are always available to answer questions and help out whenever they can. The best part of it all is Amarjit and Karn Love what they do and are always excited about new systems, and features. They are a pleasure to deal with and I look forward to working on my next project with them.
Been using ADS for years. Highly recommend them for any commercial or residential. Reliable father and son team that put our needs first.
